story:
Big Thanks for your support and Contributions!

The CMYK 4.0 is InDemand and still available. We look forward to delivering this awesome bike and will have an update next week.

 

 

 

 

 

THE BEST BIKE COMMUTING EXPERIENCE

 

 

 

Bike to work. No sweat.

A 250 watt motor will give you 30 miles of assisted riding with one charge. Regulate your cadence and heart rate with the mobile app.

Connect with public transportation.

Coordinate transit connections with mass transit schedules. The quick-fold mechanism makes this lightweight bike easy to bring on board.

Know the road ahead.

Information generated through crowd mapping provides current information on road conditions. Avoid bumpy roads, construction and accidents.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

IT'S ELECTRIC

We don't want to get technical, but this is a jewel. A powerful 250 watt motor will help you climb steep hills and easily and cruise along with less effort. 

Once you start to pedal, you feel an amazing force help you move forward, the motor kicks in you go faster and farther without breaking a sweat.

The electric system is design under US/EU regulations.  This bike is defined as a "pedalec" which means that it assists while pedaling (there is no throttle) and max speed for the electric motor is restricted to 15.5 mph or 25km/h.

  

IT'S LIGHT AND FOLDS FAST

Coming in at only 26 lbs.(12Kg) the CMYK 4.0 is very easy to transport. The handlebars fold down in one motion and the seat easily lowers making the bike a compact package to take on the train, put in your car or stash under your desk. 

BUILT-IN PHONE CHARGER

All of these great features take a toll on your phone battery. That is why we put a phone charger directly on the handlebar, so you can power your phone even if the bike runs out of juice.

 

ENHANCE YOUR COMMUTING EXPERIENCE

The mobile app is how you interact directly with the bike and the context in which you travel.  
It tells you info like speed, cadence, distance, step-by-step navigation, performance and all sorts of stats on your riding.
You can also access train/bus schedules, step by step navigation and even know road conditions ahead and get warnings of potential danger zones.

 

EASILY FIND ALL BIKE PATHS NEAR YOU

The app tells you where bike lanes are located so that you can plan which routes to take ahead of time.

 

KNOW THE ROAD AHEAD: CROWD MAPPING 

The bike's sensors can determine the condition of the road while you ride. After the ride, the app prompts the rider to answer a few questions about the condition of the road traveled. The more people riding, the more information is collected to generate a map of best routes based on road conditions. This can help you decide which way to take to avoid potholes, cobblestone roads etc... 

USE YOUR BIKE + PUBLIC TRANSIT 

 

The bike knows all of the train, bus and subway stops and can guide you there. It also gives you schedules so that you can plan your trip with precision. 

RECEIVE ROAD HAZARD WARNINGS

 

Know the dangerous or hazardous streets in your city. With information available from police reports and other sources, the mobile app alerts you of dangerous intersections and areas to avoid.

LOCK YOUR BIKE FROM YOUR PHONE

The electronic lock feature allows you to lock/unlock the electronics of the bike from your phone. If your bike is armed and it is moved an alarm will sound.  We still recommend using a U-lock or similar. (See below: The basket accessory has a place for the lock, its pretty neat)

 

 

 

 

A BASKET THAT MAKES SENSE

 

The basket has two velcro straps that allow you to attach it to the bike. Made of a soft but sturdy material, you can also put your phone (any size) in the dedicated pocket with window. This allows you interact with the phone and view your route and stats while riding. (Available as an accessory)

 

 

COVER YOUR BIKE

 

The storage bag is a compact package that opens up to cover and protect your bike while traveling or when you store it. This is an important courtesy if you bring your bike on the bus or subway. (Available as an accessory)

 

EVERYONE CAN SEE YOU WITH THIS SAFETY LIGHT

 

Laser beams project a virtual bike lane on the road around the bike. Also a steady or blinking light keeps you visible and makes riding safer at night. (Available as an accessory)

ACCESS YOUR DATA ANYTIME ANYWHERE

Although you have this data on your mobile app, it may be more comfortable to look at on a larger screen.
Once you've arrived home or at your office you can dig deep into all of the statistics of your trips: duration, average speed, cadence over speed, routes you've taken, etc.

 

You can also track your performance like; calories burned, average heart rate, and peaks and lows so you can target which areas of your daily commute to speed up.

The bike can be managed from the app, where you can see the battery rate of discharge, charging time and how battery consumption changes along the road. You can also plan your commute and socialize with other riders to organize a group ride or get tips on how to improve your daily commute.

SPECS

  • 24V. 5.5Ah rechargeable Li-ion battery charges in about 2 hours
  • Included power supply plugs into standard 110V - 220V outlets (just like a laptop)
  • Battery provides up to 30* miles of assisted power (*depending on terrain and rider's weight)
  • Handle bars fold & seat lowers for compact storage
  • Folding pedals
  • Aluminum frame construction --total weight only 26 lbs.
  • 14" aluminum wheels
  • Chain guard
  • Mudguard
  • Bell
  • Available in four colors: Cyan, Magenta, Yellow & Black

 

 

 

THE TECHNOLOGY

 

 

We have been working for more than 5 years developing the CMYK. There were 3 previous versions and we have made improvements based on feedback we've received from previous customers. We are now getting ready for production and developing the app. 

 

 

 

Next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have partners ready to go. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter a few bumps in the road. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted a group of great advisors that will help. 

 

 

 

We’ve come to Indiegogo to share our idea with you and the awesome community of bikers and bike commuters around the world. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster. 

Our design for the bike is almost ready for tooling and mass production, and the app is in development, but only your help will get us to the finish line. We have 15 years experience in developing and manufacturing products, and we have partnered with manufacturers that are experienced in the bicycle industry. Together, we can make this happen.

 

Manufacturing and Industrial Production:

Indiegogo projects are a risky undertaking and the reality is that they have the potential to encounter problems in the phases after funding. 

We greatly appreciate the vote of confidence and trust our backers have put in us and in our project. We are working hard to avoid issues and have been planning a contingency strategy to get the products to the backers and fulfill our goal of getting more people riding bikes.

Our combined experience and a network of resources in the US and overseas will allow us to quickly react to eventual issues. More importantly, we are doing our homework beforehand so that we do not run into unexpected problems.

In the last 18 months, we have been working diligently on fine-tuning the design, testing and making adjustments in order to have an end result that is the best possible biking experience that is free of “bugs” and does things that people never imagined.

We have more than 15 years experience designing and manufacturing. We also have partners in China and Taiwan for manufacturing. Our design is finalized and we have partnered with the best bike manufacturers to make sure we have things in place once we go to full production. We've also already spent a few months collaborating with factories and suppliers during the prototyping phase.

Software:

The software and app are in development and we are working to build all the features that we want to include in the Brooklyness app. Software development sometimes takes longer than expected, but our team is experienced in this area and we are ready to identify external help should the need arise. 

Even though we are thinking ahead and preparing for the worst, some things may escape our control. We want to rely on our backers for support and patience if we run into difficulties, and we promise we will not stop until the project is completed!

     

     

     

    Help us spread the word and earn a little cash in the process! You get $50 off of your bike for every referral who purchases. 

    HERE IS HOW TO DO IT?

    1.  Visit our project on Indiegogo
    2.  Log in or Sign Up
    3.  Copy your unique sharing URL link. It is located on the left side of the video. (see pic below)
    4.  Think of FIVE friends that like bikes and share your unique URL link with them

     

     


    HOW TO TRACK YOUR RESULTS

    1. Log in to your Indiegogo account.

    2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.

    3. Select the “My Profile” option.
    4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
    5. Count the number of funders, multiply by U$50 and that is how much money you've made.  Awesome!

story:
ACTON BLINK has 3 new models for your everyday needs

BLINK QU4TRO - 4 wheel drive, most powerful, amazing range & conquerer of all hills. 

BLINK S2 - 2 wheel drive, commuter & cruiser, great range & effortless uphill power. Our best all around. Designed for commuters and students.

BLINK S - 1 wheel drive, commuter & cruiser, lightest weight, best campus tool & most portable vehicle. College must have. 

It's the best package out there right now. BLINK glides with advanced hub motors for a more powerful & smoother ride. The experience on these boards is next-level. Head out on the road and forget about charging because you won't have to worry about it for a while. If you ever do run out of juice, you can just kick/push BLINK because hub motors do not slow you down the way belted motors do. Signature lighting illuminates your way and makes you glow so you can stand out on the street for safety and style.

Our talented team has worked day and night over the past year to innovate and improve what ACTON fans have been asking for: super light weight, huge power, amazing range, beautiful, ground breaking design; ACTON BLINK has it all.

 

"God made Lombard Street for BLINK QU4TRO" - David (test rider & customer)

"I'm replacing my car with BLINK!" - Alex (test rider & customer)

"Great acceleration, it's a very smooth ride" - Vivian (test rider & customer)

BLINK QU4TRO is one of the fastest, most powerful boards in the market and it is the only one with 4 wheel drive electric hub motors. Hills? What are those? You'll forget in a hurry as the world starts to appear startlingly level.

YOU DONT NEED A CAR! WORLD'S LIGHTEST & MOST AFFORDABLE DUAL MOTOR eLONGBOARD

We engineered the Blink S2 to have all the best attributes of electric skateboards available today at a price that is much more accessible to the general public. The batteries and other innards are housed within a hole in the wooden deck that makes the overall package much thinner and sleeker. It is sandwiched and reinforced with an aircraft aluminum extrusion to strengthen and protect the board and its electronics. This is a highly optimized package that results in extreme light weight and powerful performance.

TWO Hub Motors For More Power and Speed

Canadian Maple Deck with Extruded Aluminum Reinforcement

Powerful & Light Weight, Portable for Your Daily Commute

A COLLEGE 'MUST HAVE'!

SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT & MOST AFFORDABLE ELECTRIC SKATEBOARD

If lightness and portability is the game, then BLINK S is the name. This is a board that is everything it needs to be and nothing it isn't. The strength of the aircraft aluminum extrusion combines with the wood deck to get a monocoque-like structure that sandwiches everything together. The board's thinness belies its power, however.

 

After more than one year of blood, sweat and hard work, we've finished development and just need $50,000 for our factory to produce a minimum order from us. We’ve put together some huge incentives and we're offering 3 different boards so it's easy to choose one that fits your lifestyle.

 

 

Risks And Challenges

Our biggest hurdles in the past have been dealing with manufacturers who do not deliver on time. To prevent any delays, we have already developed our relationship with our manufacturers and they’ve been delivering other products to us for months. So, while still a risk, our experience in this department helps us to predict if there will be a problem and immediately implement a solution. We have also divided our manufacturing up among several factories so that no one factory holds all the power in the supply chain.

More Reassurance

We have been in business for a couple of years now and have run 3 highly successful crowd funding campaigns, the last one pulling in over half a Million Dollars. We have a proven track record of delivering innovative products to our customers.

We have a couple of skateboard models out in the market already. We currently hold the title for the lightest and most compact electric skateboards you can buy. We’ve been improving these models incrementally to create the best possible board for our customer. We now have completely new boards that are the result of all of our learnings from our original Electric Skateboards.

Other Ways You Can Get Involved

Remember, if you don’t feel like you can contribute the amounts listed, please consider passing on our campaign to someone who might be interested. Drop these links in tip jars, friends’ emails, social media or post them on your favorite blogs' comment sections! Please help us get the word out!

Shipping & Timelines

We ship globally. There will be a few regions that are too difficult to ship to, however. Please contact us if you are an international customer.

When we start shipping:
3 models are in pre-production phase now. BLINK S begins shipping in December 2016. BLINK S2 begins shipping in January 2017. BLINK QU4TRO begins shipping in March 2017. We'll keep you apprised of actual dates and send a message to everyone as the product is shipped.

Press - Download Press Kit Here

 

Team ACTON

ACTON is an amazing team of designers, engineers, sales and marketing gurus who are dedicated to bringing fun transportation to the world. Aside from simultaneous jumping, we all have a deep commitment to giving people alternatives to using cars and getting outside for a thrilling ride!

FAQs

Q: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?

A: Yes, we do!!

For international fans: international shipping cost for most countries BLINK S $60, BLINK S2 $80, BLINK QU4TRO $100.  Let's BLINK together!

Q: WIDTH OF THESE AMAZING BOARDS?

BLINK QU4TRO - 9"

BLINK S2 - 8.5"

BLINK S - 8"

Q: PACKAGE DIMENSIONS & WEIGHT?

A: BLINK QU4TRO - Pkg Weight 23 lbs, Dimension: 8.6"x12"x33"

BLINK S2 - Pkg Weight 18 lbs; Dimension: 7.5"x12"x32"

BLINK S - Pkg Weight 16 lbs; Dimension: 7.5"x12"x28"

Q: HOW DO THE DIFFERENT RIDE MODES WORK?

A: Please go to the App Store or Google Play, search for “ACTON” and download the app. You can set 3 modes – beginner, normal, and pro, via the app. Once the mode is set, you can put your phone aside and use the remote to control & brake.

Q: What happens when my board runs out of battery?

A: BLINK electric skateboard contains hub motors, which provide almost zero resistance. You can kick and push as if it was a regular skateboard.

Q. IS SAFETY GEAR REQUIRED WHILE RIDING THE BLINK BOARD?

A: Yes, we always recommend wearing a helmet and other safety gear like gloves, pads, and long sleeves when riding.

Q. CAN BLINK BE CARRIED ON AIRPLANES?

A: BLINK S & S2 models are ok. BLINK S's battery is 80Wh & S2 battery is 160Wh which are compliant with the regulations regarding transport of the board on most passenger planes (some require under 100Wh, some under 160Wh). However, airlines have the authority to make the final call which we cannot guarantee, so we suggest calling the airline prior to travel.

We traveled with S + S2 on Delta from SFO-NYC recently, no problem at all. But again, airlines have the authority to make the final, contact the airline prior to travel.

Q. BATTERY LIFE CYCLES?

A: We are using high grade Samsung and Panasonic battery cells. After 500 charging cycles, these packs will still hold 80% of capacity. 

Q. NO GRIP TAPE FOR S & S2 WOOD AREAS? 

A:  Lucid grip around these wood areas. Customer safety is always our first priority.

Q. ARE THERE INTEGRATED LIGHTS ON ALL 3 MODELS?

A:  Yes, ALL 3 models - BLINK S, BLINK S2 & BLINK QU4TRO all have integrated front, tail and 2 side lights. ACTON signature lighting illuminates your way and makes you glow so you can stand out on the street for safety and style.

Q. HOW DOES THE COMBO PACK WORK?

A: Combo packs are designed for reseller & distributors. Please email info@actonglobal.com for more info. Look forward to working with you all!

Q. RETAIL PRICE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN?

A: BLINK S $699; BLINK S2 $999; BLINK QU4TR0 $1699

 

STAY CONNECTEDSubscri

Email Us to be added in our mailing list to get latest news, secret deals and more.

Instagam
Facebook
Twitter
Youtube
Snapchat : actonallday

Aside from simultaneous jumping, we all have a deep commitment to giving people alternatives to using cars and getting outside for a thrilling ride!FAQsQ: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?A: Yes, we do!!For international fans: international shipping cost for most countries BLINK S $60, BLINK S2 $80, BLINK QU4TRO $100.  Let's BLINK together!Q: WIDTH OF THESE AMAZING BOARDS?BLINK QU4TRO - 9"BLINK S2 - 8.5"BLINK S - 8"Q: PACKAGE DIMENSIONS & WEIGHT?A: BLINK QU4TRO - Pkg Weight 23 lbs, Dimension: 8.6"x12"x33"BLINK S2 - Pkg Weight 18 lbs; Dimension: 7.5"x12"x32"BLINK S - Pkg Weight 16 lbs; Dimension: 7.5"x12"x28"Q: HOW DO THE DIFFERENT RIDE MODES WORK?A: Please go to the App Store or Google Play, search for “ACTON” and download the app. You can set 3 modes – beginner, normal, and pro, via the app. Once the mode is set, you can put your phone aside and use the remote to control & brake.Q: What happens when my board runs out of battery?A: BLINK electric skateboard contains hub motors, which provide almost zero resistance. You can kick and push as if it was a regular skateboard.Q. IS SAFETY GEAR REQUIRED WHILE RIDING THE BLINK BOARD?A: Yes, we always recommend wearing a helmet and other safety gear like gloves, pads, and long sleeves when riding.Q. CAN BLINK BE CARRIED ON AIRPLANES?A: BLINK S & S2 models are ok. BLINK S's battery is 80Wh & S2 battery is 160Wh which are compliant with the regulations regarding transport of the board on most passenger planes (some require under 100Wh, some under 160Wh). However, airlines have the authority to make the final call which we cannot guarantee, so we suggest calling the airline prior to travel.We traveled with S + S2 on Delta from SFO-NYC recently, no problem at all. But again, airlines have the authority to make the final, contact the airline prior to travel.Q. BATTERY LIFE CYCLES?A: We are using high grade Samsung and Panasonic battery cells. After 500 charging cycles, these packs will still hold 80% of capacity. Q. NO GRIP TAPE FOR S & S2 WOOD AREAS? A:  Lucid grip around these wood areas. Customer safety is always our first priority.Q. ARE THERE INTEGRATED LIGHTS ON ALL 3 MODELS?A:  Yes, ALL 3 models - BLINK S, BLINK S2 & BLINK QU4TRO all have integrated front, tail and 2 side lights. ACTON signature lighting illuminates your way and makes you glow so you can stand out on the street for safety and style.Q. HOW DOES THE COMBO PACK WORK?A: Combo packs are designed for reseller & distributors. Please email info@actonglobal.com for more info. Look forward to working with you all!Q. RETAIL PRICE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN?A: BLINK S $699; BLINK S2 $999; BLINK QU4TR0 $1699 STAY CONNECTEDSubscri

story:
COVID Has Been Hard

I had to close down my motorcycle fast charging company and portable home DCFC charger company due to complications with vendor timing and international shipping due to COVID. I almost lost everything including my house because of this. After lots of meditation and praying, an Idea came to me.

I had an appointment with a spine Dr. because I crushed my spine in a motorcycle accident, but I had a bent pin in my leaf's J1772 port and the leaf was at 3% SoC so I could not make it to the nearest ChaDeMo station. My wife spoke with the dealer who said it would cost $2,000 USD to fix. When she told me this, I calmly said, OK, I will fix it. In my head though, I said "F*** that, I'll fix it myself and make it better, those rip off bastards..." 

I came up with this idea and prototyped it in my garage. I am already charging at over 6-7kW, the fastest I had ever seen before was 5.1kW from a single J1772 station. I will be porting all of the work I did on my highly compact, high density, motorcycle weather-resistant chargers to allow all of the following.

  • Tesla compatibility
  • Single, double, or triple J1772 station use in the USA and other areas
  • 3 phase menekes support for EU and other areas
  • L2 charging speeds upto 19.8kW 
  • Install documentation for dealers or experienced DIY hackers 

I have never been a fan of slow charging, and if you like waiting to charge or twiddling your thumbs this might not be right for you. But if you think slow charging is stupid, like I do, welcome to the future of not being in club slow charge. And remember friend's don't let friends slow charge, so share this with your group of smart friends. 

What We Need & What You Get

Parts, Moulds, Brackets & Documentation :

  • We need to purchase additional charging components to boost the charger speed, make brackets and moulds for parts and document the install process
  • We offer different configurations to meet everyone's budget
  • We also offer cool swag for supporters
  • The funds we recieve will go to getting our parts manufactured at small batch production scale. We will be using the same manufacturers we used for our motorcycle parts and they are standing by for order quantities

Charging Speed Increase

With built in tesla support your car will instantlly see speeds exceeding 6-7kW. The fastes J1772 charging speed I have seen on a stock leaf is just over 5kW. We offer packages upto 19.8kW from a single tesla or muiltiple J1772 stations at the same time.

We offer the following options

  • Tesla/J1772 single upto 7kW L2
  • Tesla/Dub J, double J1772 upto 14kW L2
  • Tesla/Trip J, triple J1772 upto 20 kW L2

Warranty

With the new Right To Repair act just released by President Joe Biden, and the Magnuson Moss Warranty-Federal Trade Commission Improvements Act, your cars warranty is SAFE, and dealers may not hassle you without the threat of fines from the federal government in the USA.

  • Safe for your cars warranty
  • Our parts come with a 1 year manufacturers warranty, I would love to offer more, however, I am just one guy right now. These same parts have been tested on motorcycles for over half a decade and are still running along great!

Don't have a leaf but still want to support this?

We are offering swag for supporters that do not need this product or can't afford any of the tiers, but still want to show support.

  • Get cool swag like T-shirts and Stickers
  • Support the future and helping those that are charging impaired, like stock leaf owners!

Fund this project for the cause of helping faster charging.

story:
I believe that one of the greatest benefits of our society is that we have institutions in place to protect our safety and property. If you share my desire to aid these emergency workers any way that we can, do I have a product for you.

 

My name is Tim Newman, I am the CEO of Brakers Early Warning Systems Inc. I have been running this business for about 3 years now and I am finally at the stage where I can say I will have my product out and fully operational within the next year.

My product is called B.R.A.K.E.R.S. It stand for Broadcasting to Radios Ahead Keeps Emergency Respnders Safe.

I was nearly in a three way collision with an ambulance and a pick-up truck when I pulled over to allow the ambulance to pass and the truck came from behind me and cut off the ambulance. It was a near miss to be sure and this is why I want to provide my product to the masses. I want to ensure that all drivers can be informed from inside their car so that they don't make the mistake of not knowing why I pulled over and stopped (lets give the guy the benefit of the doubt).

My product will interupt any function of the radio even if it is off, allowing the customized message to come through your speakers and then the radiio will go back to what it was doing before.

If I am able to reach the goal of this campaign I will not only be able to finish off the software design, but I will also be able to start producing the first retail ready pieces.

I am looking for $25,000.00 and $5,000.00 of it will go towards Seneca College to fullfill my obligation to them for a cash contributiion of $5,000.00 in order to get $50,000.00 worth of work done.

This work will include the software as mentioned before. The software will include server software and applications for both IOS and Android operating systems. These applications will allow you to have a receiver inside your car using the smart phone you already have. It will know when you are in your car so don't worry you won't be getting messages while in a meeting, on a date or sitting at the dinner table.

The advantage for a motorist is to not be surprised by flashing lights right behind them.

The advantage for a police officer is to be able to proceed through traffic without delay and as safely as possible.

The advantage for the general public is that the responders can get to them as quickly and safely as possible to administer aid. You may have enough respect to pull out of the way, but I ask you have you ever seen someone who did not show that same respect and cause an emergency vehicle to be delayed?

The transmitter will be sold to police, fire and other emergency departments so that they can broadcast the messages that you would receive.

The remainder of the money raised will allow me to have 200 units built and ready to ship.

I think it is safe to say that anyone reading this will know someone in at least one of the emergency responder fields (police, fire or ambulance). Before you pledge any cash please give them a call a and ask them this question. " IS IT A REAL PROBLEM THAT PEOPLE DON'T MOVE OUT OF YOUR WAY EVEN THOUGH YOUR LIGHTS AND SIRENS ARE GOING"?

I would then encourage you to let them know about this campaign and I hope that not only would you return, but they would also come and have a look.

Even if my goal is not reached I will finish the software design, build as many units as I have money for and find another way to get the rest of the units built, as I said I have been working on this for the last three years and I am not about to stop now especially when I am so close.

This project I believe will not only make it easier for the responders to get to the call, but I believe it will save many lives each year. In the USA there are nearly 70 officers killed each year due to traffic accidents or by being hit while doing a traffic stop on the roadside. This product will inform drivers that they are present and what is expected of them.

It will also have other impacts on society such as Amber Alerts, it will also inform you of sever weather like tornados ETC...

When there are so many things that take a motorists mind off driving it will be nice to know that in these emergency situations something will be there to ensure they are kept aware at that moment.

Even if you can not contribute, but you see the value of this product and its intention of saving lives I would ask that you use the share tools available on this campaign and share it with people you know. The more people made aware of this campagn, the better the chance will be that you can download the application next summer.

Thank you for looking at my campaign, I hope with your help it will be a success. BTW please visit my website for more information.

www.brakers.net

story:
The Vigo motorcycle will be the first fully electric motorcycle which gracefully combines together a previously unchangeable range of up to 400 miles per charge, extreme power, magnificent design and cutting-edge technologies.

 

 

① The following range has been compiled using 80% city, 20% highway environment with an average speed of 45 mph. Factors like: weight load, speed, adaptive braking ratio might gradually reduce the overall range of the vehicle. Values have been calculated taking into consideration specifications of used components.

Currently the motorcycle produces a maximum of 72db but our engineers are working on increasing it as well as improving its sound.

 

 

 

 

 

 

More information regarding the UK "Plug-in car, motorcycle and van grants" here https://www.gov.uk/plug-in-car-van-grants

Government incentives towards the purchase of plug-in electric vehicles have been also established following EU countries:  Belgium, France,  Germany,  Hungary,  Iceland,  Ireland,  Netherlands,  Norway,  Romania,  Spain,  Sweden. Please check your government website for further details.

Many tax benefits are applied for electric motorcycle owners.

In the United Kingdom electric motorcycles are fully exempt from fuel duty as well as there is no Vehicle Excise Duty (also known as "road tax") and for electric vehicles. Further information regarding this subject can be found here.

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden have either full or partial exemption from the annual circulation tax and registration tax. Please check your local government website or European Automobile Manufacturers Association publications to overview governments incentives in your country.

 

 

TIMOTHY SERGEEV
Founder and Executive

Born in USSR. Studied in St. Petersburg and London. Have a thorough knowledge in IT, Electronics, Motorcycles Engineering, International Trading.

The internal-combustion engine is an outdated technology.  The motorcycle industry hasn't evolved much for decades.

Motorcycles of the future must be attractive, affordable and environmentally safe, like the Vigo Motorcycle will be.

 

 

The following timeline shows only products affecting tasks. Financial, organizational, logistical and other vital duties are not included in this timeline. 

 

 

Range, max 400 miles (640 km)
Battery Capacity 21kWh
Life 250 000 miles (400 000 km)
Charging Time Regular: 7-12 hours
Rapid: 20-30 min
Cost to Recharge Approximately £2.5 (€2.94, $3.12) from household power supply
Motor High efficiency, brushless, magnetless, asynchronous, direct-drive AC motor
Motor Power, max 90kW (120 hp)
Torque, max 350 Nm
Speed, max 180 mph (290 kmh)
Motorcycle Dimensions Length: 85' (215 cm)
Height: 50' (127 cm)
Width: 35' (88 cm)
Seat Height: 33.1' (84 cm)
Motorcycle Weight, total 350 pounds (160 kg)
PRICE (ex. VAT)* Estimated Retail Price: £7,999 (9,799 USD, 9499 EUR)

Special Price (FOR INDIEGOGO BACKERS ONLY): £5,999 (7,499 USD, 7199 EUR)

*Estimated Retail Price might change by the time of mass production. Discount Coupon Code gives you a discount off the final retail price. VAT excluded from all prices. Please check tax benefits for electric vehicles in your country in advance.

Special Price is a fixed price which will not be changed. Pre-ordering your motorcycle today, you will pay only that price regardless of the circumstances. Pre-order amount is fully refundable.

Please use following currency converter to check prices in different currencies. British Pound is a main currency for our transactions.

 

Gratitude - £10

Our team is very thankful for your help and support. A personal greeting card with your name will be sent directly to you. You'll be kept up to date on our development stages.

T-Shirt "NO ROAD TAX" - £25

This awesome T-Shirt is not only made of organic cotton and dyed using safe chemicals, but also going to remind you about advantages of having electric motorcycle.
SIZES: S, M, L, XL

Personal Engraved Pen - £35

High quality pen with your name on it will constantly remind you about the kind donation you made.

Keychain Light - £50

This is not only an exact copy of the branded digital key used by Vigo Motorcycles, this is also an incredible keychain and UV light.

Initial Public Test Ride - £150

Be among the first prototype test riders. Have the opportunity to participate in direct development process. Your feedback is very important to us. The test ride will be on a chosen track in England.
Motorcycle Driver Licence (A category) and 2+ years of experience are required to be able to take a test ride.

10% Discount Coupon - £200

Save 10% (or up to £800) off the Retail Price for only £200.
This coupon can be used only once. The coupon can be given to anyone - thus can be used as a present. Discount only applied to the motorcycle Retail Price and do not give any surcharges discounts. Can not be used in conjunction with other coupons.

15% Discount Coupon - £350

Save 15% (or up to £1200) off the Retail Price for only £350.
This coupon can be used only once. The coupon can be given to anyone - thus can be used as a present. Discount only applied to the motorcycle Retail Price and do not give any surcharges discounts. Can not be used in conjunction with other coupons.

Carbon Fiber Helmet - £500

High-quality carbon fiber branded helmet.
Voice Control unit is not attached to the helmet.
AVAILABLE SIZES (Head Circumference): L (55cm-57cm), XL (58cm-60cm), XXL (61cm-62cm)

Special Price Reserve - £800

Pre-order your motorcycle today for 5999 GPB (7499 USD, 7199 EUR) ONLY. Pre-order deposit is fully refundable. We are never going to change the special price for early backers.
Only one special price reserve per customer. Any additional discounts can not be claimed from the Special Price. Additional surcharges might be applied (VAT, delivery costs, etc).

 

 

To make the most affordable electric motorcycle we have to compromise many different aspects.

First - we had to outsource many manufacturing facilities, tires, wheels, brakes, suspension, handlebars, wires, indicators and other components will be manufactured by our international partners. Overall 6 different countries are involved in the production of components for this motorcycle. Even though we've outsourced these facilities we still have very high quality standards and we will control and inspect every component produced by our partners.

Investment of this campaign will fund the prototype development only, as soon as prototype is ready we'll gain further required investments for organizing manufacturing facilities through private venture investors.

We tried to eliminate as many potential problems as possible. So far we identified following possible issues that may lead to potential delays in production:

  • Outsourced components manufacturing delays
  • Product certifications delays
  • Meeting international regulations
  • International shipping delays

By eliminating potential problems we aim to focus on them to avoid any improper delays.

 

 

Vigo Motorcycle come with two years warranty period. Warranty covers both driving and electrical components. Manufacturing warranty extension is not currently provided. Software related issues are not covered by the warranty but free software updates will be provided to all owners.

The battery manufacturer provides a 5 year warranty coverage for the battery pack. If the motorcycle battery degrades more than 6% within the warranty period it will be replaced or repaired free of charge. We also guarantee that the battery will not loose more than 20% of its capacity within 250 000 miles if this occurs the battery will be replaced or repaired free of charge.

 

 

Vigo Motorcycles will be sold through local dealers. Due to the fact that it takes a time to organize a good, structured dealership network pre-ordered motorcycles will be delivered directly to our customers straight from our factory.

From 2018 we will begin to build both a local and  an international dealership network. We will have official dealers as well as certified service centers in different countries. The following countries have the priority above others, due to their electric motorcycle demand (UK, Netherlands, France, Germany, Portugal, Spain, Italy, Sweden, Norway). We'll try our best to organize a dealership network before production starts.  If you interested in becoming a dealer - please send  dealership email request.

 

 

Service and maintenance is an essential aspect we have to work on thus our aim is to provide a convenient service to our customers. Our officials will certify service centers in different countries.

The live service centers database will be automatically uploaded to you motorcycle memory and will be automatically updated regularly. If something goes wrong, your motorcycle and your phone application will provide you the closest service center address.

 

 

 

Will it be possible to claim "Plug-in car, motorcycle and van grant" during the purchase?

Vigo Motorcycles aims is to cooperate with the the UK government in order to meet eligibility criteria for this grant. We're also hoping that by 2019 this scheme will still be available to UK customers. We try our best to meet eligibility criteria before the official lunch date.
More information regarding "Plug-in car, motorcycle and van grant" can be found on the government website. For EU customers please refer to your local government or to European Automobile Manufacturers Association publications to overview governments incentives in your country.

How are you going to deliver the motorcycle?

Additional delivery charge of £200 will be applied to all UK customers. If you are an international customer, our sales team will offer you the best available delivery method to your country. Additional delivery charges will be applied to all international deliveries.

Will it be possible to have a test ride prior the delivery?

The very first test wide will be provided to a limited amount of people (pledge to be among them). The aim of this is to gain customer feedback and to make final amendments to the motorcycle prior production begins.
After that test rides will be provided by the local dealers.

Is it possible to cancel my pre-order?

Absolutely, you can cancel it at anytime. The reservation deposit is fully refundable.

How is it possible that you have achieved up to 400 miles range which nobody else couldn't?

Currently motorcycle manufacturers use inadequate lithium-ion batteries which are heavy and expensive. In our motorcycle we are going to use a new battery technology which gives much higher battery density, lower weight and higher loading and unloading speeds.
Please note: the weight load, speed, adaptive braking ratio and other factors might gradually reduce the overall range of the motorcycle.

Do you have a plan to manufacture different motorcycle types in the future?

Absolutely. We're also aiming to manufacture classic/naked style type as well as tourer version in the future.

What driver licence do you I have to have to ride a Vigo Motorcycle?

A full motorcycle driver licence (Category A) is required to be able to ride a Vigo Motorcycle, because the power output of our motorcycle is more than 15 kW. Further information regarding driver licence requirements provided here.

Can I ride this motorcycle with a provisional licence and CBT?

Unfortunately not. This is because the power output of this motorcycle is more than 15 kW, you will need to have a full motorcycle driver licence (Category A) to be able to ride it.
We aim to manufacture a CBT compatible version in the future.

Which type of charging connection Vigo Motorcycle use?

Although CHAdeMO is used for a prototype model the production model might have a different charging connection.  We are still looking into this.

Do I need to fully discharge the battery and only then charge it again?

No. You don't have to fully discharge the battery. The battery doesn't have a memory issues hence you can charge it anytime by demand.

How are you doing to perform a software update?

The Vigo Motorcycle comes with an embedded 3G Module. This module will allow you to have remote control of your vehicle, get live information about its status, share access to your vehicle with your friends and relatives, track your vehicle,  and other features.
Due to this module built-in motorcycle software will be periodically remotely updated so you don't have to even attend a service center.

How does Voice Control work?

A special voice control unit will be sold separately. This unit will be paired to your motorcycle GPS tracking system and allow you to use voice commands to set your required destination. 

Are you going to provide a motorbike finance?

Motorcycle finance will be provided to all pre-ordered motorcycles. Currently no agreements has been signed between us and any finance company, thus we can't provide exact terms and interest rates. We do want to provide the most exclusive interest rates and repayment plans for our customers.
Vigo motorcycles purchased through any dealers will have to rely on the dealer's finance company.

Where will Vigo Motorcycles be made?

Final manufacturing facility for Vigo Motorcycles will be organized in Cambridge, United Kingdom. Overall 6 different countries will be involved in the production of components for this motorcycle.
story_txt:
The Vigo motorcycle will be the first fully electric motorcycle which gracefully combines together a previously unchangeable range of up to 400 miles per charge, extreme power, magnificent design and cutting-edge technologies.
 
 

① The following range has been compiled using 80% city, 20% highway environment with an average speed of 45 mph. Factors like: weight load, speed, adaptive braking ratio might gradually reduce the overall range of the vehicle. Values have been calculated taking into consideration specifications of used components.Currently the motorcycle produces a maximum of 72db but our engineers are working on increasing it as well as improving its sound.      More information regarding the UK "Plug-in car, motorcycle and van grants" here https://www.gov.uk/plug-in-car-van-grantsGovernment incentives towards the purchase of plug-in electric vehicles have been also established following EU countries:  Belgium, France,  Germany,  Hungary,  Iceland,  Ireland,  Netherlands,  Norway,  Romania,  Spain,  Sweden. Please check your government website for further details.Many tax benefits are applied for electric motorcycle owners.In the United Kingdom electric motorcycles are fully exempt from fuel duty as well as there is no Vehicle Excise Duty (also known as "road tax") and for electric vehicles. Further information regarding this subject can be found here.Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden have either full or partial exemption from the annual circulation tax and registration tax. Please check your local government website or European Automobile Manufacturers Association publications to overview governments incentives in your country.  



TIMOTHY SERGEEVFounder and Executive
Born in USSR. Studied in St. Petersburg and London. Have a thorough knowledge in IT, Electronics, Motorcycles Engineering, International Trading.


The internal-combustion engine is an outdated technology.  The motorcycle industry hasn't evolved much for decades.Motorcycles of the future must be attractive, affordable and environmentally safe, like the Vigo Motorcycle will be.
  The following timeline shows only products affecting tasks. Financial, organizational, logistical and other vital duties are not included in this timeline.

Estimated Retail Price: £7,999 (9,799 USD, 9499 EUR)Special Price (FOR INDIEGOGO BACKERS ONLY): £5,999 (7,499 USD, 7199 EUR)


*Estimated Retail Price might change by the time of mass production. Discount Coupon Code gives you a discount off the final retail price. VAT excluded from all prices. Please check tax benefits for electric vehicles in your country in advance.Special Price is a fixed price which will not be changed. Pre-ordering your motorcycle today, you will pay only that price regardless of the circumstances. Pre-order amount is fully refundable.Please use following currency converter to check prices in different currencies. British Pound is a main currency for our transactions.

Our team is very thankful for your help and support. A personal greeting card with your name will be sent directly to you. You'll be kept up to date on our development stages.





T-Shirt "NO ROAD TAX" - £25

Personal Engraved Pen - £35


High quality pen with your name on it will constantly remind you about the kind donation you made.





Keychain Light - £50


This is not only an exact copy of the branded digital key used by Vigo Motorcycles, this is also an incredible keychain and UV light.





Initial Public Test Ride - £150

Be among the first prototype test riders. Have the opportunity to participate in direct development process. Your feedback is very important to us. The test ride will be on a chosen track in England.Motorcycle Driver Licence (A category) and 2+ years of experience are required to be able to take a test ride.

Discount only applied to the motorcycle Retail Price and do not give any surcharges discounts. Can not be used in conjunction with other coupons.

Discount only applied to the motorcycle Retail Price and do not give any surcharges discounts. Can not be used in conjunction with other coupons.





Carbon Fiber Helmet - £500


High-quality carbon fiber branded helmet.Voice Control unit is not attached to the helmet.AVAILABLE SIZES (Head Circumference): L (55cm-57cm), XL (58cm-60cm), XXL (61cm-62cm)





Special Price Reserve - £800

Pre-order your motorcycle today for 5999 GPB (7499 USD, 7199 EUR) ONLY. Pre-order deposit is fully refundable. We are never going to change the special price for early backers.Only one special price reserve per customer. Any additional discounts can not be claimed from the Special Price. Additional surcharges might be applied (VAT, delivery costs, etc).



  To make the most affordable electric motorcycle we have to compromise many different aspects.First - we had to outsource many manufacturing facilities, tires, wheels, brakes, suspension, handlebars, wires, indicators and other components will be manufactured by our international partners. Overall 6 different countries are involved in the production of components for this motorcycle. Even though we've outsourced these facilities we still have very high quality standards and we will control and inspect every component produced by our partners.Investment of this campaign will fund the prototype development only, as soon as prototype is ready we'll gain further required investments for organizing manufacturing facilities through private venture investors.We tried to eliminate as many potential problems as possible. So far we identified following possible issues that may lead to potential delays in production:
Outsourced components manufacturing delays
Product certifications delays
Meeting international regulations
International shipping delays
By eliminating potential problems we aim to focus on them to avoid any improper delays.  Vigo Motorcycle come with two years warranty period. Warranty covers both driving and electrical components. Manufacturing warranty extension is not currently provided. Software related issues are not covered by the warranty but free software updates will be provided to all owners.The battery manufacturer provides a 5 year warranty coverage for the battery pack. If the motorcycle battery degrades more than 6% within the warranty period it will be replaced or repaired free of charge. We also guarantee that the battery will not loose more than 20% of its capacity within 250 000 miles if this occurs the battery will be replaced or repaired free of charge.  Vigo Motorcycles will be sold through local dealers. Due to the fact that it takes a time to organize a good, structured dealership network pre-ordered motorcycles will be delivered directly to our customers straight from our factory.From 2018 we will begin to build both a local and  an international dealership network. We will have official dealers as well as certified service centers in different countries. The following countries have the priority above others, due to their electric motorcycle demand (UK, Netherlands, France, Germany, Portugal, Spain, Italy, Sweden, Norway). We'll try our best to organize a dealership network before production starts.  If you interested in becoming a dealer - please send  dealership email request.  Service and maintenance is an essential aspect we have to work on thus our aim is to provide a convenient service to our customers. Our officials will certify service centers in different countries.The live service centers database will be automatically uploaded to you motorcycle memory and will be automatically updated regularly. If something goes wrong, your motorcycle and your phone application will provide you the closest service center address.   Will it be possible to claim "Plug-in car, motorcycle and van grant" during the purchase?Vigo Motorcycles aims is to cooperate with the the UK government in order to meet eligibility criteria for this grant. We're also hoping that by 2019 this scheme will still be available to UK customers. We try our best to meet eligibility criteria before the official lunch date.More information regarding "Plug-in car, motorcycle and van grant" can be found on the government website. For EU customers please refer to your local government or to European Automobile Manufacturers Association publications to overview governments incentives in your country.How are you going to deliver the motorcycle?Additional delivery charge of £200 will be applied to all UK customers. If you are an international customer, our sales team will offer you the best available delivery method to your country. Additional delivery charges will be applied to all international deliveries.Will it be possible to have a test ride prior the delivery?The very first test wide will be provided to a limited amount of people (pledge to be among them). The aim of this is to gain customer feedback and to make final amendments to the motorcycle prior production begins.After that test rides will be provided by the local dealers.Is it possible to cancel my pre-order?Absolutely, you can cancel it at anytime. The reservation deposit is fully refundable.How is it possible that you have achieved up to 400 miles range which nobody else couldn't?Currently motorcycle manufacturers use inadequate lithium-ion batteries which are heavy and expensive. In our motorcycle we are going to use a new battery technology which gives much higher battery density, lower weight and higher loading and unloading speeds.Please note: the weight load, speed, adaptive braking ratio and other factors might gradually reduce the overall range of the motorcycle.Do you have a plan to manufacture different motorcycle types in the future?Absolutely. We're also aiming to manufacture classic/naked style type as well as tourer version in the future.What driver licence do you I have to have to ride a Vigo Motorcycle?A full motorcycle driver licence (Category A) is required to be able to ride a Vigo Motorcycle, because the power output of our motorcycle is more than 15 kW. Further information regarding driver licence requirements provided here.Can I ride this motorcycle with a provisional licence and CBT?Unfortunately not. This is because the power output of this motorcycle is more than 15 kW, you will need to have a full motorcycle driver licence (Category A) to be able to ride it.We aim to manufacture a CBT compatible version in the future.Which type of charging connection Vigo Motorcycle use?Although CHAdeMO is used for a prototype model the production model might have a different charging connection.  We are still looking into this.Do I need to fully discharge the battery and only then charge it again?No. You don't have to fully discharge the battery. The battery doesn't have a memory issues hence you can charge it anytime by demand.How are you doing to perform a software update?The Vigo Motorcycle comes with an embedded 3G Module. This module will allow you to have remote control of your vehicle, get live information about its status, share access to your vehicle with your friends and relatives, track your vehicle,  and other features.Due to this module built-in motorcycle software will be periodically remotely updated so you don't have to even attend a service center.How does Voice Control work?A special voice control unit will be sold separately. This unit will be paired to your motorcycle GPS tracking system and allow you to use voice commands to set your required destination. Are you going to provide a motorbike finance?Motorcycle finance will be provided to all pre-ordered motorcycles. Currently no agreements has been signed between us and any finance company, thus we can't provide exact terms and interest rates. We do want to provide the most exclusive interest rates and repayment plans for our customers.Vigo motorcycles purchased through any dealers will have to rely on the dealer's finance company.Where will Vigo Motorcycles be made?Final manufacturing facility for Vigo Motorcycles will be organized in Cambridge, United Kingdom. Overall 6 different countries will be involved in the production of components for this motorcycle.

story:
We want to make sure you are protected and taken care of incase of an accident. Thanks to Cosmo's integrated App, emergency responders are notified seconds after your helmet hits the ground with your medical history and emergency contacts included. Cosmo is here to put you, your family & friends at ease, while you conquer the open road!

Motorcyclists and bikers are often overlooked on the road, leaving you at danger of being hit by other cars. Cosmo Connected, detachable rear brake light helmet accessory, is here to provide you with an easy solution to protect yourself on the road.

 
  • Rear Brake Light - Shines bright red to indicate the deceleration of a motorcycle driver.
  • Advanced Accelerometer & Gyrometer - Our state of the art accelerometer and gyrometer technology is extremely accurate and will ensure quick readings.
  • Smartphone Integrated App - The Cosmo smartphone app will automatically notify emergency responders as well as your preselected contacts when an accident is detected.

 

  • Laurent: "I can't wait to be able to start using this connected stoplight on my helmet ! Sounds like a great new personal safety device for motorcycle riders !" - Facebook @CosmoConnected
  • Arnaud: "Thank you for the link my girlfriend and my parents absolutely want me to buy one because they are always afraid that I have an accident and that nobody see me fall is really a great product that can save my life and that of Full of other biker congrats to you" - Facebook @CosmoConnected
  • Florian: "This is very smart. I support this project that makes biking/cycling much safer" - Twitter @CosmoConnected
  • Natacha: "Congrats Cosmo team,y'all deserve it !! Wishing you an international ride with this business project. Can't wait to see your progress and your coming to the market" - Kickstarter @CosmoConnected

Shines bright red to indicate the deceleration of a motorcycle driver.

Easily snaps on any helmet.

Mimicking the brake light of a car, Cosmo shines bright red when riders decelerate.

When you decelerate, Cosmo lights up red, warning anyone behind you that you are coming to a stop or you are slowing down. This allows riders to be more visible in all weather conditions.  

The Cosmo flashes red in warning mode, notifying those on the road that you are there.

If your bike breaks down or you are stuck in traffic, you can set the Cosmo to "warning mode" via the smartphone application.

If you happen to fall or get into an accident and your helmet hits the ground, Cosmo automatically starts blinking red, notifying drivers that you are on the ground and you need help.

Accurate sensors detect the speed and deceleration of the rider.

The deceleration of the rider is known via the accelerometer of the product. The light goes on upon deceleration, even if the rider does not press the brake of the vehicle (by releasing the accelerator or by retrograde).

The gyrometer detects the rate of change of angles undergone by the helmet around 3 axes. The electronic signatures of these movements, coupled with those of the accelerometer, make it possible to detect a fall.

BLE technology allows for quick communication with your smartphone.

Cosmo communicates with the biker's smartphone in Bluetooth® Low Energy to maximize the autonomy of the Cosmo Connected product and the biker's smartphone.

Cosmo is equipped with a 900mAh Lithium Ion rechargeable battery.

The battery offers an autonomy of 5h to 8h of continuous use and 5 to 7 days of standby. Cosmo can be charged using the supplied micro-USB cable, approximately once a week, depending on the intended use. 

An app built to increase user personal safety and save lives.

The Cosmo app is packed with features that decrease the time it takes to call emergency responders and notify loved ones of an accident.

Automatically notify emergency responders and contacts.

Preprogram your medical history into the app so that emergency responders know exactly what to expect when they arrive. Also your emergency contacts will be notified of the accident via text message.

Cosmo automatically detects accidents and takes action.

 If the device detects the driver’s fall, it will warn the app through the Bluetooth® connection and automatically alert an emergency roadside assistance platform that will try to reach the driver. 

If the driver is unresponsive, the operator will call rescue within 3 minutes and sends first responders the GPS coordinates, along with the medical profile of the driver.

Magnetic snap secure design makes connecting Cosmo quick and easy.

We worked with the best designers and engineers to create an efficient, easy to use, reliable product that works in all weather conditions when it is most important. With Cosmo Connected, you’ll be seen on the road despite rain, fog, or snow.

Swap Cosmo between helmets with the magnetic base.

The magnetic base is positioned on the back of the helmet with a pre-installed double-sided adhesive. Simply place the double-sided adhesive to your helmet, let it sit for 8 hours to guarantee strong adhesion, clip and unclip your Cosmo as needed for charging or easy storing. 

Magnetic Helmet Bases (Adhesive Included)

Cosmo is designed to detach from your helmet in the case of a crash to maintain the structural integrity of your helmet for utmost protection. 

We worked with the best designers and engineers to create an efficient, easy to use, reliable product that works in all weather conditions. We also work to develop new products to become a specialist in personal and professional safety via a range of connected devices & applications.

New applications of its technology on other vehicles and for other uses will soon be unveiled by Cosmo Connected. 

The safety accessory developed by Cosmo Connected, can be used in a variety of different situations: biking, skiing, horseback riding, extreme sports...as well as in the professional world where dangerous situations are commonplace (construction, policing, the handling of heavy equipment, deliveries, etc.) 

  • Elium Studio: Founded in 2002, Elium studio is an award winning design agency that applies signature design to industrial design and has received 14 awards at the last CES Show in Las Vegas, for work performed with start-ups, multinational corporations, publishers and luxury brands like Withings, Panasonic, L’Oréal, Lexon, or Seiko.
  • ESV Digital: Founded in 2004, ESV Digital is a consulting agency for strategy and digital performance, specializing in collection, analysis and data processing to improve the marketing performance of its customers. In 2016, ESV Digital was elected as 2016 Media Agency of the Year for Innovation in the category Pure Player category.
  • Wemanity: Founded in 2013, Wemanity’s purpose is to design products and services of the future, by uniting technological skills and social innovation.  It is a major partner of our team as it experiments with all aspects of connected objects, robotics and Big Data.
  • Defond: Founded in 1978, Defond is a highly reputable supplier of components for home appliances and various industrial applications. It provides one-stop solutions to global companies with sophisticated technical and quality requirements.
  • Arrk Europe: ARRK’s prototyping centres fulfil local demand and also work together as a team to share capacity, expertise and material options to ensure they meet our global customers’ requirements.

Created in 2015 Cosmo Connected has been co-founded by Romain Afflelou (Chairman & Major Shareholder) and Frédéric Metge (CEO & Partner), who's bringing financial, industrial, and distribution expertise to the business. Pauline Conan has joined the team in May 2016 as Marketing Projects Manager.

Laurent de Bernède, joined Cosmo in 2017 as COO and he is in charge of product development and manufacturing, R&D, and international business development for the Americas, Asia and Australia. 

Two new engineers have just joined to team to work on Cosmo Connected new developments.

See You Soon! ;-)

story:
Latest

Thanks guys for supporting us with our new and innovative CARVON EXO Pro Electric Longboard. To show our appreciation to all of you, we will include an extra battery pack with your board.

 

 

Some great riding videos of the CARVON EXO Pro.

 

CARVON EXO, along with the CARVON EVO, at the SoCal Performance Day 2 Event.

 

 

The CARVON EXO with red wheels. Sleek, premium components, versatile and powerful. We are CARVON, and we welcome you to our elite CARVON Team. Get ready to get your carve ON! 

 

CARVON EXO now has a Landyachtz Ten Two Four deck and comes with both head and tail lights from Shredlights. The new deck improves ride-feel and control because of the more aggressive concave and rocker shape compared to the rather flat-ish original deck. Shredlights illuminates the road just ahead of you and improves your visibility to others when riding at night. 

 

A short video of the Demo/Test ride at Santa Monica. Featured CARVON EXO, EVO 2WD and 4WD, Raptor 1 with CARVON V3 SpeedDrives, an Ivoryboard and a DIY board.

 

 

 

The CARVON EXO can now be equipped with 100mm MBS All-Terrain Longboard wheels (optional). This means you can ride your EXO on dirt and have some drifting and sliding fun. Having choices on which wheels to use is a great and exclusive feature of the Inline Direct-Drive EXO. It is truly a versatile machine.

 

 

Read what others are saying about CARVON EXO

                            

 

 

 

Get Your Carve ON!

 

CARVON has been at the forefront of the Electric Skateboard and Longboard revolution. We are skaters first and foremost, then technology-innovators second. Since 2015, our Hub Motors kit have long been popular with the Electric Skateboard DIY crowd, like the A2ESK8 Squad pictured above. We have a lot of positive feedbacks from the internet forums. Our CARVON EVO with our exclusive Dual Inline Direct-Drive V4 SpeedDrive motors, pictured above, is the fastest production board. Below is a video from Youtuber Esk8 Vegas reaching 38 mph on it.

 

 

 

 

New CARVON V4 TorqueDrive Motors

 

Bigger Motors For More Torque

 

 

The all-new CARVON V4 TorqueDrive motors is the latest edition to our Inline Direct-Drive family. They are not hub motors. They are not positioned inside the wheels. They are positioned next to the wheels, so that the whole structure of the wheel is maintained. Experience has taught us that having full and thick urethane wheels is better in terms of the ride quality and long-term durability of the motors. It also allowed us, not only to swap wheels for different colors, but also enables the use of different wheel brands. Just say "NO!" to thin urethane...unless they are used only to protect the motors from occasional road rock hits and not as a full-time, load-bearing wheel.

 

​

 

 

 

The All-New CARVON EXO

 

CARVON Innovation at Affordable Price

 

Introducing the CARVON EXO. With the EXO, we have put our knowledge and experience into producing an Electric Longboard that rides better and last longer even on bad city roads. It's the perfect commuter board and with a price that everyone can agree on. We put our innovative V4 TorqueDrive motors on a drop-through deck that is reinforced with a stiff composite layer on the bottom. This results in a board that is comfortable to ride but stiff enough to not bend the electrical connections. We also chose a system where you can easily swap battery packs, so the range is only limited by the extra packs that you carry. The EXO turns the concept of internal and unaccessible components inside out, putting the components externally...hence the name "EXO".

 

 

The CARVON EXO, along with the CARVON EVO, are the only two Direct-Drive (1:1 gear ratio) Electric Skateboards/Longboards that uses real ABEC 11 Flywheels (optional upgrade). Other Direct-Drive E-boards use blank or clone wheels and their hub/in-wheel motors themselves use only thin urethane. This means that the CARVON EXO, while being affordable, can have premium components and a superb ride-quality comparable to that of more expensive E-boards. Because at the end of the day, we believe in only one thing..."it's all about the ride".

 

 

 

CARVON EXO Tech Specs

 

  • Up To 24 mph Top Speed and Up To 24% Hill Climb Ability
  • Up To 14 Miles of Range (weight, riding style and environment dependent)
  • V4 TorqueDrive Inline Dual Direct Drive Brushless Hub Motor 350W*2
  • 97mm Blank PU Wheels 78A or  97mm ABEC 11 Flywheels (optional)
  • 100mm MBS All-Terrain Longboard Wheels (optional) can also be used
  • 36V 5500mAh/198WH 18650 Li-Ion Battery with 1000 Charging Cycle
  • Slide Drop-Through Maple Deck with Composite Reinforcement Bottom
  • 2-3 hrs Charge Time, AC110V-240V 1.5A Input with DC42V Max Output Charger
  • 90*25*13cm /36*10*5 in Deck Size, 7.7 kg / 17 lbs Weight
  • Bluetooth Low-Energy Remote Control
  • Electronic Regenerative Braking
  • 130kg / 286 lbs Max Load

 

 

Assembled in USA

 

Final assembly of the CARVON EXO will be done in the USA. This is to ensure that we only send you boards that have passed our strict quality control. Having built and ridden a lot of Electric Skateboards and Longboards, we believe that by now, most of the problems with E-boards are mechanical, not electrical. That's why each EXO will be inspected by a skater, not just someone who only knows electronics. It's time to put back more of the "Skateboard" in Electric Skateboards.

 

EXO Warranty and CARVON Customer Support

 

CARVON EXO will have an automatic 7 days free-trial, money-back guarantee upon receiving the board, and customers will not be charged for any re-stocking fee.  We just ask that customers pay for the return shipping and return the board without any substantial use. Otherwise, a substantial-use fee will be assessed and deducted from the refund amount, value of which will be at our discretion. Standard industry warranty applies. Additionally, an EXO will have a six month warranty for the electronics (not including the battery life) and one year warranty for the board's hardware. Electronics include the whole motors, ESC, battery pack and remote control. Board's hardware includes the axle, hanger, baseplate, deck, bolts, nuts, screws, spacers and washers. Wear and tear items are not warrantied and include grip tape, wheels, drive-wheel inserts, bearings, bushings and pivot cups.

 

 

Part of the funds raised will also be used to create a team of customer support specialists that will be available to answer calls during office hours. This team will also setup group rides and CARVON events so that you will have a chance to meet them in person. We definitely want to be out there riding with you guys and getting feedback from your boards. Please support us with your and tell your family and friends about our campaign. You guys are awesome, thank you!

LatestThanks guys for supporting us with our new and innovative CARVON EXO Pro Electric Longboard. To show our appreciation to all of you, we will include an extra battery pack with your board.  Some great riding videos of the CARVON EXO Pro. CARVON EXO, along with the CARVON EVO, at the SoCal Performance Day 2 Event.  The CARVON EXO with red wheels. Sleek, premium components, versatile and powerful. We are CARVON, and we welcome you to our elite CARVON Team. Get ready to get your carve ON!  CARVON EXO now has a Landyachtz Ten Two Four deck and comes with both head and tail lights from Shredlights. The new deck improves ride-feel and control because of the more aggressive concave and rocker shape compared to the rather flat-ish original deck. Shredlights illuminates the road just ahead of you and improves your visibility to others when riding at night.  A short video of the Demo/Test ride at Santa Monica. Featured CARVON EXO, EVO 2WD and 4WD, Raptor 1 with CARVON V3 SpeedDrives, an Ivoryboard and a DIY board.   The CARVON EXO can now be equipped with 100mm MBS All-Terrain Longboard wheels (optional). This means you can ride your EXO on dirt and have some drifting and sliding fun. Having choices on which wheels to use is a great and exclusive feature of the Inline Direct-Drive EXO. We are skaters first and foremost, then technology-innovators second. Since 2015, our Hub Motors kit have long been popular with the Electric Skateboard DIY crowd, like the A2ESK8 Squad pictured above. We have a lot of positive feedbacks from the internet forums. Our CARVON EVO with our exclusive Dual Inline Direct-Drive V4 SpeedDrive motors, pictured above, is the fastest production board. Below is a video from Youtuber Esk8 Vegas reaching 38 mph on it. 
 
 
 
New CARVON V4 TorqueDrive Motors
 
Bigger Motors For More Torque


 
 
The all-new CARVON V4 TorqueDrive motors is the latest edition to our Inline Direct-Drive family. They are not hub motors. They are not positioned inside the wheels. They are positioned next to the wheels, so that the whole structure of the wheel is maintained. Experience has taught us that having full and thick urethane wheels is better in terms of the ride quality and long-term durability of the motors. It also allowed us, not only to swap wheels for different colors, but also enables the use of different wheel brands. Just say "NO!" to thin urethane...unless they are used only to protect the motors from occasional road rock hits and not as a full-time, load-bearing wheel.
 

​
 
 
 
The All-New CARVON EXO
 
CARVON Innovation at Affordable Price


 
Introducing the CARVON EXO. With the EXO, we have put our knowledge and experience into producing an Electric Longboard that rides better and last longer even on bad city roads. It's the perfect commuter board and with a price that everyone can agree on. We put our innovative V4 TorqueDrive motors on a drop-through deck that is reinforced with a stiff composite layer on the bottom. This results in a board that is comfortable to ride but stiff enough to not bend the electrical connections. We also chose a system where you can easily swap battery packs, so the range is only limited by the extra packs that you carry. The EXO turns the concept of internal and unaccessible components inside out, putting the components externally...hence the name "EXO".
 


 
The CARVON EXO, along with the CARVON EVO, are the only two Direct-Drive (1:1 gear ratio) Electric Skateboards/Longboards that uses real ABEC 11 Flywheels (optional upgrade). Because at the end of the day, we believe in only one thing..."it's all about the ride".
