See the FAQ below for more details

Santa Monica, CA Demo Day by ElectricBikeReview.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Storm Sondors is a humble man with much success in his life that not many know about… Storm lives a simple life, enjoys the outdoors, the ocean, traveling but an off the grid in a sense lifestyle. Not much for computers or cell phones…just the great outdoors.

Storm envisioned the bike after he suffered an accident that temporarily limited his mobility that affected his outdoors/ beach way of life.

Being an avid surfer since he was a child, Storm still finds the time to surf regularly. During the period of his immobility, Storm needed a way to get down to the beach without complicating his injury. As it turns out, Storm’s professional background includes industrial design and lived in Hong Kong for years.

Did you know, many of those little McDonald's toys that you used to get in your Happy Meal were designed and prototyped by Storm for years?

Storm developed the idea of the eBike to get him back to the ocean and into the water by sourcing the needed items to make it for himself through his extensive network of manufacturers in Asia and throughout the world.

With a name like Storm Sondors, it only seemed right to name the bike after him.

Where We Plan to go

With the amazing outpouring of support over the past few days, we now have the opportunity to do some great things.

Charity

We would like to align ourselves with a few charities that help people get to and from where they need to go. Do you guys have any ideas of some great ones? Possibly a Veteran’s organization, as we have had many comments about how the eBike could help them out.

Demo Day

For any of you that live in the Southern California region, we would like to set up a demo day. See the Sondors eBike in action for yourself! Possible locations could be San Diego, Santa Monica and Santa Barbara.

You all had the same questions about the eBike… Have a look below at the most common ones:

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

 

MISCELLANEOUS

What is the bike in the video?

The bike in the video (yellow/ green bike) is the prototype.

Why is everybody stand-up riding on the bike in the video?

Those are action shots and we wanted to convey how exhilarating the ride is!  Check out TechCrunch's review video for video with someone sitting down on it.

You mention Storm’s background is industrial design? What is it?

Industrial design is a process of design applied to products that are to be manufactured through techniques of mass production. Its key characteristic is that design is separated from manufacture: the creative act of determining and defining a product's form takes place in advance of the physical act of making a product, which consists purely of repeated, often automated, replication. The role of an industrial designer is to create and execute design solutions for problems of form, usability, physical ergonomics, marketing, brand development, and sales. Industrial designers don't usually design motors, electrical circuits, or gearing that make machines move, but they may affect technical aspects through usability design and form relationships.

 

USAGE & ACCESSORIES

How is the bike on handling uphill terrain?
Performance on hills depends on the steepness of the hill and the weight load on the bike. In some instances, people will need to use both the pedal and the motor to go uphill.

What’s the maximum weight limit?
We've tested the bike up to 250lbs, we cannot make any guarantees about performance or durability above that weight.

How high can the seat extend?
The seat can extend a full 12”. This put it 42 inches off the ground.

What is the frame size?
The frame is 44" from axle to axle.  78" tire to tire.

How much does the bike weigh?

The bike weighs approximately 49lbs without the battery.

How much does the battery weigh?
The battery weighs approximately 6lbs.

What are the battery specifications?

36-volt 9ah (approximately) Lithium - Ion battery is designed for long running time. Batteries can be charged hundreds of times without noticeable loss in capacity. Detailed Product Description: 36V 8.8Ah Lithium Ion Bottle E Bike Battery Packs: Specification: Model: Li18650-10S4P Volt: 36V Capacity: 8.8Ah Standard Charge: 1.76A Continuous Charge: 4.4A Max. Continuous Discharge: 8.8A Size: 91*335mm Operating Temp.: -20~+60deg C Including Battery Cells, BMS, Charger and Aluminum Case | Top quality battery, no memory effect, high energy density, long lifecycle. | Electric/Pedal assist range up to 35-50 miles (rider weight and terrain contingent) | Under Electric Power Range - up to 20 miles (rider weight and terrain contingent)

Is there a rear-splash guard option? Is there a back-tire rack option? 
That option is currently not available through us. This bike has standard frame qualities making it easy to modify with aftermarket products, including splash guards and rear racks.

Can I replace the parts on the bike?

Sure. We had a few different options for the parts that we decided to move forward with. The decision to select these parts come down to price, availability at scale and quality. It is entirely up to you on what parts you would like to use. Replace them at will.

I have seen the wheels on a bike before at my local bike shop, can I buy those if I pop a tire?

Absolutely. The Sondors eBike uses parts that are already on existing bikes on the market. The bike parts can be found online, or on other bikes so they are commercially available. This is ultimately what allows us to produce the bike at a lower cost.

Is this a single speed bike? Can you limit it to 10MPH for off-roading?
We do not currently have any speed limiting options. Pedal power is on a single freewheel gear, as it was designed to receive motor assistance.

Is there speed monitoring/digital display on the bike? 
There is no built-in digital display/speedometer, but the bike will work with any aftermarket speed monitors.

Is there a key/interlock to prevent accidental starting? 
There is no interlock currently. However the throttle will not start until one presses a button to activate the motor.

Will a standard U-Lock fit around the wider frame? 
This varies depending on the type of lock, and the type of U-Lock that you use, but in general it will work with most consumer bike locks. Remember that the center portion of the frame is utilized for the battery compartment so all frame related locking would be through the back wheel and frame which is ideal in most cases. 

 

LEGAL/WHERE CAN IT NOT BE USED

Can this be used in NYC? 
At this current time, there are laws and restrictions on eBikes in NYC and the State of New York. To be safe please check with your local authorities as these types of regulations change frequently.

Do you have to wear a helmet?

As with any bicycle, safety should be paramount. We would recommend wearing a helmet, even if your state laws does not require it. Sondors eBike is not responsible for injuries, please be safe while you ride.

 

PAYMENT & SHIPPING

Can it be picked up locally in LA? 
At this point in time we are not offering local pick up.

How do I pick the color?

After the campaign, we’ll reach out to everyone and have you select the color choice.

Can it be financed/multiple payments? 
We're proud to announce an "Easy-Pay" option where for $199 you can reserve your bike now and then pay the remaining balance at the end of the campaign. You can select this option under the "Reserve Now, Pay Later" perk.

Will the cost of shipping go down? 
No. The current cost is $194 for US shipping and $247 for International.

 

 

COST/ MANUFACTURING

Why is the price so low for the Sondors eBike compared to competition?

Storm Sondors is 100% committed to creating the first affordable eBike. Most options on the market now are far more expensive, limiting the ability for everyday people to have the opportunity to have. He hopes this is the electronic bike for the masses.

How can you keep the eBike’s cost so low?

This goes back to Storm’s experience. Having had years of experience in sourcing and manufacturing, we can keep cost low based on volume. Keep in mind, all those happy meal toys were designed and prototype to be cost effective by Storm Sondors. That is volume…that experience is how we keep our price low.

How is the eBike built?

The Sondors eBike is manufactured using all existing parts to keep cost low. Storm has carefully sourced manufacturers throughout the world in order to keep prices low, while ensuring quality.

Can Sondors eBike handle the volume of bikes?

Yes. The more bikes the better. This will allow us to reduce the overall cost of the bike and the shipping cost directly to you. Our sourcing and manufacturing partners are world class. Storm has been working with them for decades.

How many eBikes can you deliver?

Storm Sondors is confident that we can deliver between 12,000-14,000 eBikes in a first production run. This is based on our quality control process of testing each bike before it is shipped. Should we have demand for over these numbers, we will likely need to schedule a second production run to accommodate the volume.

 

SUPPORT

Will replacement parts be available at local shops/manufacturers? 

Tires can be purchased off-the-shelf. We do not currently have a list of local shops but in the future we will provide a list of parts that are recommended as replacements.

Can I get a refund?

According to Indiegogo, contributions are non-refundable in their Terms of Use. There will be no refunds as all funds go immediately to
manufacturing.

How much will replacement tires/wheels cost? 
Replacement wheels retail for between $50 to $80. In the future, we hope to start an online store to fulfill these items for you.

Will there be a network of authorized Sondors eBike dealers? 
Eventually we hope to have authorized dealers, but we do not currently have a list of local shops. 

*Up to 50 Miles With Pedal Assist

story:
The Swytch eBike conversion kit allows you to easily turn your everyday bike into an electric bike, regardless of your wheel size or brake type.

 

 

Available in all standard wheel sizes including 16”, 20“ 24” 26”, 27.5”, 700C, 29er as well as a range of other sizes on request. Basically, if you want it, we can make it happen! 

 

 

 

 

 

Entirely waterproof the Swytch pack includes a 25 or 50 mile range battery, an integrated power LCD controller, front bicycle light and carry strap. With Swytch, you can remove the power pack to charge the battery, transition from traditional bike to eBike.

 

 

 

Swytch is 50% lighter than mid-drive (crank assist) electric bike systems, with the same power. The Swytch System can power you up to 20mph for up to 50 miles at a time, adding only a few pounds to your bike.

 

 

 

 

 

Swytch 250W motor has a top speed of 20mph with a range of 25 or 50 miles. Available in all standard wheel sizes including 16”, 20“ 24” 26”, 27.5”, 700C, 29er as well as a range of other sizes on request. Basically, if you want it, we can make it happen! 

 

The Swytch 250W motor has a top speed of 20mph with a max range of either 25 or 50 miles. This motor is Brompton Compatible and also available for other 16" and 20" (Dahon forks) folding bikes.

 

The Swytch 350-500W motor has a top speed of 30mph with a max range of 50 miles approximately 30 miles range when used at constant full power, approximately 75 miles range when used at constant low power. You can select your power mode and top speed after selecting the High Power Perk.

Why did you begin by crowdfunding?​ We wanted to make a difference, faster, by making electric transport more affordable and accessible. Where is Swytch manufactured?​ The Swytch system is designed and developed in the UK, and manufactured by a trusted network of suppliers and OEMs in Taiwan and China.
Is this legal in my country? ​ Yes! The kit conforms to EU standards which are more stringent than any other country we have checked. If you are unsure, please check your countries legislation.
Do I need a license to ride with Swytch? ​ No. The Swytch system is 100% road legal without a license.

How much is shipping?

 Shipping is free for UK, EU and USA. Please check for other countries.

How much does the Swytch kit weigh? It varies depending on your kit! Please check the technical specifications above.
How far can I go on one full charge? We have two different kits! A 25 mile kit and a 50 mile kit.
What is the charging time? On average, 10 miles per hour of charge. Full charge is reached in about 3 hours for the 25 mile kit.
What is the maximum gradient it can handle? 32% - steeper than the steepest street in San francisco (Filbert Street)!

Rim brakes: Yes

Disc brakes: Yes

Hydraulic brakes: Yes

Integrated hub brakes: No (they will need to be changed before using Swytch)

What is the warranty? All Swytch kits have a standard 1 year warranty.

story:
Short Summary

  My name is Benjamin, I've been a associated and riding with Mike since around 2000 here in eastern North Carolina. This campaign's focus is on giving back to Mike what he has provided to so many others, it as sad to see such a fun loving person struggle so much after an unfortunate accident. Through your contributions we can overhaul Mike's BMW so that he can once again enjoy a reliable and fun ride. No matter how big or how small it may be, every little bit counts and the more we can raise the more we can do for Mike and his family.

  Obviously the focus of this is to restore Mike's BMW to a showroom finish, possibly some upgrades depending on how much we can raise. Anything above what it takes to get it on the road again will go directly to Mike and his family to help them recover from these years of hardship. If you are familiar with what happened to Mike, the accident in Kershaw and it's aftermath, you know how drastic a change they have suffered through.

   Donations are not the only way that you can help us make a big difference in a deserving person's life, if you can't afford to give, passing this along is just as valuble. Thank you for taking your time to read this and we look forward to hearing from everyone.

story:
Dave Penny - Home Makeover!

My name is Ken Rounds a member of "Give me a Mountain" a Christian Men's ministry (approx.  50+ men representing over a dozen churches) serving the needs of our community in Simcoe County Ontario Canada.  The purpose of this ministry is to provide a muscular demonstration of God's love by coming along side local churches to help meet the needs in the community.  These men offer their time and talents to help those who cannot help themselves.

Dave Penny recently moved  from a subsidized housing unit to a house that he could afford, in order to make a better life for his son David (9). The house is in need of many improvements; especially those needed to accommodate Dave's wheel chair.  His muscles continue to degenerate from the Muscular Dystrophy.  Dave had hoped to be able to do some of the improvements himself, but unfortunately does not have the strength and ability any longer to do it. 

Our goal is to raise enough money to do a complete a home makeover for Dave and David.  Our men skilled as project managers and carpenters have estimated the improvements to exceed $15,000 for inside house upgrades. The upgrades and improvements are not intended to be extravagant but comfortable and a blessing to this family. Once weather warms up, then the exterior improvements will be made. It is our desire to steward the money responsibly. As the money starts coming in the men will meet at Dave's house on Saturdays and systematically upgrade all the rooms, ramps outside, roof etc. to make a comfortable home where Dave will spend the rest of his life. Dave accepts the present reality of being in the wheelchair and also the fact that this disease will continue to deteriorate his muscles and organs over time.

This is our second project, but is much more expensive than our first one which saw 50 men over 5 different days put on new siding, dry wall, taping, painting, install a new closet, re-insulate the attic, replace ceiling tiles upgraded the electrical service plus  much more for a marginalized couple.  

If it is within your ability to help to give Dave get a leg up to a better life for his remaining days we would ask you kindly to consider a donation for this single dad, who desires nothing more than to be the best dad he can for his son.  

Please feel free to support this project and others.  www.givemeamountain.org

story:
Introduction

Crime happens on a daily base and we are all subject to its various forms. It is impossible for victims to call authorities for help, while handling an emergency situation. Any attempt to call for help during an emergency situation may result in serious consequences. 


 What's iHelp

iHelp is an emergency response system that activate by recognizing user's voice in emergency situations. 

 

 

App Details

The app is activated by voice recognition when user speaks the word "Ihelp", or
an alternate pre-programmed phrase. Upon activation, the application immediately queries the Global Positioning System (GPS) to acquire location information, then records that information. The application acquires the appropriate emergency dispatch number based on the acquired location information, places a cellular telephone call to emergency services, creates a recording of the situation, and transmits a pre-recorded or generated voice message in the appropriate local language, providing the user's location information.

 All recordings, and data acquired or created by the application are transmitted to and stored within a database, maintained on the server of iHelp’s managing entity, and available for retrieval.

Any attempt to deactivate the application after its activation will require a password. Thus an attacker or other unauthorized person cannot disable the application.


Why iHelp

iHelp provide services for users anywhere in the world. The app stores all emergency numbers across the world, and communicates with authorities using the local language of that region. 


 iHelp Subscription Prices

- One month Subscription: $5. 

- One year subscription: $49. 

- Two years subscription: $69. 

- Lifetime subscription: $149. Exclusive only to this Campaign and includes     unlimited data storage. Subscribers will also receive a one day theme park ticket for Disneyland, valued at $99.


 All funding will go towards the completion of developing the iHelp App.

story:
• CHECK OUT OUR INDIEGOGO UPDATES TO SEE HOW YOU CAN EARN CASHBACK, REFUNDS, OR PHATMOTO FOR FREE WITH OUR THANK YOU PROGRAM

 

Phatmoto: Gas Bike

Limited Quantity at $499

 

​

Phatmoto is the affordable all-in-one motorized bike that eliminates the complexities with engine conversion kits.

 

​

 

Our pre-built, custom designed gas bike can be pedal or engine powered and travels up to 100 miles at speeds of 25mph on less than 1 gallon of gas.

Far from your standard motorized gas-hybrid bike, Phatmoto hides quite a bit of convenient engineering features within traditional bike frame appearance...

 

​

 

 

An All-In-One Motorized Gas Bike

With Phatmoto's fully-equipped motorized bicycle, attach the handlebars and front wheel, and with some minimal engine assembly, put in some gas and you're off.

Play 30 sec feature demo above⮥

 

①

Pedal, Gas Motor, or Hybrid Power

Unlike many DIY conversion kits or electric bikes, Phatmoto was specifically engineered as a dual purpose gas-hybrid bike that makes it significantly easier to ride when pedaling alone and doesn't restrict the engine when under gas power.

 

②

Custom Engineered Bike Frame

Unlike many DIY gas bike conversion kits, Phatmoto's bicycle frame is engineered from the ground up to discreetly hide its fuel tank internally, securely bolts its motor to built-in frame mount, and safely encases the drivetrain to avoid accidents.

 

③

Easy Pull-Start Handle Engine

Unlike most DIY gas bike conversion kits using two-stroke engines that require vigorous pedaling turn on, Phatmoto opted for a four-stroke engine with a simple pull-start handle and on/off switch for quick and effortless riding.

 

 

 

How It Works

check out our updates.

 

​

Check out our easy to use pre-order instructions and a cool way we created to say thank you to everyone with cash rewards to earn discounts on your purchase.

 

Indiegogo Update #1

Earn Cashback with Phatmoto Thank You Rewards Program

After many requests, we created two options that will hopefully make it easier to take advantage of our pre-order discounts with a step-by-step walkthrough for placing your pre-order. that we are offering on Indiegogo.

  • CLICK HERE TO SEE UPDATE #1

 

Indiegogo Update #2

What Is Indiegogo, Two Payment Options, and How To Pre-Order

With a few simple button clicks, you can use Indiegogo's built-in tracking system to share our Indiegogo Campaign and earn free shipping, get a partial refund back, or earn your Phatmoto Gas Bike for free.

  • CLICK HERE TO SEE UPDATE #2

 

 

Got Any Questions for Us?

CLICK HERE TO SEND US MESSAGE

 

*Continue on down to see Phatmoto features in detail

 

 

Gas Bike Engine

that's powerful and efficient.

 

​

When we set out to design our all-in-one motorized bike with Phatmoto, we wanted it to be powerful, easy to use, and have the option to ride wherever.

 

 

Slim Four-Stroke Gas Engine

Phatmoto's motor safely and securely fastens to its custom engineered frame mount to eliminate DIY brackets, loosening from vibration, and conceals wires.

​

Phatmoto's 79cc OHV (see details in tech specs) 4-Stroke gas bike engine with automatic clutch allows anyone to travel up to 100 miles at speeds of 25mph on less than a gallon of gas.

  • Fuel Efficient — Averaging roughly 133 miles per gallon, Phatmoto travels over 100+ miles on 3/4th of a gallon of gas.
  • Fuel Usage — Four stroke gas motor operates on regular gas with zero oil/gas mixing like a cheaper two-stroke
  • Slim Design — At a maximum of 12 inches wide, Phatmoto's engine sits comfortably between your legs.

 

 

Easy Pull-Start Gas Bike Engine

Phatmoto's pull handle to start and push button off allows for easy engine use.

Unlike two-stroke bike engines that require vigorous pedaling and clutch dropping to start, Phatmoto has opted for a much simpler four-stroke pull start handle for added convenience.

In addition, Phatmoto's handlebar off switch quickly kills the motor with the push of a button that allows us to enclose the hot motor and eliminate touching.

  • Centrifugal Clutch — Four stroke motor with auto-clutch eliminates pedaling for speed and clutch popping to start.
  • On/Off Switch — Handlebar throttle and kill switch make powering up and shutting down Phatmoto easy.

 

 

Bike Pedal or Gas Engine Powered

Phatmoto's gas-hybrid bike gives you flexibility to ride by pedaling, engine, or both.

Phatmoto was engineered from the ground up as a dedicated motorized gas-hybrid bike which makes it significantly easier to ride while pedaling.

By streamlining Phatmoto's engine drivetrain, we've eliminated many of the pedaling strains associated with bulky bike conversion kits that give you the freedom to easily ride by pedal and/or engine power.

  • Pedal Power — Phatmoto is easy to power by bike pedaling only when needed in congested areas.
  • Gas Power — Simply pull the easy pull start handle and adjust speeding using handlebar throttle.
  • Hybrid Power — Combine pedaling and gas power with the engine on to switch between pedal and gas.

 

 

 

 

 

Gas Bicycle Frame

custom designed for a motor.

 

​

Convenient, gas or pedal hybrid design considerations offer riders added luxuries and safety features that are built directly into Phatmoto's frame whereas gas engine kits rely on costly modifications of traditional pedal-only bike frames.

 

 

Fuel Tank Built Inside Bike Frame

Cleverly designed bike frame disguises bike fuel tank internally on Phatmoto.

Rather than bolting an additional gas tank to power its four-stroke engine, Phatmoto seamlessly blends its gas tank internally and conceals its fuel lines to power its four-stroke engine that allows riders to travel up to 100+ miles on a single tank.

  • Fuel Tank Size — Internal bicycle frame fuel tank holds 2.85 liters or .75 gallons of gasoline.
  • Eliminates Mess — Large fuel opening allows line of sight to never over pour and reduce spilling.
  • Screw-On Top — Secure twist top fuel cap stops leakage while riding and eliminates evaporation.

 

 

Enclosed Drive-Train & Heat Shield

Safety first design prevents burns and protects riders from motorized bike parts.

​

Phatmoto is first designed for riding when under gas power with design redundancies to reduce motorized biking accidents from hot engine burns and the bike motor transmission which are common among cheaper DIY kit configurations.

  • Transmission Case — Detachable safety casing is protective while riding and easily removable if needed
  • Engine Shield — Vented heat shield protects the rider from engine block while dissipating during use.
  • Muffler Cage — Wired cage encases the muffler to prevent accidental touching while dispersing exhaust.

 

 

All-In-One Gas Bike

ready to ride out of the box.

 

​

With over two decades experience selling gas bike DIY conversion kits online, we created Phatmoto to be the first all-in-one motorized bike solution that's more affordable, less complicated and has all accessories designed for its higher speeds.

 

 

Pre-Built And Ready To Ride

With Phatmoto's fully-equipped motorized bicycle, all you need to do is attach the handlebars and front wheel, put in some gas and you're off.

 

①

Screw-On Gas Bike Engine

Place four-stroke bike motor on specially designed engine mount built into Phatmoto's bicycle frame, tighten four screws into their pre-aligned holes, and run its pre-sized chain from sprocket to clutch.

 

②

Attach Bicycle Handlebars

Easily attach Phatmoto's handlebars and front wheel to its mostly prebuilt, connect pre-sized plug and play cables to their appropriate locations, and conceal cables on your new motorized gas bike.

 

③

Pour In Regular Gasoline

Either use a fuel tank from your garage or pedal Phatmoto up to the nearest gas station to fill up with .75 gallons of standard 87 octane gas, and your off riding your EPA/CARB certified Phatmoto gas bike!

 

 

Premium Bike Components Included

Phatmoto is far from your standard motorized gas-hybrid bike, hiding a high degree engineering disguised within a traditional bike frame appearance.

​

Phatmoto is the first motorized bike that includes everything you need to get started riding gas bikes quickly and safely by packaging together a custom frame, powerful engine, and premium bike components designed specifically for its motorized bike.

 

Engine Specs on Phatmoto Gas Bike

​

Phatmoto's motorized bike four-stroke engine is powerful, fuel efficient, easy start, and designed to sit seamlessly atop its custom-designed bicycle frame.

  • Engine Operation Specs — 2.5 HP 79cc Industrial Grade OHV Single Cylinder 4-Stroke, Starting System: Recoil, Fuel Type: 87 Octane Gas, Fuel Tank Capacity: 0.75 Gallon (2.85 L), Engine Oil: SAE 10W30w 20 oz
  • Engine Performance Specs — Top Speed: Up to 25 mph, Maximum Range: 100 miles per full tank, Maximum Horsepower: 2.5 hp, Displacement: 79cc, Engine Speed: 3600 rpm, Compression Ratio: 8:1

 

Drivetrain & Transmission on Phatmoto Gas Bike

​

Phatmoto's motorized bike transmission is prebuilt so that it operates smoothly, efficiently, and safer than the DIY bike engine kits that are complex to align.

  • Integrated Frame Drive Shaft — Pre-built motorized bike drivetrain is efficient and optimally aligned with separate pedal and motor configurations.
  • Safety Features — Includes transmission case, jackshaft cover, and carefully engineered chains to prevent injuries.

 

Frame & Components on Phatmoto Gas Bike

​

Phatmoto's team have carefully selected premium components for its gas bike that seamlessly fit its custom-built bicycle frame while allowing for an affordable all-in-one package.

  • Bicycle Frame Specs — Frame Size: 26 inch, Total Bike Weight: 70 lbs (32 kg), Frame: Aluminum, Wheel Size: 26 inches, Tires Type: Mountain, Tire Size: 26 x 2.35 inches, Spokes: 12G
  • Custom Frame Features — Fork: Suspension Forks, Rear Shocks: N/A, Bottom Bracket: Cartridge Sealed, Front Brake: Mechanical Disc Brake, Rear Brake: V-Brake, Headset: 1 1/8"

 

 
 
 

 

 

Phatmoto Production

has started and ships soon.

 

​

Phatmoto has already started manufacturing with mass production steps that started in mid-January 2019 and scheduled delivery for spring to our first 1,000 gas bike customers.

 

Phatmoto Is Currently In Production

After nearly two decades in the gas bike conversion kit industry, our team at Phatmoto have assembled the ultimate all-in-one motorized bike that delivers soon.

​

Just recently our team shipped our final bike to begin deconstructing and beginning full-scale mass production with our first 1,000 bikes awaiting fulfillment.

 

 

 

Mass Production and Indiegogo Shipping Schedule:

  • March 2018: Phatmoto's motorized gas bike idea was born
  • April 2018: First conceptual drawings and design blueprints
  • October 2018: Prototype ready and functional
  • January 2019: Kickstarter and/or Indiegogo campaign launch
  • January 2019: Manufacturing starts on first 1,000 bikes
  • February 2019: Quality control and mass production review
  • Early May 2019: Phatmoto ships to our first 1,000 customers on Indiegogo
  • Early July 2019: Second production run shipping to next 1,000 customers

 

 

Trusted Lifan Motor on Phatmoto

Lifan Motors is a trusted, manufacturing car/motorcycle engines since 1992.

All LIFAN engines are industrial grade and feature cast-iron sleeves, automotive grade rods, pistons, rings, crankshafts, valve and valve springs. The LIFAN Overhead Valve (OHV) design (used on Phatmoto) provides better fuel efficiency, quieter operation, and longer life.

 

Meet GasBike.net, The Makers of Phatmoto

The Phatmoto Gas Bike team has been in the bike conversion kit for nearly a decade with GasBike.net and have finally created a more affordable all-in-one version that we're proud to share with you.

Our company is based on 4 simple principles: good products, good service, good value, and the strength of a family that stands behind its websites and promises. At our beginning in 2000, our company was a single website with just the owner selling a few products from a few suppliers. Since then, we have become one of the leading and fastest growing Internet Retailers with 2 online stores, thousands of products and hundreds of manufacturing and brand name partners selling both B2B and B2C.

Over time, we have pursued a single minded goal of assembling the best value, highest quality and broadest selection of online products for home, work, and play for over 19 years. Combine that with our family oriented business where we focus on the customer and on service and you get one thing consistently: Excellence.

*Make sure to add shipping charges to your order at checkout or order will not send. 

Summary

If someone reinvented the wheel, what would it look like?! The answer just might surprise you. Introducing the first ever wheel designed from a cube, and we're calling it the Shark Wheel. In 2013, we launched our first campaign to introduce our 70mm skateboard wheel. Since then, we've had countless requests to make a smaller sized wheel for cruiser boards, Penny boards or whatever else you can think of. Now we are back promoting our new 60mm wheel we are aptly calling, "California Roll". Our wheels are designed and manufactured in Southern California, the heart of skateboarding. 

Available in this campaign:

-60mm wheels
-70mm wheels
-Penny Boards with 60mm Shark Wheels
-Shiver Skateboard Complete with 60mm Shark Wheels
-Dakuwaqa Longboard Completes with 70mm Shark Wheels 
-Quad Wheels/Derby Wheels

60mm California Rolls. Green, Blue, Orange, and Red (not pictured) available.

Story

The Shark Wheel 60mm Skateboard Wheel, California Rolls, are proudly made in Southern California, USA.


Shark Wheel in the media:



Short Summary

For those of you who have never seen the Shark Wheel - we literally reinvented the shape of the wheel itself.  It is half cube and half sphere, having 6 sides that are completely flat. It has many proven scientific performance advantages, aside from just looking crazy cool. Introducing the world's only wheel that combines the benefits of a thin wheel and the benefits of a wide wheel into one shape.  The Shark Wheel has already won multiple longboarding international competitions and this campaign introduces the 60mm 'California Roll' for skateboarders/cruisers. The entire Shark Wheel product line is available here on Indiegogo - scroll down to see images of all of the products offered on the campaign.

Awesome for cruisers and street boards.

Perfect for Penny and Nickel boards!

Campaign

Our first campaign (www.tinyurl.com/sharkwheel) was a huge success, but this time we are sticking to our California roots and making a wheel dedicated to this great state. Introducing the California Roll!  The California roll is a 60mm, 78a wheel perfect for all types of cruiser boards and Penny boards.  

Although this campaign introduces our 60mm wheel, we are making all of our products available.  We have top-of-the-line complete skateboards and longboards that will arrive to you fully assembled, Penny board completes, 70mm wheels and other cool stuff. See pictures of all rewards down below.

In our first campaign we exceeded everyone's expectations with the high performance aspects of the Shark Wheel. Rave reviews came rolling in and after thousands of sets shipped off, not one return was made.  It took us several months to deliver on our first campaign.....but this time we GUARANTEE we will not be late. In fact, we have already completed the metal molds for our 60mm wheel. We need to raise funds for manufacturing and that is where we need your help Indiegogoers! 

The second we reach our goal of $10,000 to go into full production, we will give our manufacturer the green light to start pumping out wheels.  This means that once our campaign ends we will be exactly 2 weeks away from the first shipments.  No need to wait this time. 

Backers to this campaign will get the best price the product will ever see. You will be the first to have it and have a small piece in helping reinvent the wheel. Your contributions mean so much to us and we plan to throw in some secret extras for every single person that contributes because you are so ridiculously awesome.

What We Need & What You Get

Our new line is 60mm, 78a, and center set. This wheel is perfect for all around skating. Whether you need to get to class, work, home, your favorite surf spot, or even a buddy's house the California Roll will get you there in style. Just like our 70mm wheel, this wheel features our patented Shark Wheel shape that is fast, grippy, multi-terrain, and has predictable slides. 

We have proven to be a reliable company doing everything and anything to make our customers happy.  We will respond to every single message, post cool videos you send us, and give you a killer deal right here and now.  

The Impact

Last campaign we were contacted by countless media outlets.  The Discovery Channel aired a special on us (http://vimeo.com/80523711), The Huffington Post, The Atlantic, Longboardism, Popular Science, The International Business Times, Gizmag, MSN.com, Yahoo.com, The Daily Mail, Gizmodo, LA Weekly, etc

For the first time ever people actually have a choice in their wheels.  Support true innovation, support our team of lifelong skaters, and get the coolest thing in the market today.  Since our campaign lauched, we won Miami Ultraskate 2015 team competition, posted the fastest lap time at the event, won the Kongsberg Downhill in Norway, placed 3rd at the Broad Street Bomb in Philadelphia, and placed 4th at the Miami Ultraskate 2014 among many others.  We now sponsor a few high level riders and are looking for more, so hit us up with an email and video of you riding if you are competing.


Risks & Challenges

We suffered many setbacks and various challenges getting our product to market when we started the company. It took us several months to figure out how to make molds with the tolerances for mass production.  But, we did it and have a highly functioning system where all of our hurdles have been overcome.

Expect shipment for nearly every product immediately.

Partners

Hey Groms! We have teamed up with GromSocial.com

Make sure you check out the FREE skateboarding game, made especially for all the Groms out there - GROM SKATE. Get good enough at the game to earn the Shark Wheel Power-Up and ride the Sharks in a video game!

Grom Social is a safe, educational, fun and highly interactive social networking site created "By Kids For Kids" by a visionary twelve-year old.

Grom Social is highly focused on anti-bullying and offers a safe option for the youth who are learning about social networking. Shark Wheel will be the 'power up' in Grom Social's Iphone game, so download that app and jump on your virtual Shark Wheels!  Buy Perk #1 above and you will be sent Shark Wheel discounts and the link to download the free skateboarding game. 

We have also teamed up with Blaq Sharks, located in Los Angeles. They have a full service operation providing apparel to many of the top brands in the industry. They provide high quality, urban apparel and next level gear that will complement your swagg. Grab a custom Shark Wheel hat or shirt (variety to choose from) on SharkWheel.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Shark Wheel was born to LIVE OUT LOUD.  If you want the coolest, highest performance product in the market this is the time to get the best deal before anyone else gets their hands on them.  We want EVERYONE to at least give us a shoutout on social media, or email their contact list.  It's not everyday someone reinvents the wheel-actually it is once every 5,000 years so far!  It took David M. Patrick years to discover this shape and bring it to market.  Please take a second and spread the stoke about the Shark Wheel.

But, even if you can't contribute to the campaign we want to hear your voice sharing our campaign.  Also, we love your questions and opinions and ideas.  Feel free to leave a comment here and we will do our best to answer every single one.

Shark Wheel Team

Shark Wheel's team is comprised of lifelong skaters that work hard and play hard. We want to give consumers a high performance option when it comes to their skate gear.

story:
Uno Bolt is the worlds first e-unicycle with Gyro Force Technology. With built-in stabilizer sensors, it's the quickest responding gyroscope to be put into a one wheel machine. Uno Bolt, bolting away with style and precision.

 

 

 

 

 

 

With the GyroForce System, braking is quick and responsive. The brake lever is used if you need to stop the Uno Bolt in its tracks. In addition, the lever can be used to reverse.

 

Charging anything can be a hassle, so we created the best way to charge your battery in a matter of minutes. From 0% drain to 100% gain in a matter of 45 minutes to be precise. Once fully charged you will be riding for 25 miles before needing to charge again.

 

Uno Bolt is equipped with an intense LED flood. The headlight consists of six high power LED lights that produce an unbelievably bright 1000 lumens (12W). Rear has two LED lights with two modes, constant or flash.

 

We have developed a seat that has a high (ILD) Indentation Load Force Deflection. Thus providing comfortability for short and long trips. In addition, the cell foam contours to the bum for the constant flow of circulation. The neoprene material provides the saddle with UV resistant for those sunny days and water repellent for the rainy days. 

 

Uno Bolt is equipped with a horn to notify others that you're around. Horn is push activated and located on the top right handle. 

 

We have equipped the Uno Bolt with an all-terrain tire. Tubeless and big enough to handle the ride from potholes to rough roads ahead.

 

Knowing whats behind you is very important to make decisive turns on the road. The rear view mirror will aid in these situations. It can be attached to the right or left handle grips.

 

The Uno Bolt is equipped with 2 back mounted parking stands that are made of aluminum alloy. The stands have been crafted to look sleek and functional.

 

Our footrest is fully collapsible which offers owners the capability to tuck it away in small spaces. In addition, the rubber foot grips will aid in slip off from the footrest.

 

 

 

Inspired by anime and sketched on paper. Carefully designed and made into a reality with a special team. From the vision of Ron & Sean, the Uno Bolt is the future of transportation. Uno Bolt is patented and manufactured owned.

 

 

Xi Testing Uno Bolt's Gyro Force Computer Board  Sensor

Ron Inspecting Uno Bolt's Top Frame

 

 

 

Additional FAQS

How to adjust the height in handlebar?

Adjustment of the handlebar is shown below. With or without the handlebar the Uno Bolt can be put into a trunk of a compact car. The video below shows the height adjustment, the locking mechanism for the handlebar, and the removal of the handlebar.

 

How to prevent theft of the Uno Bolt battery?

The battery is currently locked in by a screw lock. Now the screw lock can be twisted off to remove the battery from the frame. So we designed the frame so Uno Bolt owners can purchase any chain lock and wrap around the frame. Thus, preventing anyone from stealing the battery. Locking the battery is very easy as shown below.

 

What is the listing of the free shipping countries?

The free shipping countries are as followed: 

  • United States
  • Macao
  • Australia
  • Austria
  • Belgium
  • Cambodia
  • United Kingdom
  • China
  • France
  • Greenland
  • Denmark

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Uno-Bolt-113510079258680/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/unobolt/?hl=en

Twitter: https://twitter.com/unobolt?lang=en

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIPQ1AlUHvE&amp...

 

Shipping: Please take note all United States shipping, including the free shipping pledge, is for the 48 contiguous states. Please contact us if you are located in Hawaii or Alaska and are interested in pledging. Any taxes & tariffs for shipping is the responsibility of the purchaser. 

If your country is not listed on the shipping list we apologize. We are working on shipping rates for other countries at the moment. Updates on shipping will be posted on Indiegogo.

For any inquiries please Email us directly at theunobolt@gmail.com

story:
Who are the Righteous Babes?

A co-ed, beginner friendly, fun-loving, and competitive water polo team from Carleton College that competes in the Heartland Division of the Collegiate Water Polo Association. Our mascot is a blow-up unicorn named Roxanne.

What We Need

Driving 12 people down to New Orleans is a bit expensive. Everyone is ready to pay a certain cost but in order to make the trip more accessible to everyone any contribution you all can make would help greatly.

Itinerary

March 15th - Leave Carleton, drive down to St. Louis

March 16th - Leave St. Louis, drive to Memphis

March 17th - Play water polo in Memphis, have a few hours to explore

March 18th - Leave Memphis, drive to New Orleans

March 19th - New Orleans water polo games

March 20th - March 22nd - Free time in New Orleans

March 23rd - Leave New Orleans, head to Kentucky

March 24th - Leave Kentucky and return to Carleton

story:
Short Summary

My husband is our main worker in our family.  Recently, on his way home from work, he had to drive on icy roads.  Due to black ice, the vehicle swerved off the road and flipped on its side in a ditch.  We only had liability insurance at the time, so the damage wasn't covered in terms of reimbursement. We do have another vehicle, which is a minivan, but we need a second one to function. please note we do not get income tax so no relief that way either.  We direly need a new vehicle because of the following:

  • My husband needs a way to get to work
  • Our children need to get to school at the same time
  • Some of our children are in high school and need to be able to attend some of their teams and clubs on a regular basis for college applicability
  • We need to be able to go out while my husband is at work
  • We need a vehicle in case of emergencies while he is at work

We earnestly need your help to raise more money to get a second vehicle.  

What We Need & What You Get

What we need is:

  • We have money saved up for a vehicle, but not enough for one that is fully functioning
  • We need to raise an additional $1100 to purchase a secondary vehicle
  • Without addition funding, our family may struggle to get either my husband to work or our children to school on time.
  • No matter if you are able to contribute or not, thank you for reading and considering donating to us.

What you get is:

  • If you donate $5, you have our sincerest thanks
  • If you donate $25, you have our sincerest thanks and a personal thank you card mailed directly to you.
  • If you donate $100, you have our sincerest thanks, a personal thank you card, and handmade origami figures made by our children as a token of our gratitude
  • By contributing, you have touched the hearts of a family truly in need
  • We would offer more if possible, but hope these humble rewards may warm the hearts of contributors 

The Impact

By donating, you are:

  • Helping my husband keep his job
  • Allowing our children to get to school
  • Helping a family in need
  • Being a good Samaritan

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any help we can get, but if you can't donate:

  • Thank you very much for reading our entire campaign
  • Spread the word about this campaign please!

We would offer more if possible, but hope these humble rewards may warm the hearts of contributors 
The ImpactBy donating, you are:
Helping my husband keep his job
Allowing our children to get to school
Helping a family in need
Being a good Samaritan
Other Ways You Can HelpWe appreciate any help we can get, but if you can't donate:
Thank you very much for reading our entire campaign
Spread the word about this campaign please!

story: My son Sky is 20 years old and mildly autistic. He needs a vehicle to drive to his work, as a Vocational Rehabilitation participant at the ASPCA in Orangeburg. It is twelve miles to his job and we do not have public transportation out here where I live! Can't even have a pizza delivered for real! Please help this young man find his place in this messed up world. All donations are appreciated! I need to Raise $800 for the labor to replace the heads and gasket, parts will he on order this weekend to the tune of about $600!

story:
CIO is integrated with ReeMount™, a straightforward and secure wire system that makes mounting the lights faster and easier than ever before. The wire is made from coated stainless steel, minimizing the risk of breakage or theft.

If the bike stops momentarily, the ReePower™ backup system automatically continues to supply power, keeping you safe even when stopping at traffic lights. CIO will carry on flashing for two minutes and then automatically turn off. CIO is intuitive and highly integrated, with no buttons or switches on the bike light. All you have to do is ride, and never again worry whether your lights are on or off.

 

When investing in a CIO bike light, you never have to worry about batteries again, nor should you worry about the maintenance of the product, since the CIO bike lights require minimal care. CIO has a bright flash, and the ReePower™ feature keeps you safe at a standstill. CIO has gone though climatic tests which have proven that it's waterproof and solid in harsh environments. Furthermore, CIO is eco-friendly, due to the reduction in pollution through use of a magnetic system instead of batteries.
 

 

For more than a decade, Reelight have been helping cyclists around the world feel safe on the road. This has been possible thanks to our ground-breaking invention of induction bike lights, where the light is powered by magnets that are placed on the spokes of your bike. The vision was to eliminate the use of batteries, thus removing the risk of them running flat and making you vulnerable in traffic.

Based on a large scale research study* with over 4,000 participating cyclists, we have proven that our induction lights reduce the probability of accidents by 19% when counting all accidents, and 47% for accidents with more than one involved party. Furthermore, 85% of our induction light users have expressed that they felt safer while riding in traffic.

* [Madsen, J. C. O., Andersen, T., & Lahrmann, H. S. (2013). Safety effects of permanent running lights for bicycles: A controlled experiment. Accident Analysis & Prevention, 50, 820- 829]
 


The main reason for this large reduction in accidents was down to the fact that the lights were always on when riding, both night and day. This is referred to as 'daytime running lights' (DRL) – a term that's well known in the automotive industry. Many countries require the use of DRL in cars, as it is proven to drastically reduce the number of accidents experienced by drivers on the road.

DRL dynamo lights by Reelight have become the standard in Denmark, and today are mounted on 1/3 of all bikes there. The lights have been well tested and proven effective, but now it's time for us to take the concept to the next level.

CIO is the synthesis of advanced technology and design. We have been working hard on upgrading our technology, as we wanted to reduce the size of the magnet module while increasing the power output. What used to be two 12 centimeter / 4.7 inches magnet modules, mounted on each wheel, is now just one small, coin-sized magnet. By upgrading this technology we were able to get approximately six times the output using the smaller magnets. 
 


The main goal for the CIO project was to reinvent the mounting as we believe that the best bike lights are the ones you can mount on your own in just a few minutes. Our solution is called ReeMount™ and is currently patent pending. We are very proud of this solution, as it is highly adaptable and can be mounted by using the key included in the package.

 

As we have already been testing the lights for a while, we are already far in the process of getting them on the market. We have been running a successful Kickstarter campaign and hope our luck on Indiegogo is just as good, since we want to make as many people safe on the roads as possible. We think now is the right time to ask for your support as we feel confident that this product is going to be amazing!

 

The design of CIO is unlike any other bike light ever seen before. We combined what we learned from our previous Kickstarter product NEO, and turned CIO into a compact, sturdy and integrated bike light. The design is focused around the ball-joint, which allows for full adjustability. Through the ball-joint runs a nylon coated, stainless steel wire, which is used to fasten the light around the bike frame. The wire is incredibly strong and helps to ensure that the light stays on the bike and does not get stolen. 
 


Our small design team have dedicated all their time in the design process of CIO. Today a big challenge is that there are various bike types. This makes it harder to develop a bike light that is appropriate for all bikes.

Because of this challenge, we have been in close contact with bike dealers, who's expertise we have benefited greatly from. By making a lot of tests and prototypes the design team have been able to design a bike light that can be mounted on most bikes in a few minutes.   

CIO fits almost every bike, thanks to ReeMount™, which adapts to any geometry. ReeMount™ is a new and innovative mounting solution that consists of a flexible wire, made out of coated stainless steel. Due to its flexibility, the wire is appropriate for most bikes on the market, which makes CIO a solution for everyone. 

The lights are designed to be mounted on the left side of the bike. 

 

The CIO bike light is designed to be user friendly. Mounting the CIO onto your bike requires no tools other than the included coin for measurement and the key for tightening, locking, and anti-theft protection.  
 


How to mount CIO in a few easy steps:
The first step when mounting the CIO bike light is to place the magnet onto one of the spokes. It should be placed no further than 15 centimeters / 6 inches below the top of the tyre. Step two is to place the lights on to the fork and the seat stay. The lights should be placed parallel to the magnets. To fasten the lights, use the key. The distance between the magnet and the light module can be found by applying the included coin in between the two modules.   

 

Great manufacturers are needed to make the CIO dream come true. The lights will be manufactured in China by our close collaboration partner, who specializes in bike lights. 

The bike light itself is made out of carbon reinforced ABS, which is durable and can resist bad weather as well as being impact resistant. We chose this material because we find it very important that the CIO bike light can be used in all environments all over the globe. Furthermore, the material is very strong so that the function of it will be intact even if a fall should occur. 
 


The generator is an important part of the bike light, since it generates the power in CIO. The generator consists of a rotating magnet, and a thin wire that makes up the coil. The winding of the coil is a crucial part of the process, since it determines how well the generator performs. Therefore, the winding must be done with exactness. The video below shows how the coil is made. The coil is twisted using a CNC coil-winding machine, which assures consistency and accuracy on each coil.


The final mold is based on the first test molds and is currently being fine-tuned before the final approval and pilot production. The electronics inside the bike light have been developed and tested for a longer period of time and the final adjustments on the programming part is almost done. Additionally, we are running a pilot production on approximately 500 lights before we start mass production. This is done to reinsure that both the process and the quality is at its best. 

 

Reelight is a Danish bike light company with a clear goal to make people safe in traffic and thereby save lives. At the same time we try to be as eco-friendly as possible. Our dedication and passion for making high quality bike lights to our users are what drives the company.
 


The company was established in 2003 after our CEO walked the streets of Copenhagen and noticed the lack of lights on peoples bikes. He saw how vulnerable it made them. Right there, he decided that he would make sure that people were visible in traffic at all times. He started collaborating with people who had knowledge in this field and after a lot of hard work the magnetic bike light that never dies was born. 

Through the years the magnetic bike lights have been developed, and we are always working on making them even better. Today we are so far in the process that we have introduced you to the newest member in the family, the CIO bike light. We hope and believe that all our hard work will end in a success and that we can contribute to make cyclists even safer.

 

Reelight is a Danish manufacturer of bike lights. Our patented, battery-free bike lights generate their own eco-friendly power by means of magnets mounted on the spokes and a small generator integrated in the lights. Reelights are always on, making cyclists visible day and night in all kinds of weather. In less than 10 years Reelight has gained dominant market shares in Denmark and our bike lights are further exported to most European countries, USA and Australia. In late 2015 Reelight was on Kickstarter for the first time with NEO - a powerfull battery light, which was successfully funded. 

 

We expect the CIO bike lights to be shipped from Denmark, Europe. However, all backers must be aware that taxes will appear corresponding to the tax rules in the country the order is ordered and shipped to. Since we have no influence on the taxes we will not be able to guide or answer questions regarding the tax rules in your specific country. 

 

You will have to check the legal requirements on bike lights in your specific country to see if the CIO bike lights are allowed. In some countries a flashing bike light, like CIO, is not legal to use on its own. The CIO bike light can always be used in connection with another bike light that is steady and heighten the safety of the cyclist.

 

 


 


 


 


 


 

 

As it is with all good ideas, one has to be critical to make the best product one the market. Therefore, we have considered both risks and challenges in our process of developing the CIO bike light. One challenge that we are facing is minor delays on the pilot production due to the final tests of the electronics. Some further challenges are seen in the verification of the product, where we have to make sure that the bike lights can live up to our expectations regarding its resilience in bad weather and to our idea that it should fit all bikes. 
A final risk that we have to consider is if we will be able to receive all the deliveries from the sub suppliers in time. As for now all our challenges are under control and we are very optimistic that CIO is and will be the best bike light on the market!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

 

Unterstützer finanzieren Ideen, die ihnen gefallen und von Personen, denen sie vertrauen. Hier sind einige Punkte, die du in diesem Abschnitt beachten solltest:

 
     
  • Stelle dich und deinen Hintergrund vor.
    •  
  • Beschreibe deine Kampagne kurz und knackig und erkläre, weshalb sie so wichtig für dich ist.
    •  
  • Beschreibe, wobei die Unterstützer dir helfen werden.
    •  
 

Denke daran, dich kurz zu halten. Stelle dir folgende Fragen: Wenn jemand hier aufhört zu lesen, wäre derjenige dann bereit, Geld zu geben?

 
 
 

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

 

Gehe etwas mehr ins Detail für alle Besucher, die daran interessiert sind:

 
     
  • Erkläre, wie viel Geld du benötigst und wofür es eingesetzt wird. Bleib transparent und sag konkret, worum es geht – die Leute sollen dir und deiner Kampagne vertrauen.
    •  
  • Erzähle den Leuten von deinen einzigartigen Perks. Mach sie neugierig!
    •  
  • Erkläre, wohin die Finanzmittel gehen, wenn du das Funding-Ziel nicht erreichst.
    •  
 
 
 

Die Folgen

 

Verrate mehr über deine Kampagne und lass die Leute wissen, was sie mit ihrem Beitrag bewirken:

 
     
  • Erkläre, warum dein Projekt für den Unterstützer und die Welt wichtig ist.
    •  
  • Erwähne ähnliche Projekte, mit denen du in der Vergangenheit erfolgreich warst (falls es welche gibt).
    •  
  • Mach das Projekt für die Leute real und baue Vertrauen auf.
    •  
 
 
 

Risiken & Herausforderungen

 

Die Leute schätzen deine Transparenz. Bleib offen und stich aus der Masse heraus, indem du ohne Umschweife von den Risiken und Hindernissen erzählst, die dir auf dem Weg zum Erreichen deines Ziels begegnen.

 
     
  • Informiere deine Unterstützer, warum gerade du diese Hürden überwinden wirst.
    •  
  • Beschreibe, wie du diese Herausforderungen bewältigen möchtest.
    •  
 
 
 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

 

Manche können einfach keinen Beitrag leisten, das heißt aber nicht, dass sie nicht helfen können:

 
     
  • Bitte darum, dass man über deine Kampagne spricht und sie so bekannt macht.
    •  
  • Erinnere daran, das Tool von Indiegogo dafür zu nutzen!
    •  
 
 

Das war es auch schon.

story:
There are only a few days left to get your hands on the new Kuberg Ranger. Still undecided? Let us help you. If we reach $400,000, every Ranger order will receive a FREE children’s bike we’re launching in November - the coolest kid bike on the market. How could you say no? 

So put your foot down, tell your friends and family and pick up yours today!

 

 

 

With a unique construction and frame, complemented with a low centre of gravity – the Kuberg Ranger offers better stability on any terrain, with no limit to your freedom of movement so you can stand, jump and speed in comfort. When you get tired, push the handlebars - and up pops the Ranger's reclining airlift seat. A one size fits all, one of a kind pneumatic seat, that absorbs the vibration of the bike for even more comfort when seated. On top of that, the bike is loaded with a whole array of features to help you take on the world without a problem. Regenerative braking, battery status, an optional light kit, a front fork, front and rear fenders and a kickstand, just to name a few. All of this and more was built into this one of a kind bike to make it unstoppable.

​

Whether you're a city slicker, or a nature lover - this bike is for you. Want to cruise down the beach? Not a problem. Power through the mountains? Not a problem. Commute to work? Absolutely not a problem. This bike is suitable for all of your needs, whatever they are, wherever they may be. Explore, conquer, or cruise. The possibilities are endless.

 

 

The Kuberg Ranger has a one of a kind construction. It's built from a series of handmade proprietary components, including a lightweight steel frame, a BLDC motor with a 14Kw controller capable of delivering 50mph speeds, and a super charged battery pack for prolonged riding time. Our dedicated engineers took the most modern technologies and most durable materials to make sure the Kuberg Ranger is a ride like no other.

 

Wherever you're riding, whatever you're doing, the Kuberg Ranger has a mode for it. We built it in such a way that each rider mode carefully considers the motor, battery capacity, throttle responsiveness and capabilities plus our in built computer unit to optimise every riding setting. Whether you're a total novice or a racing pro, you'll get to grips with this bike in no time.

story:
It's ready — for everything and everyone.

Since we started in 2014, Blix has built many different types of eBikes for thousands of people, but the Packa is truly our most exciting model so far. It offers an actual car-replacement for everyone.

Our goal has always been to inspire as many people as possible to have a fun and healthy lifestyle, and build high-performing yet affordable electric bikes that fit into your everyday life. The Packa does exactly this, it allows you to go to places while bringing all the things you need or the ones you love.

It has required a tremendous team effort to make this happen, and we’re incredibly happy to introduce this feature-rich compact cargo eBike. We're excited to bring it you with the help of your support.

The most feature-rich, user-friendly and affordable cargo eBike ever made.

Founded by Pontus Malmberg, who grew up in Sweden, a country where a third of the people ride bicycles to work and for play, the mission at Blix is to see bicycles become sustainable transportation here in North America. Today, Blix has become one of the fastest growing electric bicycle manufacturers in the U.S. We make it easier to live a healthier and active life. We make short distance travel more enjoyable, fast and easy. For companies, we make commercial deliveries sustainable, while lowering transportation cost and shorten the delivery time. For cities, we bring streets to life, increase accessibility, improve air quality, and help our community become truly sustainable - environmentally, economically, and socially.

From our Santa Cruz HQ, we set the standard for world-class support and convenience. Our team of ebike experts is always available, and we make sure you always have a local point of contact for as long as you own your Blix.

story:
The unlikely Design Rear-view mirror is optimized for cycling, with a 360° degree angle adjustment, allows you to keep your head straight while seeing what’s behind you up to 100mts  behind you. And when it’s not in use, simply close the lid to keep the mirror safe and sound.   

One of the best ways to stay safe on your bike is to increase your situational awareness ability by affixing a bike mirror to your cycle.

When it comes to riding a bicycle, it’s important to be aware of all your surroundings even things that aren't in your peripheral vision. With some countries not having dedicated bike lanes, it makes absolute sense to keep an eye on the road and the obstacles ahead of you, but also on vehicles that are approaching you.

Outfitting your bike with the best bike mirror for bikes isn’t just a matter of aesthetics and tricking out your bike with accessories, it’s a matter of saving your life.  

 CORKY Urban makes a difference 

The CORKY Urban made by THE BEAM gives you the literal power of hindsight. Designed to dock perfectly to the end bars of your bike or electric scooter giving you an instant flip out convex rearview mirror that lets you know what's behind you.

Adding functionality and safety to your bike without compromising look or performance.   

The ABS's body is lightweight only 23g and impact resistant, while the Polycarbonate convex mirror is robust and can resist scuffs and scratches. 

Maintaining awareness of the roadway or path ahead is critical, especially when you are biking in a congested urban area or you are on an uneven path fraught with obstacles, such as those the mountain biker encounters.

Competitive racers too can benefit from a bike mirror; every split second counts in a serious bicycle race, and often the loss of rhythm caused by a backward glance can mean the difference between a victory and a second-place finish. A bicycle mirror can let you keep your eyes on the goal line while also keeping tabs on the competition.

Within the ABS body Lies a steel Bolt that lets you tightly fit the CORKY into your bicycle’s flat bars. (inside diameter) It is compatible with handlebars with an internal diameter between 17/19mm.

Securely attach to any bike’s ends bar with any type of flat handlebars or any two-wheeled vehicle 

City bikes are a popular choice of transit which quickly get people where they need to go or work as well as a daily commuter bike. If you are planning on using a working bike for frequent trips, you should consider getting the BEST bicycle mirror.

 

 

 Speeding alongside cars, buses, and trucks, cyclists have to make split-second decisions about whether to change lanes, speed up, or pull over if needed.

Our bike mirror will help you make sound decisions about your surroundings.

Having to turn your head over your shoulder for a short moment takes a cyclist’s eyes off of the path in front of them, which could result in an accident. 

CORKY URBAN mirror can help a rider more easily read traffic behind them, in addition to using common sense and peripheral vision.

All brands, all sizes with flat bars

Suitable for left and right side handlebar.

Ideal for city bikes, mountain bikes, E-bikes, hybrid bikes, cargo bikes, scooter, trotinettes, and YOUR BIKE!

                             

CORKY Urban was first shown at the EuroBike 2019 in Germany

Many European buyers and cyclists praised CORKY_URBAN. Many people who love bicycles are waiting for CORKY_URBAN.

Mass production CORKY_URBAN will be available on the 2020.

We use premium quality materials and thus are able to offer a 1 YEAR warranty. 

In the rare case of a faulty product, we will replace this at no extra expense. 

100% money-back guarantee – Again, no risk.

 

 

If you have a ROAD BIKE please visit our website to buy our ROAD version CORKY rear-view mirror: www.thebeam-europe.com

story:
Velotton App

Velotton is a fun, community based app for cycle lovers from cycle lovers with minimalistic design. Track your rides, explore elevation profiles, find interesting places and communicate with other cyclists.

Main features:

  • Record your rides
  • Add bicycle places
  • Get your live stats
  • View a detailed history of your rides
  • Explore elevation profiles
  • Find routes
  • Discover community rides and other cyclists
  • No subscription options


Links to the first version

We don't waste of our time creating promo video, that's why if you're skeptical, or just want to give Velotton a test drive, please feel free to download the first version for iOS or Android


How will the funding be used?

Simple. To create great app we should work full-time on Velotton and the funding will be used to pay our ( 2 persons only ) basic living expenses for the next 10 months. Also we should pay for servers, which are expensive.


Who we are?

We are a small indie team

  • Designer & Developer - Pavel G, created Curliston, The Journalist, FQ (fashion quiz game)
  • Manager & Accessories Designer - Marina I



Perks


Pants Saver ( 40$ )

You will get Velotton pants saver + post card + the pro version


Waterproof Saddle Cover ( 50$ )

You will get Velotton saddle cover for your bike + post card + the pro version



Roll up ( 60$ )

You will get Velotton roll up for your bike + post card + the pro version



Thank you for your interest, support and trust.

story:
A Better Singapore By Bicycle Share

Ever wanted to get to your nearest MRT, mall, or eatery FASTER? ZaiBike makes short distance commute easy, fast and affordable with shareable bicycles.

Bicycle Sharing Around The World: From top, clockwise, Beijing, Manhattan, Melbourne, Toronto, London, Hang Zhou, Taiwan

Bicycle Sharing Everywhere

Bicycle sharing is efficient and affordable, giving commuters flexibility when travelling, accessing areas where other vehicles cannot. It is time Singapore gets its own bicycle sharing system too.

As Featured On

                   

Here's a story of Musa

With or without a bicycle, you can benefit from the flexibility that bicycle sharing provides!

Tackling Space and Cost

Many systems rely on large electronically powered docks, making them difficult to implement in land-scarce Singapore, bringing only cost and inconvenience.

Smart, Mobile Devices

ZaiBike's on-board device makes our bicycle adapt to existing racks at HDBs and MRTs. Our smart devices can enhance the rider's experience in many ways.


Where It All Started

The idea started in Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). As leisure cyclists, we were excited by the prospect to rent bicycles for night cycling at East Coast Park.

However, renting bicycles in Singapore is not easy, especially at night. Combining our engineering knowledge, we wanted to create an automated bicycle rental system, which led us to discover bicycle sharing systems.

Convinced that Singapore should have one that fits the local context, we began to develop ZaiBike - a smart bicycle sharing system that leverages on existing infrastructure.

Where We Are Now

We are currently in our second pilot trial, garnering interests of over 100 pay users. We will be progressively rolling out our on-board device to the bicycles, and expanding our fleet. We are confident that by May 2016, an operational system will be running in SUTD.

We have an incredible team which excel in different disciplines. Together, we believe that we can make ZaiBike possible to bring convenience to the Singapore community with a low cost, healthy and fun public transport system.

Committed

We feel that this startup has great potential, and only need the green light from you to make this happen. Let us know that a bicycle sharing system is needed in Singapore, and we will heed your call.

ZaiBike requires that we deliver at least 10 bicycles for every 500 people in the service area.

For our launch in SUTD and the nearby districts, we have identified a sustainable supply chain for the components of our device, and bicycles. As such, we are confident to deliver this system by the end of 2016.

The biggest risk comes in launching the system to the public. Through your support, we will be convinced that launching this bicycle sharing system will be worthwhile. We will then be ready to engage our manufacturers from Shenzhen to quickly expand our system islandwide.

But first, give us this opportunity to prove to you that a smart bicycle sharing system will be useful in Singapore.

The following price structure pertains to the expected usage fees following the SUTD launch in May 2016. Do note that the prices mooted are subjected to change.

  • First 15 minutes: Free
  • First 1 hour: 30¢ for every 15 minutes
  • Second 1 hour: 50¢ for every 15 minutes
  • Third hour and beyond: 70¢ every 15 minutes
  • Night owl bonus: Usage between 10pm and 7am will be half the usual price.
  • Session clause: Usage time will continue if the time between signing out from a bicycle and signing in the same, or different bicycle is within 5 minutes.

Here are a few examples:

1 trip: Musa rides a ZaiBike to work, from 8am to 9:10am, lasting 70 minutes. The first 15 mins will be free. The second, third and fourth 15 mins will incur 30¢ each. His final 10 mins will incur 50¢. Thus, Musa pays $1.40 in total.

A Better Singapore By Bicycle Share
Ever wanted to get to your nearest MRT, mall, or eatery FASTER? ZaiBike makes short distance commute easy, fast and affordable with shareable bicycles.Bicycle Sharing Around The World: From top, clockwise, Beijing, Manhattan, Melbourne, Toronto, London, Hang Zhou, TaiwanBicycle Sharing EverywhereBicycle sharing is efficient and affordable, giving commuters flexibility when travelling, accessing areas where other vehicles cannot. It is time Singapore gets its own bicycle sharing system too.As Featured On                   Here's a story of MusaWith or without a bicycle, you can benefit from the flexibility that bicycle sharing provides!




Tackling Space and Cost
Many systems rely on large electronically powered docks, making them difficult to implement in land-scarce Singapore, bringing only cost and inconvenience.
Smart, Mobile Devices
ZaiBike's on-board device makes our bicycle adapt to existing racks at HDBs and MRTs. Our smart devices can enhance the rider's experience in many ways.












Where It All Started
The idea started in Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). As leisure cyclists, we were excited by the prospect to rent bicycles for night cycling at East Coast Park.
However, renting bicycles in Singapore is not easy, especially at night. Combining our engineering knowledge, we wanted to create an automated bicycle rental system, which led us to discover bicycle sharing systems.
Convinced that Singapore should have one that fits the local context, we began to develop ZaiBike - a smart bicycle sharing system that leverages on existing infrastructure.
Where We Are Now
We are currently in our second pilot trial, garnering interests of over 100 pay users. We will be progressively rolling out our on-board device to the bicycles, and expanding our fleet. We are confident that by May 2016, an operational system will be running in SUTD.We have an incredible team which excel in different disciplines. Together, we believe that we can make ZaiBike possible to bring convenience to the Singapore community with a low cost, healthy and fun public transport system.

Committed
We feel that this startup has great potential, and only need the green light from you to make this happen. Let us know that a bicycle sharing system is needed in Singapore, and we will heed your call.


ZaiBike requires that we deliver at least 10 bicycles for every 500 people in the service area.
For our launch in SUTD and the nearby districts, we have identified a sustainable supply chain for the components of our device, and bicycles. As such, we are confident to deliver this system by the end of 2016.
The biggest risk comes in launching the system to the public. Through your support, we will be convinced that launching this bicycle sharing system will be worthwhile. We will then be ready to engage our manufacturers from Shenzhen to quickly expand our system islandwide.
But first, give us this opportunity to prove to you that a smart bicycle sharing system will be useful in Singapore.

The following price structure pertains to the expected usage fees following the SUTD launch in May 2016. Do note that the prices mooted are subjected to change.

First 15 minutes: Free
First 1 hour: 30¢ for every 15 minutes
Second 1 hour: 50¢ for every 15 minutes
Third hour and beyond: 70¢ every 15 minutes
Night owl bonus: Usage between 10pm and 7am will be half the usual price.
Session clause: Usage time will continue if the time between signing out from a bicycle and signing in the same, or different bicycle is within 5 minutes.
