story:
STRØM CITY

More affordable and feature-packed than EVER

Introducing the best performing battery hidden inside the frame – detachable for easy charging. The most powerful, silent motor. The lightest aluminum frame (medium or large to fit people of just about any height) – and available in 3 cool colors.

 

A fully integrated lighting system, operated by a built-in power switch.We’ve packed all of this into one outstanding and affordable e-bike with prices starting at USD $999.

 

 

STRØM CITY is the lightest, most innovative electric bike, with a look, and feel, like nothing you’ve experienced before.

The integrated battery in the frame makes for a stylish e-bike without compromising on durability or convenience. The battery is even detachable for easy charging with a built-in locking system to prevent theft.

 


 

STRØM CITY is designed with flexibility in mind. You can ride it like a regular bike using the 7-speed Shimano gear system or take advantage of its powerful electrical system. Enjoy up to 350 Watt* of electric motor power, which can take you from 0 to 32 kmh/20 mph* in a matter of seconds.

Ride full throttle* or use the 6-level pedal-assist function. Start pedaling and feel the electric momentum instantly kick in. Go up to 80 km (50 miles) on a single charge.


 

STRØM CITY is available in a medium size (160-180 cm/63-71 inches) or large size (180-210 cm/70-83 inches) to fit people of just about any height.     

STRØM CITY is available in 3 cool colors to match your personal style. Choose between matte black, moon gray or shiny white

    

* The difference between the EU and US model is the motor size and automatic drive function.
Please note that the US model is not allowed in most European countries. Check your country before placing your order.
* The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.

In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.

Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping.

We’ve listened to feedback from customers from all around the world in the making of the new feature-packed STRØM CITY. Check out all the cool features below:

Hidden battery - detachable for easy charging
STRØM CITY comes with a 10Ah LG battery that is hidden inside the lower frame. The integrated locking system makes it easy to detach for charging. Charging time is approximately 3-4 hours.
With our standard 10Ah LG battery, you get a range of up to 80 km/50 miles. Or upgrade to our 13Ah “GO Further” LG battery and get up to 100 km/68 miles.

 

Integrated lighting system
STRØM CITY comes with a fully integrated lighting system that starts at the push of a button. This lighting system makes your rides safer and more convenient. Say goodbye to lost or stolen bike lights and hello to peace-of-mind commuting.

Powerful & silent motor
Take advantage of up to 350 Watt* of electric motor power, which can take you from 0 to 32 km/h* in a matter of seconds. The motor is built to be durable, powerful and silent. Choose between a 250W (EU model 25kmh/15mph) or 350W (US model 32 kmh/20mph) motor.

Displays
STRØM CITY comes with an LED display that allows you to adjust to 6 different assist levels (1-5) and shows the battery level. It also features a fully integrated USB charging system, so you can charge your mobile device on-the-go. Or you can upgrade to our intelligent computer display, which shows battery level, assist level, distance, trip meter, speed in km/h or mph and more. And of course, the computer display also has a fully integrated mobile device charging system.

Automatic drive function*
The automatic drive function (throttle) allows you to ride fully electric without using the pedal assist. Please note that this function is only available on our US version, as current legislation does not permit the throttle function in most European countries.

Works like a regular bike
STRØM CITY comes with a single-handed 7-speed Shimano gear system that lets you use it like a regular bike. This is what we call the “exercise level” (0 assist from the motor). Very useful if you want to exercise or if your battery is flat.

Puncture-proof tires
There is nothing more discouraging while out biking than hearing that distinctive hiss from a tire. Say goodbye to flat tires and hello to STRØM CITY’s puncture-proof tires.

Rust-free components
The component has been carefully selected to ensure your e-bike will last for years. It is build to be as rust-free as possible – from top to bottom. We’ve even added a chain protector to keep mud and dirt out of your chain. Less cleaning, more biking!

 

TEKTRO WIRED HYDRAULICS ($139 USD) 

is the premium of braking technology. This system will improve the braking power and feeling of riding a STRØM City. Hydraulic mean olie is being pushed thru tubes for instantly and powerful disc brake response. Hydraulics are great for braking in all weather conditions. 

 

STRØM LCD DISPLAY ($119 USD)

Makes a more fun and convenient way of transportation.

Enjoy all LCD information packed with features. 
Information: Battery indicator, motor power, Speed display (running speed, average speed.), trip distance and total distance, lights on and off. customization with max speed setting and password to acces the STRØM City 
 

REAR CARRIER ($40 USD)

With up to 25 kilos of cargo.

 .

FRONT CARRIER ($50 USD) 

With up to 15 kilos of cargo.

     

STRØM MOBILE STATION ($39 USD) 
Is for mounting all phones on your new STRØM City. Great for being on the go with the opportunity of charging, keep track of GPS, music etc. The safety rubber band comes in 2 colors (Red and Black). 

 

STRØM Bikes is the brainchild of entrepreneurs, Morten Birch (age 23) and Nichlas Lloyd (age 26). We met almost a decade ago at a business school in Denmark. We’ve traveled together, worked together and shared hundreds of ideas together. STRØM Bikes started in November 2016 when we designed our first FATBIKE model, which later raised more than $450,000 here on Indiegogo out of a campaign goal of $40,000.

Our mission with STRØM Bikes is to make inner city commuting more sustainable and convenient, and to help accelerate the transition to green transportation.

We’ve spent countless hours designing and building what we believe is the most stylish, affordable, and feature-packed e-bike ever.

To start up production, we need $50,000. As an Indiegogo exclusive, we’re offering a 50 % discount to make sure we reach our goal. This is a UNIQUE limited offer only available on Indiegogo.

Running a crowdfunding campaign requires a 100% transparent approach to our backers. We’ll do everything we can to keep you fully informed about the campaign, production, and shipping. And we promise to deliver the coolest e-bike EVER!

Don’t just take our word for it. Listen to what other backers have to say about us on trustpilot.com

FROM COPENHAGEN DEMO DAY

 

What is a thumb throttle? //

A thumb throttle is a throttle featured on the US model that allows you to run fully electric when the throttle is pushed. The thumb throttle is not permitted on the EU model due to current European legal requirements.

What is the pedal assist? //

Pedal assist is featured on both models and allows you to choose between 6 levels of assist from the electric motor (0-5). The electric pedal assist kicks in as soon as you start pedaling.  

Does it come in different sizes?//

Yes. STRØM CITY is available in a medium size frame (160-180 cm/63-71 inches) or large size frame (175-210 cm/70-83 inches) to fit people of just about any height.

Can I buy the US model if I don't live in the US? //

Yes. We deliver both models worldwide. Please note, however, that the US model is not legal in most European countries. Please check your country’s legislation before purchasing.

What's the warranty?//

2 years warranty world-wide

How can you sell your e-bike at such a low price?//

We’re selling our e-bike at a significant discount to ensure we can start up production. We can sell STRØM CITY at this affordable price, because you are buying directly from us (the manufacturer) and skipping all intermediaries

Can everybody get a 50 % discount? //

No. This is a strictly limited offer available ONLY on Indiegogo for a short period of time. The price will rise to the expected retail price after the campaign.

Where is the battery located and how do I charge it? //

The battery is located inside the frame to achieve a streamlined look. However, it is detachable, so you can remove it from the frame and charge it at home, the office or wherever you happen to be. You can also charge the battery while it is attached to the bike.

Please note that the actual distance varies from your battery size pick and different factors like temperature, weight, driving habits and more.

Can the bike handle my weight? //

Probably, yes. The bike is tested to handle riders up to 130 kg (286 pounds)

Do you offer test-rides? //

We offer test rides in Denmark. Contact us by email to ride@stroembike.com to book an appointment. We will also be hosting demo days in most of the big cities in Denmark. We will be scheduling the events on our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/stroembikes/

We hope to be able to offer test rides and demonstrations in other countries in the future.

How is the bike delivered? //

The e-bike is delivered almost fully assembled. An easy-to-follow assembly guide is included.

What about spare parts and repairs?//

All parts on the e-bike can be bought at our online store at an affordable price. In case something happens to your bike, we’ve produced a selection of helpful video tutorials on how to fix the most common issues.

Who is responsible for taxes and duties?//

The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.

In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.

Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping.

What is your refund policy? //

We are subject to Indiegogo's refund policy. Click here to read more about refunds.

Please note that we charge a 15% service fee if refunded outside indiegogo. This happens due to indieogog's transaction fee.

What is your return policy? //

We offer a 14-day money back guarantee when you have received your bike if you are not satisfied. If you decide to return your bike it must be in new and resellable condition. The bike must be returned to our warehouse and the shipping cost must be covered by you + 15% refund fee due to indiegogo's charges.

Additional questions?

Chat with us
 Email us

 * Elaboration

1. The actual range varies depending on your battery size and various other factors like temperature, driving habits etc.
2. Our EU model features a 250W motor (25 kmh). Our US model features a 350W motor (32 kmh). The 350W motor is not street legal in most European countries.
3. Only our US model features the throttle function (automatic drive/scooter function), as this function is not legal in most European countries.

ORDER US MODE

story:
Short Summary

VASANTH RAJ

CEO with 7 years of experience in a sensitive corporate and start-up environment. Outgoing and detail-oriented, Proficient at building and maintaining professional relationships. have taken responsibility for major project initiatives by being part of robust operation teams carrying out back-end operations of market leaders like Amazon and Citi Bank

Why we are here?

e-commerce is one of the up-trending business across globe, not just the professionals even a housewife or employed individual took avatar to become an online reseller. More than millions of resellers who use social media as a medium to market their product and generate sales/Revenue. On which more than 90% of the re-sellers are not registered.

In India, Online users has increased because of one major reason is Cash on delivery. Not all the courier companies are providing this service in market, To avail this service a business have to incorporate with logistics company which required KYC documentation, which cannot be provided by unregistered resellers, If registered, resellers has to commit with minimum number of shipments per month like 2000 or 3000 which is not possible for a small scale re sellers, There are aggregators in market who charges min 2000 INR/ month as subscription to get the logistic pricing. Which will make no value for a small-scale business.

To solve this problem Boogybee, has emerged into market as logistic aggregator and supporting resellers with free subscription, Boogybee enable the customer to provide Cash on delivery, SMS Notification, Omni tracking and online payments etc.

BOOGYBEE

Boogybee is a bootstrap start-up, founded on march 2016, BOOGYBEE as a business it has incorporated with 4 leading courier partners and supporting more than 60 Indian small scale business on logistics fulfilment in very short period with minimum investment, however, to expand and to help the road side vendors, we need to have strong technical support to incorporate with manufacturers and revenue making start-up, business is making consistent revenue for the past 4 months, the business has a chance of multiplying the revenue of min 50 time in a short period if we could able to provide web portal to automate the operation which we do it manually.

We see good number of start-ups could do our monthly achieving numbers in a day. Since our practice of operation is lengthier than their current method, Business is not ready to incorporate with Boogybee even though over pricing is more challenging than others.

Hence this fund could help us move into next level in our business, In short period we would show good track of customer base in up trending strategy.

What We Need & What You Get?

This Fund would help us reach more vendors to have them on board as an online reseller will create an opportunity to scale our business vice-versa.

  • We are looking for 50,000USD for our web portal development for scaling our business, to develop web app for customized checkout page creation which will help us to automate the operation for un organized resellers because many of the vendors does not have website to provide API. Also the fund will be utilized for our running capital for another 10 months.
  • We have a team which was not hired but built, very small team of 4 but like minded, passionate towards success of our start-up.

The Impact

As a business Boogybee could utilize the fund to expand its operation to its next level, Boogybee could easily incorporate with start-ups/manufacturer once if Boogybee could provide portal (to automate the operation) which will enable the functions in one click and on single portal.

  • Customized checkout page is a unique idea which will help a business to do business with their earned followers unlike another market place. Which enable sellers to boost their sale with their own style of marketing. Which has a global potential, where we could get chance to help small scale business across globe to go digital.
  • Customized checkout page option will help vendors to have portable billing option, where vendor can send online payment link to customer as SMS/email, Customer can make payment to vendors using Creditcard/Debitcard/netbanking/wallets etc. transaction status will be updated to  vendor and payer. which can be used on retail store to make digital/online payment. this can also be used on online shopping option will be available with COD option that will be fulfilled by boogybee logistics support team. 
  • Like Boogybee, there are few logistic aggregators in market, but they have targeted on successful business. But Boogybee is also targeting on millions of resellers to help them succeed in market.

 

Risks & Challenges                             

We have a risk if the vendors are unable to use to the process in online business and it is hard to track on everyone’s record.

  • We have tenured e-commerce analyst from ecommerce legends, where they could help us overcome this problem.

More than millions of resellers who use social media as a medium to market their product and generate sales/Revenue. On which more than 90% of the re-sellers are not registered.In India, Online users has increased because of one major reason is Cash on delivery. Not all the courier companies are providing this service in market, To avail this service a business have to incorporate with logistics company which required KYC documentation, which cannot be provided by unregistered resellers, If registered, resellers has to commit with minimum number of shipments per month like 2000 or 3000 which is not possible for a small scale re sellers, There are aggregators in market who charges min 2000 INR/ month as subscription to get the logistic pricing. Which will make no value for a small-scale business.To solve this problem Boogybee, has emerged into market as logistic aggregator and supporting resellers with free subscription, Boogybee enable the customer to provide Cash on delivery, SMS Notification, Omni tracking and online payments etc.BOOGYBEEBoogybee is a bootstrap start-up, founded on march 2016, BOOGYBEE as a business it has incorporated with 4 leading courier partners and supporting more than 60 Indian small scale business on logistics fulfilment in very short period with minimum investment, however, to expand and to help the road side vendors, we need to have strong technical support to incorporate with manufacturers and revenue making start-up, business is making consistent revenue for the past 4 months, the business has a chance of multiplying the revenue of min 50 time in a short period if we could able to provide web portal to automate the operation which we do it manually.We see good number of start-ups could do our monthly achieving numbers in a day. Since our practice of operation is lengthier than their current method, Business is not ready to incorporate with Boogybee even though over pricing is more challenging than others.Hence this fund could help us move into next level in our business, In short period we would show good track of customer base in up trending strategy.What We Need & What You Get?This Fund would help us reach more vendors to have them on board as an online reseller will create an opportunity to scale our business vice-versa.
We are looking for 50,000USD for our web portal development for scaling our business, to develop web app for customized checkout page creation which will help us to automate the operation for un organized resellers because many of the vendors does not have website to provide API. Also the fund will be utilized for our running capital for another 10 months.
We have a team which was not hired but built, very small team of 4 but like minded, passionate towards success of our start-up.

Customized checkout page is a unique idea which will help a business to do business with their earned followers unlike another market place. Which enable sellers to boost their sale with their own style of marketing. Which has a global potential, where we could get chance to help small scale business across globe to go digital.
Customized checkout page option will help vendors to have portable billing option, where vendor can send online payment link to customer as SMS/email, Customer can make payment to vendors using Creditcard/Debitcard/netbanking/wallets etc. transaction status will be updated to  vendor and payer. which can be used on retail store to make digital/online payment. this can also be used on online shopping option will be available with COD option that will be fulfilled by boogybee logistics support team.

This practice could help vendors to gain knowledge on online business, soon or later.

story:
Fun + Street Legal = The Bandit

Mopeds are back and are hitting the streets in an evolved/electric form. Unfortunately, federal/state guidelines in the USA are getting more complicated as the influence of electric vehicles spreads. 

  • Around the country there has been a rise in the 2hp (1,491 Watt) standard. This guidelines seeks to be the equivalent as the old 50cc rule for gas motors in many states. Our team spent two years developing a geared hub motor within this specification so that you don't put yourself in legal jeopardy. 
  • The design is also programmed to keep within all 50 states' speed guidelines: (20, 30, or 35mph depending on state)
  • We then took it a step further and worked with the DOT to register the design for VIN's and added all required safety features such as mirrors  and turn signals.
  • As a result, you can stay within the guidelines and not need a motorcycle license! 

 

Customizable with a Right to Repair

We understand that moped and motorcycle enthusiasts love to customize their rides. Every design decision on the Bandit was made with the intention of easy modification and repair. A simple example was our decision to use a thumb throttle over a twist throttle. The reason: we wanted to give you the ability to add custom bike grips and swap out handlebars. All parts on our design maintain this philosophy and allow them to be tuned up by any classic bicycle shop! 

 

The Challenge

When creating a unique bike frame, manufacturers develop special tools that make high volume production possible. These tools are extremely expensive, but drive the cost way down for the consumer. Our current volume puts us in a category where all of our frames must be hand welded, driving up cost. If we can meet our funding goals, our team will be able to afford these tools and knock down costs. As a sign of confidence, we have priced the Bandit at a mark that reflects this high volume goal.

 

Design Background

Our team began working on the concept for an electric moped back in 2018. At the time, our budget was very tight and we needed a stepping stone. We decided to create a short run of the first version using a 500 watt motor to be sold along our other electric bikes. This allowed us to gauge customer interest and decide if the project would be worth pushing further. We quickly sold out of the 500 watt  and decided to commit to a second generation in the moped category. Our engineers soon developed a unique prototype called "Project Scorpio." This design simulated our target power through the use of a dual hub design (front and rear motors). By late 2019, our design had been completed and an order for our first small batch of frames was submitted. They arrived in June 2020 and we were able to produce our first six consumer ready models for our campaign launch. We're now attempting to tool up for large production runs and need your support to make our price target a reality.

 

Specs

 

 

Our Team 

We're a small team with a headquarters located in Branford, CT. Come on by for a visit! You can also check out our Youtube channel to see custom build videos with the team members!

story:
NOW YOU CAN BUILD THE IDEAL BIKE YOU WANT

VIDEO SHOWING THE FASTEST BUILD IN 5 HOURS

 

WHY HAVE WE STARTED THE BIY 2 REVOLUTION?
 

Biking will always have a special connection between your childhood and your life as an adult. Most kids bike just to be out in the fresh air with their friends. Adults use bikes as fitness tools, or commuting tools, and more rarely just as a way to connect with their inner child and have some fun.

Who hasn’t wished that they could design and build a bike of their very own, instead of getting an impersonal, pre-assembled one from a store, or having to order one custom-made for their own unique body leg, torso or arm lengths? But there were no bike kits, and raw materials and specifications for a bike were difficult to get.

We knew there had to be a better way, and we set out to find it with one simple mission:

“Anyone can build a bike easily within a day”


 

ENJOY THE BUILD ANYWHERE

You can build your bike anywhere.  

The Modular Builder’s Jig has been designed so that it is easy to assemble depending on what type of bike you’d like to put together. Think Legos. And once put together, you can put the jig up on the wall, home work station or even on the floor of a living room or hall and start building your bike. 

Regardless where you place the Builder’s Jig, it won’t affect the accuracy of assembling the frame to the appropriate specifications!
 

NEVER BE CONSTRAINED BY DIFFERENT DESIGNS

The Modular Builder Jig has been intelligently designed so that it can be put together in just the right way for the custom bike you want. 

You can build a mountain bike, a ladies’ bike, a bike for your kids, or a bike of classic style!

The possibilities are endless!

All you need to do is to select the design at the end of the campaign, we’ll prepare the tubes for you, and send all the things you need to build! (We also offer steel tubes – but those are for road bikes only!) 

What a super exciting and fun way to spend an afternoon with your biking friends or your kids!

How long does it take to build a bike? Well, the fastest build was 2 hours and 41 mins on a mountain bike.
 

ACCURATE ADJUSTMENT

We talked to users of our BIY 1 Builder’s Jig and from their feedback improved the accuracy possible with our BIY 2. 

With the BIY 2 Builder Jig, the design can be creative and endless as any head tube, hub, dropout design can be integrated. You can be a bike designer and make any prototype quickly and easily.

Embrace your DIY Spirit!!!
 

BIKE DESIGN AVAILABLE EASILY
 

BIY 2 has teamed up with hobbyists, designers and an in-house team to design and upload new exciting bike builds on the Builder Community App. 

Folks with this app have access to regularly updated bike designs, specification and bike parts. 

After gaining experience, you can upload your own design and have the builder community for feedback. It would be an open source platform! Super Fun!!!
 

ENDLESS FUN
 

Building a bike is now easy and therefore super fun! 

Build a bike for your girlfriend. Or she can build one for you! 

Spend a morning with your wife building her bike and then take a romantic bike ride in the afternoon or evening.

Create fantastic childhood memories for your kids by spending a Saturday or Sunday building their bikes! That’s something they’ll never forget and whenever they ride their bike they’ll think of you and the fun time they had putting their very own bike together.

Those are warm memories that will last a lifetime.
 

WHAT MAKES BIY 2 UNIQUE
 

BE SMART WITH YOUR CHOICE
 

Build any custom bike easily and make the bike truly yours at an unbeatable price, for any level of experience.
 

HEALTHIER AND HAPPIER LIFESTYLE
 

A sense of satisfaction like never before by building a bike and riding it. Right now, you can build a bike in 5 hours time. It would be a great afternoon activity. 
 

BAMBOOBEE SUPPORT
 

Regardless of the design of the bike, once it is available on the Builder Community App, the Builder Frame Kit would be the same price. This keeps the price competitive for everyone.
 

BIY 2 FEATURE SUMMARY
 


BIY 2 SPECIFICATION OVERVIEW
 

BIY 2 BUILDER JIG SPECIFICATION
 


BIY 2 BUILDER FRAME KIT SPECIFICATION
 


TIMELINE
 

We are committed to bringing you the best bike and nature experience possible. It has been a long and challenging journey, but a very enjoyable one, to bring BIY 2 to our customers – both past and present!

We’re already in the final stages of development, but we now need your help to bring BIY 2 fully to life.

The money raised on Kickstarter will kickstart a ripple in the revolution of owning and building bikes.


DESIGN PROCESS
 

From experience gained by working with over a thousand bike builders, we have redesigned the BIY 2 kit so that it can support the needs of any bike builder.

And thanks to our Builder Community app, the bike builder will have bike specifications and instructions at his (or her) fingertips, and also be able to share the progress of the build with the community.
 

TEAM

We are a team of adventurers, bike lovers and engineers united by the common goal of helping people to experience the thrill and exhilaration of riding a bicycle built by themselves.


Press
 

Our media kit contains a collection of visual and marketing assets. Please download your kit here. We can also be reached directly at info@bamboobee.net

story:
The EvoWheel is the first electric bike wheel that lets you customize your ride. Choose between different riding modes to aid with the perfect workout, your commute to work or to just chillax. Best of all, the EvoWheel can be installed within 30 seconds by simply replacing your front wheel. Endless riding thrills await!

If you’re wondering whether your bike is compatible with the EvoWheel, worry not! With 6 different sizes (20, 24, 26, 27.5, 29 and 700C) the EvoWheel’s various models fit over 95% of all bikes. It even works with both rim and disc brakes for ultimate compatibility. Making the switch to electric has never been so easy!

Installation is also a breeze, taking approximately 30 seconds with only the assistance of a wrench required. Don’t believe us? Check out this video for proof.

Everyone is slightly different, so we have ditched the one-size-fits-all model in favour of full customization. 

The EvoWheel’s built-in algorithm will take into consideration your weight, your bike size and your wheel size to offer the optimum amount of power specifically for you. The EvoWheel also learns more about your riding habits over time by saving your riding data and making adjustments so you have the smoothest experience possible.

 

Change from Traditional to eBike with a single swipe

 

We understand as a rider you have your own preferences, which is why the EvoWheel offers 5 different riding modes to assist you in the ways you find most pleasing.

If convenience and comfort is your ultimate goal, then reaching for your phone to adjust settings may grind your gears. Thus we have created the Heads-up Display Unit, a Bluetooth compatible, bike-mountable display screen that shows you riding speed, percentage of power output, battery level, total riding distance and total riding time. You won’t need to fumble with your phone any longer as the display lets you also manage your power output by tapping on it.

Not everyone has the same needs in mind, which is why the EvoWheel comes in three models: City, Commute and Touring. As their names indicate, they provide different ranges. In addition, each model comes in two variants based on which region you live in.

We’ve ensured that charging the EvoWheel is simple, easy, convenient and fast. Plug your EvoWheel in anywhere, be it at home, at work or even at a café, and in an hour you’ll be completely recharged and ready for your next adventure.

Safety is paramount when riding an E-bike and the EvoWheel is designed to keep its riders safe. You can set a speed alarm to trigger whenever you go over a certain speed so that if you get carried away, you can be reminded to play it safe. The EvoWheel is also self-diagnostic and warns you of problems it may encounter in the future.

Combined our team has over 15 years of experience in designing and manufacturing electric vehicles from scooters, to hover boards, to now the electric wheel. We have our own engineers in house that design the electric circuit board and troubleshoot all the nicknacks of the EvoWheel. We also have a very solid manufacturing partners that who have over 20 years of experience in working with electric vehicles. We believe by combining our vast experience will prevents us from running into the pitfall of not being able to deliver a product on-time like other crowdfunding projects. However, while we can’t foresee the future, we will ensure we keep all of our supporters in the loop as we progress through production from sourcing raw materials, all the way to taking deliveries of the batteries being used in the EvoWheel. Your trust is very important to us as a company, and we will not risk anything to break that trust.  

Q: How does the EvoWheel work?

A: The EvoWheel is driven by a hub motor and engages once it detects forward momentum when you start riding the bike. You can set the power assist level before you start your ride with our APP or on the Bluetooth display unit.

Q: Will EvoWheel kick in without me pedaling?

A: No, you will need to pedal to activate the motor.

Q: Why is the delivery fee so expensive?

A: We’ve included both VAT and TAX for Canada and European Union. However, all supporters would be responsible for any additional TAX or VAT for their perspective countries. The delivery fee may also seem expensive because of the shipment of Lithium-Ion batteries which requires additional certifications and specialized packaging to be shipped.

Q: How does the EvoWheel work?

A: The EvoWheel is driven by a hub motor and engages once it detects forward momentum when you start riding the bike. You can set the power assist level before you start your ride with our APP or on the Bluetooth display unit.

Q: Can I use my electric bike battery together with the EvoWheel to extend range?

A: Unfortunately, you won't be able to use the battery with the EvoWheel. The battery for the EvoWheel is built into the wheel itself to save space, and provides a wireless experience for the rider.

Q: I have a bolt through axle on my forks is this compatible?

A: It would be incompatible if you have a bolt since the wheel is charged through the axle.

Q: Can I put EvoWheel on a wheelchair if the tires are the same as bike tires?

A: The EvoWheel is designed for bikes only so we wouldn’t suggest putting it on a wheelchair.

Q: What standard drop spacing the EvoWheel accommodate?

A. We use the standard international drop spacing of 100mm.

Q: Would EvoWheel work for fat bikes?

A: The widest tire we can accommodate is 2.1”(54mm), which fits standard drop spacing. Since most fat bikes come with non-standard dropout spacing, it wouldn’t work for fat bikes. We are however looking into introducing a fat tire version at a later date.

Q: Would EvoWheel work on a tandem bike?

A: Yes, it would work perfectly on a tandem bike.

Q: Would this work on a BMX?

A: It would depend on the size of your wheel, the EvoWheel comes in 20, 24, 26, 27.5, 29inches and 700C.

Q: Will the charging port have a dust cap to avoid dust and debris to get in?

A: Yes, the charging port has a dust cap preventing debris and dust to get in.

Q: I have a 28" wheel on my bike, which version of the wheel should I get?

A: For a 28" wheel size you can get the 700C wheel version that we're offering. They are exactly the same thing, just under a different name.

Q: How come I can't choose between 700C or 29in wheel?

We do apologize for this, but Indiegogo has an limit of only 5 items for each options, so we had to merge 700C and 29in together. A separate survey email will be dispatched to those who selected the 700C and 29in for you to select the correct size. 

Q: What's the voltage on the charger? Is it compatible for both 110V and 220V?

Our charger is rated from 100V ~ 240V, so you can rest assure that you can charge your EvoWheel no matter where you are in the world!

Q: Is the EvoWheel Waterproof? Will sand and dirt get in the charging port?

The EvoWheel has a dirt and water resistance rating of IP65 which means it is "dust tight" and protected against water projected from a nozzle from all directions. The charging port also have an attached dust cap to ensure no debris or dirt will get in.

Q: What is the expected lifetime of the batteries and are there any warranty on them?

The batter is rated to have a lifecycle of 1000 charges. We will have a 1-year warranty for the batteries when it gets shipped out of our factory. 

Q: Do I have to ship the wheel back to you for battery replacement or would I be able to change them myself?

We will be making a short instructional video after our campaign to show our supporters on how to change the battery themselves instead of shipping the wheel back to us.

Q: Is the battery proprietary, would there be issues for me to find replacements in the future?

The EvoWheel uses the common 18650 lithium battery which can be easily sourced nearly everywhere in the world nowadays.

Q: Is it possible to replace tubes, tires or spokes by myself or at a local bike shop?

The tubes and tires that come with EvoWheel are all standard international sizes which can be easily found in any local bike shops. The spokes are however customized and can be ordered from us at a low cost.

Q: Where can I download the App?

The App will become available on the Google Play store and the Apple App Store shortly before we start shipping out the EvoWheel.

 

Press and Media

Interested in writing or featuring EvoWheel on one of your upcoming articles or review? You can find a copy of our press kit here, high quality images here, and press release here. Feel free to reach out to us to chat more at info@evowheel.bike.

We also have a very solid manufacturing partners that who have over 20 years of experience in working with electric vehicles. We believe by combining our vast experience will prevents us from running into the pitfall of not being able to deliver a product on-time like other crowdfunding projects. However, while we can’t foresee the future, we will ensure we keep all of our supporters in the loop as we progress through production from sourcing raw materials, all the way to taking deliveries of the batteries being used in the EvoWheel. Your trust is very important to us as a company, and we will not risk anything to break that trust.  

Q: How does the EvoWheel work?
A: The EvoWheel is driven by a hub motor and engages once it detects forward momentum when you start riding the bike. You can set the power assist level before you start your ride with our APP or on the Bluetooth display unit.
Q: Will EvoWheel kick in without me pedaling?
A: No, you will need to pedal to activate the motor.
Q: Why is the delivery fee so expensive?
A: We’ve included both VAT and TAX for Canada and European Union. However, all supporters would be responsible for any additional TAX or VAT for their perspective countries. The delivery fee may also seem expensive because of the shipment of Lithium-Ion batteries which requires additional certifications and specialized packaging to be shipped.
Q: How does the EvoWheel work?
A: The EvoWheel is driven by a hub motor and engages once it detects forward momentum when you start riding the bike. You can set the power assist level before you start your ride with our APP or on the Bluetooth display unit.
Q: Can I use my electric bike battery together with the EvoWheel to extend range?
A: Unfortunately, you won't be able to use the battery with the EvoWheel. The battery for the EvoWheel is built into the wheel itself to save space, and provides a wireless experience for the rider.
Q: I have a bolt through axle on my forks is this compatible?
A: It would be incompatible if you have a bolt since the wheel is charged through the axle.
Q: Can I put EvoWheel on a wheelchair if the tires are the same as bike tires?
A: The EvoWheel is designed for bikes only so we wouldn’t suggest putting it on a wheelchair.
Q: What standard drop spacing the EvoWheel accommodate?
A. We use the standard international drop spacing of 100mm.
Q: Would EvoWheel work for fat bikes?
A: The widest tire we can accommodate is 2.1”(54mm), which fits standard drop spacing. Since most fat bikes come with non-standard dropout spacing, it wouldn’t work for fat bikes. We are however looking into introducing a fat tire version at a later date.
Q: Would EvoWheel work on a tandem bike?
A: Yes, it would work perfectly on a tandem bike.
Q: Would this work on a BMX?
A: It would depend on the size of your wheel, the EvoWheel comes in 20, 24, 26, 27.5, 29inches and 700C.
Q: Will the charging port have a dust cap to avoid dust and debris to get in?
A: Yes, the charging port has a dust cap preventing debris and dust to get in.
Q: I have a 28" wheel on my bike, which version of the wheel should I get?
A: For a 28" wheel size you can get the 700C wheel version that we're offering. They are exactly the same thing, just under a different name.
Q: How come I can't choose between 700C or 29in wheel?
We do apologize for this, but Indiegogo has an limit of only 5 items for each options, so we had to merge 700C and 29in together. A separate survey email will be dispatched to those who selected the 700C and 29in for you to select the correct size. 
Q: What's the voltage on the charger? Is it compatible for both 110V and 220V?
Our charger is rated from 100V ~ 240V, so you can rest assure that you can charge your EvoWheel no matter where you are in the world!
Q: Is the EvoWheel Waterproof? Will sand and dirt get in the charging port?
The EvoWheel has a dirt and water resistance rating of IP65 which means it is "dust tight" and protected against water projected from a nozzle from all directions. The charging port also have an attached dust cap to ensure no debris or dirt will get in.
Q: What is the expected lifetime of the batteries and are there any warranty on them?
The batter is rated to have a lifecycle of 1000 charges. We will have a 1-year warranty for the batteries when it gets shipped out of our factory. 
Q: Do I have to ship the wheel back to you for battery replacement or would I be able to change them myself?
We will be making a short instructional video after our campaign to show our supporters on how to change the battery themselves instead of shipping the wheel back to us.
Q: Is the battery proprietary, would there be issues for me to find replacements in the future?
The EvoWheel uses the common 18650 lithium battery which can be easily sourced nearly everywhere in the world nowadays.
Q: Is it possible to replace tubes, tires or spokes by myself or at a local bike shop?
The tubes and tires that come with EvoWheel are all standard international sizes which can be easily found in any local bike shops. The spokes are however customized and can be ordered from us at a low cost.
Q: Where can I download the App?
The App will become available on the Google Play store and the Apple App Store shortly before we start shipping out the EvoWheel.
 
Press and Media
Interested in writing or featuring EvoWheel on one of your upcoming articles or review? You can find a copy of our press kit here, high quality images here, and press release here. Feel free to reach out to us to chat more at info@evowheel.bike.

story:
SPECTRA | The World's Most Portable & Intelligent eBoard

 

SPECTRA is the first and only eBoard with an ever-learning 3D Posture Control system, ABS braking, and interactive app control. With built-in pressure and gyro sensors, SPECTRA learns your body's movements and riding style for a revolutionary ride. 

 

 

 

How SPECTRA Works

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 
  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 


 

 

Q: I am not living in the US, can I buy a SPECTRA?

A: Yes, but you just need to pay a little extra money to cover international shipping costs (The prices are as follows: SPECTRA Silver $100, SPECTRA Pro or Advanced $80, SPECTRA Mini $60, for most countries).   

Q: What is the width of each board?

A: SPECTRA Silver: 11"    SPECTRA Pro & Advanced: 11.1"   SPECTRA Mini: 9.5"

Q: What is the speed mode in the app specific mean?

A: In WALNUTT eBoard Go, you can switch 3 different speed mode, basically, only the Top Speed is different. Beginner: ~ 6 mph   Sport: ~ 11 mph   Pro：~ 22 mph *  

Q: Is the SPECTRA waterproof?

A: All SPECTRA models are weather/water resistant, but do not fully submerge any board.

Q: What could I do if my SPECTRA runs out of battery?

A: Because all SPECTRA models use in-hub motor systems, you can easily ride them just like a regular skateboard when the battery runs out, without feeling any resistance from hub motors. If you ride long enough, the Regenerative Braking technology will recharge your SPECTRA.

Q. Can I bring the SPECTRA on airplanes or check-in?

A: SPECTRA's battery is within 100wh, which is the international limitation of battery products in an airplane and it should be a carry-on. It also depends on the policy of local airports. Normally, domestic flights allow bringing such an electric product with motors while some of the international flights do not. Please check with the airport and airline before you fly with SPECTRA.

Q. Do I have to wear a helmet when I ride SPECTRA?

A: We would really recommend wearing a helmet, even if your state or country laws do not require it. Like we always insist, safety comes first!

Q. Is there any other color could I pick?

A: If you are talking about SPECTRA eBoard, we have to say sorry for no other colors yet. However, we will have different colors for the WALNUTT Backpack.  

Q. Can I pay by installments?

A: Sorry, we do not accept installments at the current stage in production.

Q. Where can I find the tech support if there is any issue with my SPECTRA?

A: You can always contact us in WALNUTT eBoard Go App, our Facebook page, our Instagram page, our website or shoot us an email: support@walnuttech.co.

Q. What is the return policy?

A: Don't worry! We get you here! We have 7-Day Satisfaction Guaranteed. 
We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchases. If you’re not happy with the product after the delivery, simply return it back to us for a full refund within 7 days. *
Items returned for refund must be returned within 7 days from delivery. Under no circumstances will we issue refunds after 7 days of delivery.

*Customers are responsible for shipping costs for all return claims, transaction fee charged by any third-party financial platform, such as PayPal, and are subject to restocking fee of 50% if the board has been ridden or are not in store bought condition with packaging in new, sellable form. A detailed return & refunding policies could be found on the support page of our website.

story:
WHAT IS BALIGHT?

Beyond a bike wheel light, Balight combines the most desired biking-related features into a single awesome device, including a customizable wheel display, social engagement app, ride data tracker, and a safety alarm. Aside from offering a fun and stylish appearance, it also allows cyclists to express their individuality, connect with others and improve their safety on the road.


WHAT MAKES BALIGHT AWESOME?


Design Perfection

  • Stylish Protection Shell

Balight is the first product in its class that remains ultra-slim even with a colorful protection shell. Its lightweight and streamlined design makes biking a breeze.


  • Minimalist Engineering

Each part could be easily detached and the wiring is minimal. With the well-designed engineering, Balight is easy to assemble and can withstand hard cycling.

The minimalist engineering video is here: video link

  • Amazing Wheel Display

Balight features 376 high-quality LEDs, capable to display over 16 million colors, with a level of brightness and image detail richness unsurpassed by any other product. Fun graphic options, plus it is completely customizable with your photo/designs.


Simple and Easy Using Balight App

Balight App download link: click here .

  • Customized Animations

Create your wheel display easily on-the-go with Balight app. Through a user-friendly app interface, you can enjoy creating your own patterns from the app's built-in tools or from pictures on your phone. To make adjustments or switch patterns during your ride, simply launch the Balight app or use your Bling Jet (mini remote control). Your customized Balight is a tap away.


GIF:

Playlist:

Photo display:

DIY:



  • Bling Jet control with Balight App

Bluetooth 4.0 Balight remote control, which can be attached to your handlebar. Simply press a button to change theme images while riding.


  • Added Features

We integrated many cool biking features into the Balight app to make your experience beyond awesome. Some of them include:


Powerful and Portable Battery

Ever worried about running out of power?
Balight's battery can last up to 10 hours(depending on the theme image and brightness). USB-connected, it is easy to recharge. Lightweight and removable, you can use it as a power bank for cellphones and other devices.


Safety

Safety is always our top concern. Balight will make your rides safer.

Waterproof test video link: click here .



Media


PRODUCTS SPECIFICATION


YOU WILL GET

What's in Balight box?

  • One or two wheel packs
  • Choose your favorite color (color options: yellow, gree, red, black)
  • Easy-to-install and use: start lighting your ride and using all the great features right away!

  • Available for Android or iPhone
  • Control various features of your Balight:
         Display graphics (preloaded or your own), safety alarm on/off, social                              networking, ride data collection and analysis
  • Free upgrades

  • Step-by-step illustrated guide and video... just minutes to be on the  road!
  • Support from our team for any questions.


Balights are distributed in US under patent license of Lightning Wheels,USA Patented:  7,271,813;  8,284,214;  and 8,411,108 and other patents pending.


PERKS


Attention!

As we offer Balight in 4 different colors, we will be contacting every backer after the crowdfunding campaign ends, so they can provide us with the color of their choice. Thanks for your support!


EXTRA BONUS

Note: bonus rewards will be exclusive and not be added up.


MILESTONES



ABOUT OUR TEAM

We are a team of young and passionate makers. We started developing Balight back in 2013 as an incubation project of Shenzhen MakerScope, a service platform for makers worldwide.


BALIGHT EVENT

New York Maker Faire 2015


Riding World

The riding world video is here: video link


RISKS & CHALLENGES

We've worked hard to eliminate the risks behind this project with all the work we've put in so far. We began with our idea in early 2013 and have worked through several improved versions of the product. We have done extensive testing and added the best features, such as the detachable and rechargeable battery.
Despite Balight being a huge hit at big electronics shows and successful sample product testing, we continued perfecting the product before fulfilling pre-orders. We have been super conservative in our timeline to ensure Balight is the best it can be, and that we can exceed expectations!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Please help us get the word out about Balight by sharing our campaign. Check out the share tools to the left for one-click sharing. Help us let anyone who loves cycling know about this cool new product!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q. Why do you charge the international shipping fee?
A. The gross weight of a Balight is about 1500g, so a shipping fee will apply on orders outside of China. By purchasing through our crowdfunding campaign, you are saving significantly over future retail price even with the added shipping cost. We may make the fee adjustment for re-grouped orders to the same address. Please contact us for details.

Q. How can I select a preferred color when I place an order?
A. As we offer Balight in 4 different colors, you can note your color selection along with your address information in your order.
And we will be contacting you via a backer survey or email to re-confirm your color selection after the crowdfunding campaign ends. Thanks for your support!

Q. Can I put my OWN PICTURES or TEXTS on the wheel?
A. Absolutely yes! Balight App will be free to download on the App Store shortly after the project ends. You can upload your own pictures or texts to the App or make your edits to the pre-loaded content. With a user-friendly interface, it's very easy to customize your display.

Q. At what distance does the anti-theft alarm work on the Balight App?
A. Between 5 to 25 meters.

story:
Bazooka California

The only full-size Beach Cruiser bike that can be taken with you anywhere. Take it to city transit, store it in your room’s closet or stash it in your car trunk. Bazooka cruiser bikes are not only fun to ride, but they also are easy to be carried around anywhere. Be it across the street or on the other side of the planet, Bazooka folding cruisers can be your companion wherever you go; thanks to its folding technology, and lightness. Its full size frame and tires with belt drive technology allows you to have the most joyful and safe rides just as any other conventional bike.  

Bazooka California Folding Bikes are more fun. Period.

Ride it. Fold it. Stash it

 

Here is how you fold a Bazooka California Bike in seconds

 

Why a Folding Beach Cruiser?

Well...there is no limit to the answer. So you can save space! 

Aside from riding it, here are just few of the many benefits...

You could ride it and look cool with it...

Perhaps you can take it to work! Here is the bike next to a small desk in a very small office.

Small Office

 Or maybe hide it in your closet whereas other conventional bikes are being vandalised or stolen out on the streets!

 

Beach Cruiser in your closet!

 Hide it so no one can see it...

Before we start, let us tell a little more about our story by going back in time: 

Bazooka folding Bikes company was formed back in 2002 in Vancouver, Canada with variety of folding bikes from 14” wheels to 26” full size folding mountain bikes. In 2005 we came up with the first concept of Folding Beach Cruisers with conventional chain and gearing system, which suddenly became one of Bazooka’s most popular folding bicycle. As the years went by, we have received many comments and requests from previous Bazooka folding bike owners, that wanted an improved version of the folding beach cruisers that are lighter, rust proof, and with better gearing system. Hence we came up with this new concept of Bazooka California, which is the Folding Beach Cruiser with better folding mechanism and carbon belt drive as well as Shimano internal hub gearing system.  

After several months of research and development and prototype making as well as listening to our past clients, we have finally come with the perfectly designed and functional prototype.

 

A beach cruiser is an nostalgic kind of bicycle. No matter where you ride it, or how old you are, the beach cruiser always brings your childhood memories, thus not only making your rides comfortable, but also emotional.  

Aside from all the sweet things about beach cruisers, there are 2 downside: 

They are extremely bulky and get rusted easily!

For this reason, we came up with World’s first Beach cruiser that is not only Folding, but also is with a Carbon Belt Drive System by industry leading Gates Carbon Drive with Shimano Nexus Internal Hub 3 Speed Gears! Will get to these a little further down this page...

Here are just a few problems that Bazooka California can solve for you:
Bazooka California folds and unfolds in only seconds (approximately 15 seconds give or take). No more hassles of removing the front wheels, or expensive car bike racks that are always a pain... 

 

Traditional bicycle chains are dirty, greasy and tend to fall many times. They also stretch, skip, are noisy and heavier.  Belt drives on the other hand, are always clean, dry and never fall, are quite and smoother. In addition, Bazooka California Bikes are lighter than conventional cruisers. Thanks to Gates Carbon Belt Drive System for making our bikes lighter.

Conventional derailleurs tend to skip often, are not accurate,  need more costly services, and cause chain falls. Shimano Nexus Internal Hub Gearing System is smooth, accurate and low maintenance

In addition to the above solutions, Bazooka California also comes with front and rear Fenders as well as industry leading WTB Thickslick Tires and belt guard so you will be able to ride smooth and clean in all weather conditions.

Bazooka California Anatomy

 

 

 

Bike Specs: 

• Frame & Fork: 7005 Aluminum Alloy 
• Headset: Neco Sealed bearings 
• Stem: Alloy 22.2mm x 25.4 
• Handlebar: Alloy Cruiser type
• Crank set: Prowheel Alloy (175mm) 
• Front Sprocket: 55T BCD 130 
• Rear Sprocket: CT1124NMN 24 T 
• Belt: 11M-122T-12CT Blue GACD 
• Seatpost: 27.2 x 350mm alloy black 
• Saddle: Wide cruiser style with springs
• Seat clamp: Alloy Quick release type 
• Pedals: VP components Folding type 
• Brake Caliper: Tektro V type front brake 
• Rims: Alloy double wall black 
• Spokes : Stainless Steel 14G black 
• Hub: Neco Sealed bearing 
• Tires: WTB Thickslick 26” x 2.0 
• Maximum Weight Limit: 250 lbs (113 kg)
• Recommended rider height range: 5'2” - 6'2" 
• Folded Dimensions: 39” x 11" x 27" or 99cm x 68cm x 28cm 
Bicycle weight : approx.. 30 lbs/ 13.5kg
SPEED: Available in 1 Speed, 3 Speed and 8 Speed

Which Frame Size is right for You?

Reward Tiers:

Here is what you will get with the respected Rewards:

All US and Canada backers get Free Shipping!

All Double Deal Rewards get 2 Carrying Bags at no cost!

 

Color Options:

The Bazooka California will come in 3 types 

California 1: Which is with classic single speed and rear coaster brake and front V-brakes, with industry leading Gates Carbon Drive

California 3 : Which will come with a with rear coaster brake,  front V-brakes and Shimano Nexus Internal Hub 3 Speed Gearing System, with industry Leading Gates Carbon Belt Drive

California 8 : Which will come with a with rear coaster brake, front V-brakes and Shimano Nexus Internal Hub 8 Speed Gearing System, with industry Leading Gates Carbon Belt Drive

All  models will come with:

Front and Rear Fenders

Belt Guard

Comfort Wide Saddle with Spring Shocks

Folding Pedals

Kickstand

Sizes  

Bazooka California Bikes will be available in 3 Frame Sizes to fit most heights:  

15" /  Small

17" / Medium

19" / Large

Carrying Bag Add on

Keep your bike clean and dust free in this optional Folding Carrying Bag. The bag is made from rugged Nylon, heavy duty zippers and robust webbing. Perfect for train or bus trips when you are bringing along your bike, or for storing your bike in your car, apartment, or boat for prolonged period of time. 



 

Craftsmanship

Bazooka California Folding bikes, will be made of high grade 7005 Aluminium Frame and Fork, with Stainless Steel parts which will make them very light, durable and rust proof. 

The frame and forks are welded with precision by experienced welders at our frame manufacturer

 

Gates Carbon Belt Drive

No Rust. No Grease. No Fooling

Free yourself from oily, rusty chains, and join the Gates Carbon Drive revolution. Clean. Smooth. Strong. These are the advantages of the Gates Carbon Drive™ System. Our carbon reinforced belts last longer than chains, never need grease and are nearly maintenance-free. Say goodbye to high-maintenance bike chains. Say hello to simplicity and fun. 

 

 

    

 

Shimano Nexus Internal Hub Gearing System

 

3 Speed Hub

 

8 Speed Hub

The Shimano Nexus 3 and 8  have revolutionised the bicycle industry gearing system. Their smooth gear shifting mechanism  will make your rides smooth and joyful. 

The Nexus 3 & 8 are with a built in rear Coaster Brake, which makes it very easy to stop or control your speed and makes your bike look more minimal due to one less cable going to the back of the bicycle.

Bazooka cruiser bikes are not only fun to ride, but they also are easy to be carried around anywhere. Be it across the street or on the other side of the planet, Bazooka folding cruisers can be your companion wherever you go; thanks to its folding technology, and lightness. Its full size frame and tires with belt drive technology allows you to have the most joyful and safe rides just as any other conventional bike.  Bazooka California Folding Bikes are more fun. Period.Ride it. Fold it. Stash it Here is how you fold a Bazooka California Bike in seconds Why a Folding Beach Cruiser?Well...there is no limit to the answer. So you can save space! Aside from riding it, here are just few of the many benefits...You could ride it and look cool with it...Perhaps you can take it to work! Here is the bike next to a small desk in a very small office.Small Office Or maybe hide it in your closet whereas other conventional bikes are being vandalised or stolen out on the streets! Beach Cruiser in your closet! Hide it so no one can see it...Before we start, let us tell a little more about our story by going back in time: Bazooka folding Bikes company was formed back in 2002 in Vancouver, Canada with variety of folding bikes from 14” wheels to 26” full size folding mountain bikes. In 2005 we came up with the first concept of Folding Beach Cruisers with conventional chain and gearing system, which suddenly became one of Bazooka’s most popular folding bicycle. As the years went by, we have received many comments and requests from previous Bazooka folding bike owners, that wanted an improved version of the folding beach cruisers that are lighter, rust proof, and with better gearing system. Hence we came up with this new concept of Bazooka California, which is the Folding Beach Cruiser with better folding mechanism and carbon belt drive as well as Shimano internal hub gearing system.  After several months of research and development and prototype making as well as listening to our past clients, we have finally come with the perfectly designed and functional prototype. A beach cruiser is an nostalgic kind of bicycle. No matter where you ride it, or how old you are, the beach cruiser always brings your childhood memories, thus not only making your rides comfortable, but also emotional.  Aside from all the sweet things about beach cruisers, there are 2 downside: They are extremely bulky and get rusted easily!For this reason, we came up with World’s first Beach cruiser that is not only Folding, but also is with a Carbon Belt Drive System by industry leading Gates Carbon Drive with Shimano Nexus Internal Hub 3 Speed Gears! Will get to these a little further down this page...Here are just a few problems that Bazooka California can solve for you:Bazooka California folds and unfolds in only seconds (approximately 15 seconds give or take). No more hassles of removing the front wheels, or expensive car bike racks that are always a pain...  Traditional bicycle chains are dirty, greasy and tend to fall many times. They also stretch, skip, are noisy and heavier.  Belt drives on the other hand, are always clean, dry and never fall, are quite and smoother. In addition, Bazooka California Bikes are lighter than conventional cruisers. Thanks to Gates Carbon Belt Drive System for making our bikes lighter.Conventional derailleurs tend to skip often, are not accurate,  need more costly services, and cause chain falls. 6'2" • Folded Dimensions: 39” x 11" x 27" or 99cm x 68cm x 28cm Bicycle weight : approx.. 30 lbs/ 13.5kgSPEED: Available in 1 Speed, 3 Speed and 8 SpeedWhich Frame Size is right for You?Reward Tiers:Here is what you will get with the respected Rewards:All US and Canada backers get Free Shipping!All Double Deal Rewards get 2 Carrying Bags at no cost! Color Options:The Bazooka California will come in 3 types California 1: Which is with classic single speed and rear coaster brake and front V-brakes, with industry leading Gates Carbon DriveCalifornia 3 : Which will come with a with rear coaster brake,  front V-brakes and Shimano Nexus Internal Hub 3 Speed Gearing System, with industry Leading Gates Carbon Belt DriveCalifornia 8 : Which will come with a with rear coaster brake, front V-brakes and Shimano Nexus Internal Hub 8 Speed Gearing System, with industry Leading Gates Carbon Belt DriveAll  models will come with:Front and Rear FendersBelt GuardComfort Wide Saddle with Spring ShocksFolding PedalsKickstandSizes  Bazooka California Bikes will be available in 3 Frame Sizes to fit most heights:  15" /  Small17" / Medium19" / LargeCarrying Bag Add onKeep your bike clean and dust free in this optional Folding Carrying Bag. The bag is made from rugged Nylon, heavy duty zippers and robust webbing. Perfect for train or bus trips when you are bringing along your bike, or for storing your bike in your car, apartment, or boat for prolonged period of time.  CraftsmanshipBazooka California Folding bikes, will be made of high grade 7005 Aluminium Frame and Fork, with Stainless Steel parts which will make them very light, durable and rust proof. The frame and forks are welded with precision by experienced welders at our frame manufacturer Gates Carbon Belt DriveNo Rust. story:
In March of 2013, a sweet baby girl by the name of Ruth was born to Dave and Heather Hayden. On the day after she received her booster shot for immunizations, their world turned upside down. Epilepsy! She experienced the first of hundreds of seizures and the family quickly had to become adjusted to a daily life of seizures, doctors and hospitals. The 3 older children learned to help watch her and notify the parents if she started having another seizure. She has been transported using life flight 4 times to Toledo Children's Hospital and transported to the hospital many, many other times by ambulance due to the length and severity of the seizures. Doctors at Toledo and Cleveland have been trying to adjust medications in the hopes that these seizures will no longer be an almost daily occurrence.

This family of 6 has a dilemma though. The vehicle they currently have only seats 5 and Dad uses it for transportation to and from work. On the occasions that an ambulance had to be called, Mom had to watch as Ruth was transported alone and could even follow in another car to be with her. Ruth has spent time in the PICU trying to stabilize her at least 3 times and numerous other times attempting to get these seizures to stop and diminish. And when Ruth spent 5 - 7 days in Toledo or Cleveland, Mom stayed with her with no transportation to get back and forth from home (over 50 miles with way).

What the Family is hoping for is enough funds to assist them in getting an 8 passenger van that could be used as a family vehicle and left at home for Mom during the day for emergency trips as needed. They are financially strapped with the ongoing medical trips to Hospitals, Doctors, Clinics and Pharmacies as well as the normal "young family" expenses we all experience. They are simply hoping that enough friends can assist them during their time of need. And if you know Dave and Heather, you know that they are the type to help anyone in any way they can and have done so with many friends. They are looking at vans in the $1800 to $2200 price range but obviously if more is given they will use the money wisely in their choice.

Please search in your heart and give what you can for this fantastic young family. There are ongoing medical trips as the doctors are still trying to find the right medications so this young baby doesn't have to experience daily tremors and/or seizures.

Thank you in advance.

story:
A double jeopardy downward spiral

Losing your drivers license really sucks

In case you haven't been following my comic/tragedy of a life over the last year and a half, here it is in a brief nutshell: Due to a string of personal calamities, being the victim of someone ELSE'S mental illness and meth addiction problems, and just plain bad luck, I've ended up homeless and for a while living in my car and off of the generosity and kindness of friends that I am eternally grateful and thankful for,

I am just now starting to dig my way up from this bottomless grave I have landed in.

  • Part of my misfortune was losing my drivers license.
        Because a meth head had been stealing my mail, I did not know that my tag had expired. And I got a ticket for that. But having no other choice but to live in my car and rely on it to get to the job I had (For a boss that would randomly decide not to pay me) I piled up even MORE tickets.
       The police like to identify and target cars that they know people are living out of, and when they run you out of one place, they pull you over and give you another ticket.
        For someone that is in dire straits as I was, there is really no way to dig yourself out of it. Pray that you never end up in this situation.

  • If you can't drive, you can't get to a job, if you can't get to a job then you can't afford to drive. If your license gets revoked, then you can't drive to find a job, which you need in order to pay off the tickets.

    It becomes a very vicious circle and downward spiral. And it is nearly impossible to stop the cycle and head back up again without some help.

    In my case, I need to pay off nearly $1200 in tickets and fines, and another couple hundred to get my old Volvo insured and legal. So I need to raise $1500, if not more to get legal.

    There ARE jobs out there, and I could start working and crawling my way out of this. But as it is I have no other way to raise the cash then to ask kind and generous people for donations.

It is a situation that I simply cannot find my way out of.

I need my drivers license back, and my car road-worthy.

Here is the deal:

  • I need to pay off almost $1200 in traffic tickets and fines. I have tried making payments of $5 here and $2 there. But even that is a problem for someone in my situation. Driving without insurance is a heavy ticket, just under DUI. (I have never got a DUI) I got two of those tickets. And I got three for expired tags, and 3 for driving on suspended drivers license.
    SO, I need $1200 to pay the tickets and get my license re-instated. And about $300 to insure my car and get it registered.
  • With most of these crowd funding deals, they offer "perks". Some sort of token of appreciation. Coffee mugs, umbrellas, CDs or whatever. Those things cost money to make and mail out. And my fund raiser is about raising the flat out cash I need to pay off my tickets and get insurance. In this case it is counter-intuitive to spend money while trying to raise money.

    Especially when I am just hoping to get a lot of people to just throw me $5 or $10 or whatever they can spare rather then going for huge $1,000 donations.

  • The funds will go right into the county coffers to pay the tickets. Ugh. Even if I do not raise the whole $1500, I can at least pay off a decent chuck of those tickets and fines.

The Impact

With legal driving privileges and a legal car, I can then go out and find a job. And with that I can afford to drive the car. And in that I can slowly get the money together to find my own place to stay, and stop being homeless and relying on the kindness and generosity of others.

  • I Will eventually be a tax paying citizen!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't spare the $5 or whatever, but still wish to help me out, perhaps you could forward this along to people that you feel might be able to help.

  • Please don't just spam this randomly everywhere. Maybe just to people who would be able to help or at least would entertain the notion.
  • There are some Indiegogo share tools that you can use to forward this on.

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

The Little Loving Hand is a Vietnamese charity comprised of youth who aim to 

provide support for the less fortunate in the city of Hue. We reach out to 

families and children who are living in unsafe and substandard living 

conditions. 

Having been brought up in this beautiful but underdeveloped city, we realise 

how blessed we are to receive food, education, and entertainment, while 

many out there are still suffering from poverty everyday. We aspire to make a 

difference in our little hometown Hue and eventually across Vietnam in the 

future. 

Our website: https://www.facebook.com/teambantaynho


What We Need & What You Get


February is drawing near, which means that the most awaited festival – Tet, 

or New Year – is approaching. Many usher in the New Year by taking a few 

days off from work, organising reunions with family and friends, and spending 

a little more than usual on oneself and others. 

As we are aware of those who struggle to make ends meet on a daily basis, 

we were hoping to spread some joy and good fortune around us this New 

Year. We paid a visit to one of the poorest villages in Thuong Long, Nam 

Dong, Hue, where Co Tu, an ethnic minority, are living. A majority of people in 

this community are victims of poverty and disability, and many of the children 

are orphans. 

The Little Loving Hand wishes to celebrate a joyful Tet with the Co Tu this 

year. To help them out, we hope to raise funds worth 1,500 USD which will 

cover:

- 103 gifts worth 515 USD in total for 103 poor Co Tu families, and

- 50 gifts worth 500 USD in total for families seeking special aid.


The Impact


Every little bit of help goes a long way. We would deeply appreciate any 

contributions you may have to offer. Thus far, we have received:

- 2,300,000 VND (= approx. 115 USD)

- 2 large bags of clothing

- 25kg of rice

We know that it will be a challenge to meet our goals, but if each of us just 

shares that one extra coin, we can help usher in the most unforgettable Tet 

for the Co Tu and bring smiles to their faces!


Other Ways You Can Help


All forms of support are welcome! Clothing, books, food – anything. 

Something small from you could mean a lot to us and the Co Tu people.

Thank you so much for your time and support.

Best regards,
