story:
What is Community Car Sharing?

My name is Takehiko Yoshizawa and I am the representative director of Japan Car Sharing Association.


Great East Japan Earthquake

It is well known throughout the world that Japan was affected by the Great East Japan Earthquake occurred on March 11, 2011. A magnitude 9.0 class earthquake associated with massive Tsunami not only destroyed many houses and facilities, but also killed 15,889 people and 2,598 people are still missing. This earthquake has even triggered the meltdown of the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. Nearly 260,000 people have lost their homes and evacuated to the temporary shelters (i.e. elementary school) are still living in the temporary housings provided by the Japanese government. These people are looking forward to move into the post-disaster public housing which is now under construction.


Setting Up a Car Sharing System in Ishinomaki City

In Ishinomaki City, a harbor town of Miyagi Prefecture which suffered the largest losses of life and property, almost 60,000 cars were lost by the Tsunami and serious car shortage was resulted after the Great East Japan Earthquake. As Ishinomaki City is a rather rural city, daily life will be very difficult for those residents without a car. For these reasons, I hastily rushed to the scene for setting up a car sharing system in the temporary housing area by utilizing the used cars donated from all over Japan. Gradually, we started to receive supports and donations from all over the world. We are now having 65 cars for the victims living in the temporary housing areas to share.

The distinctiveness of our car sharing system is that the whole operation is running solely by the local community and the victims themselves. The local people took all the roles such as management of the car keys and arrangement of the reservations, while the money donated from the car users were used for car maintenance. Voluntary pick-up services were also developed from this system. As this system was originated from the disaster sites and it plays an important role in the community revitalization, we would like to name it as “Community Car Sharing”.


Our New Challenge

Recently, we are working to create a new challenge with this Community Car Sharing. Since the temporary housing residents will start to move into the post-disaster public housing from this spring, we would like to implement the same Community Car Sharing by providing electric-vehicles and solar panels to these new public housing complexes for the uses of its new residents. To begin with, a model case of this system will be implemented in a larger-scale housing complex with approximately 200 families.

This program will offer a community model that shares ecology, disaster prevention and transportation. It will certainly be an important factor for creating an eco-friendly society and there is a further important meaning in doing this in the disaster area. Not only using for daily transportation, electric vehicles could also be an important power source during the emergency. Since people in the disaster area have all experienced and suffered several months of inconvenient life without electricity, we believe the electric vehicles carrying electricity could provide the residents a sense of security.

Although Japan is a developed country, we are still behind on making effective uses of the natural energy resources. In this situation, this campaign may help the local governments in the disaster area of Great East Japan Earthquake to stand up and rebuild their cities into a “Smart City”. If this project succeeds, we will use this activity as a model case for further expansion.

Thank you for your cooperation!



The Impact

Ecology, transportation, community revitalization and disaster prevention has been the common important themes throughout the world. This project is utilizing electric vehicles running by solar energy and self-managed by local community to solve these problems. We believe the same model could be convertible and implemented to any other regions of the world on to solve the same problems.

Moreover, we have been using 65 used-cars on car sharing after the earthquake and this activity has offered considerable contributions to the community’s growth, revitalization, and disaster prevention. Since the project is not starting with something completely new but to create a livable environment according to our past achievements, we believe the project will have a high possibility of success.



Risks & Challenges

This project is initiated with the cooperation of the Ishinomaki City municipal government through the financial support of the Mitsubishi Corporation East Japan Earthquake Recovery Fund. However, since enormous amount of funds are still required for the city reconstruction, the municipal government is facing difficulties to spare financial supports to this project. In this respect, we decided to raise more funds through Indiegogo.

At this point, we have already gathered the necessary tools and machinery for this project. However, we still require certain financial backings to maintain and continue our operation. We are seeking supports from all over the world to enable our further development of these new communities in the disaster areas reconstructed after the Great East Japan Earthquake and provide a better living circumstance for the victims there. Moreover, we hope such successful example could also be helpful to other global disasters in the future. Along with everyone’s support to this Community Car-Sharing project, we could develop a beneficial system in this disaster area, Ishinomaki City of Miyagi Prefecture (Japan), and diffuse it to other parts of the world. Therefore, your support is greatly appreciated.



Rewards

Project report
= Send through e-mail

Thank you letter
= Delivered to your home

Japanese pattern drink coaster
= Cup coaster made by the victims using Japanese kimono textile

Japanese pattern business card case
= Business card case made by the victims using Japanese kimono textile

Skype tour
= Our organization member will give you a tour around Ishinomaki City through Skype

Your name inscribed on the electric vehicle
= With our heartfelt gratitude, we would like to inscribe you name on the electric vehicle to be used in the post-disaster public housing

Your name inscribed on the public utilities to be donated to the post-disaster public housing
= We will purchase utilities (i.e. bench seats) and donate it to the post-disaster public housing with your name inscribed


Special Thanks

This campaign is supported by Oen Monaka which is a project started with aim to support the small-scale voluntary organizations working in the disaster areas of the Great East Japan Earthquake. For more details, please visit their website.

story:
We are NOVEL Racing Japan

We are NOVEL Racing Japan, Motorsports product developers and global tuner for all Lexus F model vehicles.  We are simply Lexus Enthusiasts that have a dream of bringing Lexus vehicles to the forefront of Motorsports in a global perspective.  In partnership with Ring Racing Germany, we have been developing the Lexus IS F and RC F platforms for endurance racing in the VLN Series for the past 3 years.  Its has been an incredible journey with many successes as well as challenges.  

With this being our 4th year competing in the 24 hours at Nürburgring, our goal is to capture the Championship in the SP8 Class on June 20-23, 2019 at the world renown Nürburgring in Germany.
 

We request your support to help us make history

We are requesting a total of $50,000 USD. This program began as a passion project by some like minded, and possibly a bit crazy, Lexus enthusiasts that just wanted to see a Lexus power through one of the world’s toughest circuits.  Contrary to what it may seem, we are a privately funded team with limited resources and we are asking for the support of any enthusiasts that would love to join our team and play a part in what we hope to be a big part of Lexus history.  Any support we gain from this campaign will go entirely to developing and enhancing the team's resources.  Specifically for spare parts, tires, engine components as backups to help carry us to the 24 hour finish line.

 

The Cars

LEXUS RC F (SP8 class) 
Vehicles equipped with safety equipment according to circuit regulation based on commercial vehicles The engine and transmission use genuine (normal) and mainly use suspension parts, brakes and aerodynamic parts and race parts. Base vehicle name LEXUS RC F CHASSIS &

BODY 
Body size 4705 x 1950 x 1290 mm (total length x total width x total height) 
Vehicle weight 1400kg 
Wheel base 2730mm 
transmission 6-speed 2-pedal transmission (normal AT) 
Drive type 2WD 
Boarding capacity 1 person Engine V type 8 cylinder (2UR-GSE) 
Displacement 5000cc 
Highest output 480 hp or more

 

LEXUS RC F GT3 (SP9 class)
The GT3 vehicle category, the highest category of touring car races built based on commercial vehicles
Base vehicle name LEXUS RC F GT3
CHASSIS & BODY
Body size 4846 x 2030 x 1271 mm (total length x total width x total height)
Vehicle weight 1300kg
Wheel base 2770 mm
Transmission 6-speed sequential transaxle (paddle shift)
Drive type 2WD
Boarding capacity 1 person
Engine V type 8 cylinder (2UR-GSE)
Displacement 5400cc
Highest output 500ps or more

Our Mission, Aspiration and Dream.

We want to represent, support and bring honor to the Japanese Automotive Enthusiast community globally by bringing home a championship win, so that we can all celebrate that thing that binds us all together; our love of Japanese cars.  As a private team campaigning a Lexus RC F, we feel the weight of the responsibility or representing the community on the global stage.  In fact, the first 2 years of our program’s development, it was even difficult to just complete the 24 hour race.  As our program developed, our knowledge expanded and our experience grew, we were able to persevere and even finish the 2018 24 Hour race with a final result of 2nd and 3rd place in class.  We need your help for that final push to achieve that 1st place victory for 2019.   

Rising to the Challenges

How – The battle will be hard, the hours long and the final push to the championship tremendous.  However, we believe with the support of the community we can take steps closer in realizing that championship goal.  How we believe we can achieve that is through additional vehicle upgrades and development, a stronger driver line-up and further development of our team.

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow our story and cheer us on as we take on the world.  The odds and teams are stacked against us, but we have a very clear dream and we aim to make it a reality with the support of the community.

story:
Do you love visiting Tahoe, but hate driving there?

If you live in the Bay Area and visit Lake Tahoe over the weekend, driving is currently the only option. Let's fix that! Tahoe Convoy will be a new luxury weekend shuttle, leaving the Bay Area on Friday night and returning Sunday night, all year. Separate routes will extensively cover the Bay Area, with direct access to both the North and South shores of the lake. We'll travel on the same posh buses that tech commuters enjoy during the workweek, featuring reclining seats, large windows, real-time arrival tracking, WiFi and restrooms.

Are you seeking a relaxing journey to Tahoe? You are not alone! A recent survey revealed:

  • 58% of Bay Area residents would ride transit to Tahoe if it existed
  • 38% would visit Tahoe more frequently
  • 24 million people in 10 million cars visit Tahoe each year

Clearly there is demand for a better way to get to Tahoe.

Ride a bus that's faster than driving

The worst part about driving to Tahoe are the winter road closures and chain control checkpoints, where cars can be parked on the freeway for hours. To keep on schedule, Tahoe Convoy will parter with state highway agencies to prioritize bus access, getting you there faster than driving!

Even on days when Tahoe Convoy is no faster than driving, it will feel faster on the shuttle. Passengers will be free to chat with friends, enjoy the scenery, have a drink, or even continue working, rather than being focused on stressful nighttime driving. 

Tahoe Convoy will not own any buses nor employ any drivers. Instead, we will charter from the Bay Area's fleet of 789 commuter shuttles that are driven during the workweek but currently parked during the weekend. Every Friday, Tahoe Convoy will dispatch as many buses as necessary to fulfill all ticket purchases, meaning we will never sell out, even during an epic powder weekend or the 4th of July holiday. You can count on Tahoe Convoy!

Do I need a car to get around Lake Tahoe?

Not at all! The Tahoe Basin is continually enhancing its local transit and bikeway networks. New improvements include:

  • Expanded local bus frequency and late-night hours of operation
  • Comprehensive bike path network
  • Dockless bikeshare systems

Also, both Lyft and Uber operate at Lake Tahoe. For a seamless last-mile connection from your Tahoe Convoy stop to your final Lake Tahoe destination, ridehails can now be scheduled in advance through either app from the comfort of the shuttle, with your ride waiting for you at the stop. 

There is no reason to bring your car to Tahoe! Save your money. Over the 400-mile round trip, driving your car costs $214, omitting additional costs for chain installation, car wash, parking fees, bridge tolls, and of course the value of your time. In comparison, a round trip for two on Tahoe Convoy only costs $188.

Where are Tahoe Convoy routes and stops?

Two separate routes will provide extensive coverage across the Bay Area, with a northern route originating in San Francisco and a southern route serving the South Bay. At Lake Tahoe, two routes will provide direct access to the North and South shores.

Every weekend, at least two Tahoe Convoy shuttles will operate, covering the entire network. During higher ridership weekends, additional coaches will be dispatched, enabling the grouping of passengers by destination and creating express service with fewer stops and no transfers.

Exact stop locations are still being finalized. In the Bay Area, stops will be located at BART and Caltrain stations, Park and Ride lots, and major employment centers, allowing commuters to head to the mountains on Friday straight from work. Passengers can board and alight at any stop on both Friday and on Sunday; this enables boarding the shuttle from work on Friday night, but on the Sunday return trip, alighting close to home.

At Lake Tahoe, stops will be located at major resorts, and at supermarkets so visitors can procure groceries for the weekend. All stop locations will be covered and well-lighted, protecting waiting passengers from the weather.

How soon can I ride Tahoe Convoy?

Tahoe Convoy begins service on February 2, 2018. Book your seat now!

Can I bring my skis and bike on the shuttle?

Tahoe Convoy will have ample storage room for your gear. You can bring your skis, snowboard, boots, and all typical winter equipment.

Outside bike racks on shuttles will be available to customers by requesting access through the ticket reservation. Bikes will also be transportable in bike boxes stored in the luggage compartment without requiring a reservation.

What will Tahoe Convoy tickets cost?

You can purchase tickets vouchers right now as perks through this campaign, at steep discounts! Vouchers will never expire, so lock in these low prices. You can purchase 1, 2, 4, 8 or 10 one-way ticket vouchers, with increasing discounts.

After we commence operation, we expect ticket prices to be about $45-$75 per one-way ticket. Similar to the vouchers, there will be discounts for tickets purchased in bulk, as well as for tickets purchased in advance. We will have a customer loyalty program to reward passengers who travel frequently and refer their friends. We also will partner with Lake Tahoe ski resorts and hotels to sell package deals combining transportation, lodging and activities with one click.

As a self-sustaining transit enterprise without any government subsidies, Tahoe Convoy will relentlessly focus on the comfort, convenience and safety of the passenger experience. Our bottom line will be ridership, and toward that end, we will strive to minimize ticket prices and travel times in a virtuous cycle:

We'll use the money raised through this campaign to file our permits and get up and running. Once we commence operation, we will remain financially solvent through continued ticket sales.

Can Tahoe locals ride Tahoe Convoy to the Bay Area?

Of course! Tahoe locals can ride the shuttle west to the Bay Area on any Sunday night, and return east to Lake Tahoe on any Friday night.

Who is sponsoring Tahoe Convoy, and why?

Tahoe Convoy is the endeavor of Greg Riessen, Bay Area native, with assistance from his sons. Greg's family has wasted too much time stuck in traffic going to Tahoe. We want to upgrade the travel experience for Bay Area residents seeking their Tahoe getaway, while also preserving the beauty of Lake Tahoe for future generations. Greg is a traffic engineer and transport planner with a reputation for innovation, and Tahoe Convoy is the outcome of several years of investigation and development.

The economy of the Tahoe Basin needs to grow, but is held back by crippling traffic congestion and lack of transit. Meanwhile, pollution from cars has been linked to declining lake clarity and air quality. Beyond improving travel options for Bay Area visitors, Tahoe Convoy will be the foundation of a sustainable visitor-oriented economy for Lake Tahoe. By riding the shuttle, not only will you give yourself back those eight hours to relax, but you will also do your part to help Tahoe thrive while preserving its pristine environment.

How do I learn more about Tahoe Convoy?

  • Visit our website
  • Read our FAQ
  • Send us a message or email

Tahoe Convoy is a production of Getaway Transit LLC.

story:
Short Summary

  • I am I high school student studying in San Francisco and am trying to bring an idea to market to revolutionize where you fly your drone.
  • This campaign will help fund and complete the development of this idea, bringing it to life for all.
  • By helping fund the project, you will be part of an app and can tell all your friends that you helped create this awesome app! 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I am trying to raise $1000 to help cover the initial costs of launching the app as well as cover the cost for servers and future updates.   
  • By helping this app come to life, you can say that you were there when it all started and were one of the people who got it off the ground!
  • If for whatever reason, I do not meet my goal, then the app will still be launched, but it will take longer to finish.

The Impact

  • This app is going to change the way you use your drone and can take you on adventures finding new places to fly.
  • I already have a working beta being tested on phones and the project is ready to launch. The $1,000 funding will help pay for the various developing accounts and servers.

Risks & Challenges

Some of the changes that I will face are user adoption and creating a sustainable way to keep the app running in the long term.
  • I plan to get the app out in the world by reaching out  with YouTubers and using basic advertising and social media.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are so many ways to help and you can help besides funding the campaign.

  • You can simply get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Or download the app when it's available on the App Store. Sign up here to be notified when it launches.  http://lnc.hr/SR6Th

story:
Do you like the look of an analog car dashboard but also like the features a digital dashboard gives you? Or are you simply looking to customize your ride? Then we have the perfect product for you! 

Introducing the BMW Retrofit Cluster

This digital cluster is not only able to give you the look and feel of an analog dashboard -- it will also allow you the change the look of the whole dashboard with the switch of a button -- You can choose from different dashboard styles preloaded on the cluster and in future download many styles or add-ons on our website. Simply load them onto your USB and plug it in your cluster. It will automatically be updated.

This digital dashboard opens the door to so many more possibilities than any analog cluster ever could. The BMW Retrofit Cluster allows you to implement a near endless number of different skins and features like rear view camera options, customizable startup animations, instant MpH to KpH conversion and additional gauges just to name a few. 


This is the ultimate must have for any BMW enthusiast who wants to spice up their ride.

 

The BMW Retrofit Cluster is almost in the last stages of product testing. Over 90% of the work has already been done so when you support our campaign you are guaranteed to receive your promised product. We only need the last push to take this product to a level where we and especially you will be satisfied with.

Not only will your support help us with further development and production of this cluster, but more importantly it allows us to start development of additional custom-made skins and features to give you the ability to completely customize your cluster to your taste. 

 

At the moment we are able to offer the BMW Retrofit Cluster for the following models:

E81, E82, E87, E88, E90, E91, E92, E93, E60, E61, E63, E64, E84, E83 E70, E71

 

In addition to our retrofit cluster we will develop a unique cluster cover for the following models which makes this retrofit just like an OE cluster. This cluster will be delivered as a plug and play cluster for your car.

The unique cluster cover will ONLY be available for the following models:

E60, E61, E63, E64, E70, E71, E90, E91, E92, E93 

 

For the E81, E82, E87, E88, E65, E66, E84, E83  models we don't offer a unique cluster cover but we will offer a bracket and gauge-plate to mount the retrofit cluster in your dashboard. For these models you have to do some rework on your original cluster cover to maintain the OE integrated look.

Our retrofit cluster for BMW is built upon ID4motion digital cluster platform which means that the entire product is developed and produced with Dutch quality. With our developed hardware, software and graphical user interface we can make anything what is attracting for BMW drivers. 

The idea started more than a year ago while working for a large OEM that desperately was looking for a nicely integration of an LCD display in a vehicle dashboard. We integrated a 12.3-Inch display into a BMW E6x series attached with the original instrument cluster cover which made a perfectly solution for our project. But when starting this aftermarket project we faced some challenges. 

  • The cluster has to fit different BMW models. 
  • The 12.3-Inch display is hard to integrate in the dashboard because of the large size.
  • We wanted to have a more ‘open’ style of display without fixed rings (more freedom in design) 
  • We needed to lower the cost price in order to have a better sales price for you.

In meantime we have changed our development to a 10.3-inch display which is smaller and also of   “Automotive grade” and thus fits better for our aftermarket project. Because of the smaller size it now also fits the smaller dashboards like E9x and E8x. Everybody happy so far! Our estimation is that we are going to sell more displays since we have a wider target market, so we could calculate a lower price. The user will not notice the smaller display besides slightly different design, but still the same size of speed and RPM dials are possible. We also listened to you by leaving out the BMW fixed rings so we are now able to create more fancy graphical user interfaces. And finally, the development of a custom cover is now easier and cheaper.

Overall, we are happy that we have  chosen this setup because we could all benefit from this!

Summary

- Standalone digital cluster with 10.3-Inch Automotive Grade display

- Behaves according to signals from BMW

- Optional unique cluster cover for a selection of BMW models, other models can choose for bracket and gauge plate

Functionality:

Speedometer, RPM, fuel level, date and time, odo and trip meter, cruise control, MPG gauge 

Indicators:

Direction left and right, gears (automatic transmission), sportbutton (automatic transmission), high beam, LDW, cruise control, foglight front and rear, airbag, seatbelt, active steering, handbrake, brakefluid, DTC and ABS, check state, CE, TPMS

(Functionality is only working if vehicle has these options already available) 

In the cluster menu you can manage following functions: metric/imperial (km/h / mp/h), brightness, change available parameters, change to available GUI (skin)

With the available USB port on the cluster you can do future feature or GUI updates. We are planning on some fantastic nice features soon.

After selecting a perk you are able to select add-ons. There are different add-ons available but these are depending on what is available for your selected cluster package. Please go through all the perks and add-ons before making your final choice. Available add-ons for example are: vehicle cable adapter, unique cover, bracket, your flavor of unique software updates like updated dials or adding a coolant fluid temperature or oil temperature gauge. 

Warranty is 1 year and limited to replace of product or if ID4motion decides, a (partly) refund. No costs or liability for (dis)assembly or damage to vehicle or persons.  

 

We are ID4motion, expert in designing, developing and producing tailored UI, UX in vehicle systems which can be used as digital instrument clusters, infotainment systems and control displays.

Over the past 10 years we have gained a lot of experience producing these tailor made products for small and large OEM's all around the world. We will use this experience and our amazing team of designers and engineers to ensure we will deliver you a quality product for a low price.  We promise our product will enhance the user experience and meet tomorrow’s tech standards.  

A few of our satisfied customers. 

 

 

We want to expand this library with many new skins and features and have even started designing some new concepts.

We don't want to do this all by ourselves though.  We want to listen to your suggestions and ideas. In this way you have more control over what is made and it allows us to make products you actually want.
 

 

We would be nowhere without our incredible team of professional designers and engineers. It's because of their combined capabilities we can guarantee quality products will roll out of these factory doors within a few months! We can't list our entire team but here are some of the key figures of the BMW Retrofit Cluster project. 

 

This is your chance to own a unique high-quality aftermarket product that will give you the ability to customize your ride and that gives you the ability to connect with your vehicle.

Disclaimer

Our digital instrument cluster is EMC certified before shipping and will contain Automotive Grade display. ID4motion is not liable for any damage to your car or to any persons. We put effort in development and production according to Automotive regulations and standards however we cannot guarantee that our product is street legal in your country. 

All the mentioned prices are excl. VAT and excl. customs clearance costs  (if applicable). If you have questions concerning VAT or clearance please ask us before ordering.
story_txt:
Do you like the look of an analog car dashboard but also like the features a digital dashboard gives you? Or are you simply looking to customize your ride? Then we have the perfect product for you! Introducing the BMW Retrofit ClusterThis digital cluster is not only able to give you the look and feel of an analog dashboard -- it will also allow you the change the look of the whole dashboard with the switch of a button -- You can choose from different dashboard styles preloaded on the cluster and in future download many styles or add-ons on our website. Simply load them onto your USB and plug it in your cluster. It will automatically be updated.This digital dashboard opens the door to so many more possibilities than any analog cluster ever could. The BMW Retrofit Cluster allows you to implement a near endless number of different skins and features like rear view camera options, customizable startup animations, instant MpH to KpH conversion and additional gauges just to name a few. This is the ultimate must have for any BMW enthusiast who wants to spice up their ride. The BMW Retrofit Cluster is almost in the last stages of product testing. Over 90% of the work has already been done so when you support our campaign you are guaranteed to receive your promised product. We only need the last push to take this product to a level where we and especially you will be satisfied with.Not only will your support help us with further development and production of this cluster, but more importantly it allows us to start development of additional custom-made skins and features to give you the ability to completely customize your cluster to your taste.  At the moment we are able to offer the BMW Retrofit Cluster for the following models:E81, E82, E87, E88, E90, E91, E92, E93, E60, E61, E63, E64, E84, E83 E70, E71 In addition to our retrofit cluster we will develop a unique cluster cover for the following models which makes this retrofit just like an OE cluster. This cluster will be delivered as a plug and play cluster for your car.The unique cluster cover will ONLY be available for the following models:E60, E61, E63, E64, E70, E71, E90, E91, E92, E93  For the E81, E82, E87, E88, E65, E66, E84, E83  models we don't offer a unique cluster cover but we will offer a bracket and gauge-plate to mount the retrofit cluster in your dashboard. For these models you have to do some rework on your original cluster cover to maintain the OE integrated look.Our retrofit cluster for BMW is built upon ID4motion digital cluster platform which means that the entire product is developed and produced with Dutch quality. With our developed hardware, software and graphical user interface we can make anything what is attracting for BMW drivers. The idea started more than a year ago while working for a large OEM that desperately was looking for a nicely integration of an LCD display in a vehicle dashboard. We integrated a 12.3-Inch display into a BMW E6x series attached with the original instrument cluster cover which made a perfectly solution for our project. But when starting this aftermarket project we faced some challenges. 
The cluster has to fit different BMW models. 
The 12.3-Inch display is hard to integrate in the dashboard because of the large size.
We wanted to have a more ‘open’ style of display without fixed rings (more freedom in design) 
We needed to lower the cost price in order to have a better sales price for you.
In meantime we have changed our development to a 10.3-inch display which is smaller and also of   “Automotive grade” and thus fits better for our aftermarket project. Because of the smaller size it now also fits the smaller dashboards like E9x and E8x. Everybody happy so far! Our estimation is that we are going to sell more displays since we have a wider target market, so we could calculate a lower price. The user will not notice the smaller display besides slightly different design, but still the same size of speed and RPM dials are possible. We also listened to you by leaving out the BMW fixed rings so we are now able to create more fancy graphical user interfaces. And finally, the development of a custom cover is now easier and cheaper.Overall, we are happy that we have  chosen this setup because we could all benefit from this!Summary- Standalone digital cluster with 10.3-Inch Automotive Grade display- Behaves according to signals from BMW- Optional unique cluster cover for a selection of BMW models, other models can choose for bracket and gauge plateFunctionality:Speedometer, RPM, fuel level, date and time, odo and trip meter, cruise control, MPG gauge Indicators:Direction left and right, gears (automatic transmission), sportbutton (automatic transmission), high beam, LDW, cruise control, foglight front and rear, airbag, seatbelt, active steering, handbrake, brakefluid, DTC and ABS, check state, CE, TPMS(Functionality is only working if vehicle has these options already available) In the cluster menu you can manage following functions: metric/imperial (km/h / mp/h), brightness, change available parameters, change to available GUI (skin)With the available USB port on the cluster you can do future feature or GUI updates. We are planning on some fantastic nice features soon.After selecting a perk you are able to select add-ons. There are different add-ons available but these are depending on what is available for your selected cluster package. Please go through all the perks and add-ons before making your final choice. Available add-ons for example are: vehicle cable adapter, unique cover, bracket, your flavor of unique software updates like updated dials or adding a coolant fluid temperature or oil temperature gauge. Warranty is 1 year and limited to replace of product or if ID4motion decides, a (partly) refund. No costs or liability for (dis)assembly or damage to vehicle or persons.   We are ID4motion, expert in designing, developing and producing tailored UI, UX in vehicle systems which can be used as digital instrument clusters, infotainment systems and control displays.Over the past 10 years we have gained a lot of experience producing these tailor made products for small and large OEM's all around the world. We will use this experience and our amazing team of designers and engineers to ensure we will deliver you a quality product for a low price.  We promise our product will enhance the user experience and meet tomorrow’s tech standards.  A few of our satisfied customers.   We want to expand this library with many new skins and features and have even started designing some new concepts.We don't want to do this all by ourselves though.  We want to listen to your suggestions and ideas. In this way you have more control over what is made and it allows us to make products you actually want.  We would be nowhere without our incredible team of professional designers and engineers. It's because of their combined capabilities we can guarantee quality products will roll out of these factory doors within a few months! We can't list our entire team but here are some of the key figures of the BMW Retrofit Cluster project.  This is your chance to own a unique high-quality aftermarket product that will give you the ability to customize your ride and that gives you the ability to connect with your vehicle.DisclaimerOur digital instrument cluster is EMC certified before shipping and will contain Automotive Grade display. ID4motion is not liable for any damage to your car or to any persons. We put effort in development and production according to Automotive regulations and standards however we cannot guarantee that our product is street legal in your country. All the mentioned prices are excl. VAT and excl. customs clearance costs  (if applicable). If you have questions concerning VAT or clearance please ask us before ordering.

story:
One of the biggest problems of the environmental debate is that everyone points the finger up to someone else. The driver of a car points up to the airplane, the airplane points up to the giant cruise ship, the cruise ship to the heating and airconditioning of the houses, and these ones accuse the cars, meaning “you pollute the air, so you have to start!”; the result is that nobody does anything.

So let’s start, roaming the streets and cleaning them from the stinky gasoline scooters that pollute the environment. We will replace them with electric scooters which are anyway much better for the mobility in the city, especially in warm regions of the world. It can be a supplement to the car or its replacement or even a replacement to public transportation, as it is not possible to expand public transportation to the extent to be considered a real alternative to a car or scooter.

Most of the Greek population has no possibility to spend 800-1000 Euros or more to replace a stinky gasoline scooter with a new electric scooter, so we need another way.

We offer full service contracts including insurance, service, accessories, spare parts, and repairs. The only thing the costumer needs to do is drive their scooter themselves.

We provide the client with the scooter, replace or repair it on site if necessary, and pick it up at the end of the contract. We do not need a branch network, which saves costs, and the costumer has an excellent service, much better than they are used to. This all around service is very easily realisable in Greater Athens with its “small” living space of 20 x 30 km so that we need just one and only location as office/warehouse.

At least at the beginning we will start with long term rentals concentrated on Greater Athens. Starting with a small model of scooter and a bigger one. Two service contracts that differ from each other concerning, for example in case of excess in case of damage, mileage limit and other Factors. The monthly rental for the smaller scooter will be less than 100 Euros, as we intend to have the monthly rental at about 80 Euros (12-months-contract). As a comparison, the expenses for a monthly ticket for the public transportation (30 Euros) and a couple of times using a taxi because public transportation is on strike or is not on time, it may cost the same, maybe more.

A main target group of our business idea can be for example people who have to wait in the dark at a metro station or a bus station or have to return home after work in the dark, or people working on shifts attending or leaving their work while public transportation is not on duty.

 

I have been a businessman for 18 years and senior staff in several companies before that. I have been working as a management consultant for big German companies such as the publisher Klett (one of the biggest publishers of school books in Germany), the publisher NWB (the second biggest publisher of legal books in Germany), and Ravensburger (the biggest german producer of games and puzzles).

My first profession was as a book printer and then I followed a further education until I finished my studies in business administration. Having an income from my business in Germany I am not rich, but I can live. I am leading my business remotely per e-mail and phone, and twice a year I am visiting Germany where I have two daughters studying. I love animals and had both dogs and cats since was a child, most of the animals were stray animals from the streets.

I do not have a car for the last 5 years now and when I need a car, I just rent it for a couple of days.

 

                                           

Because I’m personally responsible to leave a clean environment behind me and not a dump. Each of us is personally responsible.

 

Because your children want to live!
#fridaysforfuture #youthstrike4climate
They fight for their lifes.

Greece may be far away from you and maybe you hardly know the country…. Some sentences from the subject of history at school, some words in the daily news about the financial crisis, the refugees or political tensions between Greece and Turkey. Maybe you have been on holidays in Greece?

A lot of positive things have their origin in Greece and have spread all over the world. Greece is the cradle of the European and western culture in general.

Greece gave birth to democracy, philosophy, and modern medicine. Here you may plant a seed and this seed may save the world tomorrow.

 

Our Concept is a little bit different from most other concepts I have seen so far.

real scooters!

Not these small scooters that seem more to be a toy for children then a vehicle. They may be interesting for short distances, but not for everyday life. The streets in Athens are not in good condition, so sometimes it is really dangerous to use the small scooters with the very small tires that are so trendy right now. The sidewalks are in even worse condition; sometimes the big holes are just covered temporary with any material like planks. I would not like to be on the roads with a small “toy” scooter!

perfect location

Athens is the ideal location for our activity. Greater Athens is relatively small, in comparison to Berlin it’s just half of the area, but it has the same number of inhabitants. So this area is really ideal especially for the electric scooters and electric vehicles in general that until now their range is kind of limited compared to other vehicles.

The weather is most of the time very good, it has a Mediterranean type climate with more than 2800 hours of sun per year and 348 sunny days. The average temperature in winter is about 12 degrees Celsius and in the rest of the year about 20, 30 and even 40 degrees. Ideal conditions for solar energy and scooter drivers, whom you can see on the roads in masses, unfortunately still with gasoline bikes. Most often they have old, stinky, and loud two-strike engines.

reputable calculation

We are not just some adventurers, we calculated in a very serious way the financial requirements. We also calculated some financial reserves for unexpected expenses or delivery delays, so that we can protect ourselves and your money. Especially projects concerning environmental or social protection very often are not well pre-calculated because the main causes are not simply the amount of money and but this is exactly why many of them have not the expected success in the long term.

Our project is different in that we will already have covered all expenses at the time when the first 100 electric scooters are rented, and that is a target we expect to fulfil within 2 or 3 months. As a matter of fact, we already have 15 orders. And still, we calculated for the whole first year all the expenses taking in consideration our needs such as the rent for the location/office, staff etc. At the end of the fifth year we intend to have rented out about 5000 scooters, that’s on average 1 of 1000 Athenians. That’s not a very demanding target but quite the opposite, it’s a really restrained target. To be honest, I expect a much bigger success than just 5000 electric scooters in the streets of Athens.

 

a price that anyone can afford!

As I already mentioned many Greeks can’t afford a new electric scooter and scrap their old one. And they can’t use the current choices that are offered in Athens because they have to pay about 10 Euros per hour for these scooters. That’s too expensive! So we need an other possibility that costs less than 100 Euros per month with a full service contract which is affordable for the inhabitants of Athens. It’s worth thinking about when you need a cheap and easy way to move around the city.

 

How can more money be invested, in case we fulfil the target and have more money at our disposal. It depends of course on the result of this campaign. We have some brilliant ideas for the next steps.

development of charging stations with solar energy

Conventionally produced electricity partly just shifts the problem. Some kilometers away there will be a power station polluting the air. We would like to develop decentralized charging stations providing them with electricity by the use of solar and wind energy. We could develop a type of automated machines where the driver has the possibility to change the battery without waiting for a long time until his own battery is fully charged. We will only provide electric scooters where it’s possible to take off the battery, which on average weights about 8-10 kg. So it’s possible even for a person without enormous strength to handle the battery. Take off the empty battery, put on the fully charged one, and after 2 minutes you are on the road again.

short term rental

There are about 11 million people living in Greece. In 2017 nearly 30 million tourists visited the country which means that there is a good possibility to start a short time rental for tourism. City tours with electric scooters or e-squads for disabled persons. We would need rental stations (at least at the port and the airport) and of course more staff, more logistics, and more rents. And we would need an other kind of advertisement.

company packages – models – locations

Charging station + scooter + business plan all in one for a good price. Especially for delivery services, postal service etc. The charging station could be designed in a way that it can be used by other scooter drivers as well.

And I am thinking of a bigger model of scooter, a model that is perfectly suitable for longer distances as there are already models who reach a higher speed and can cover a distance of about 200 km or more. The national road to another city of Greece, Patras, is new and in very good condition as well as just 200 km in total distance. It is a perfect distance and possibility for a bigger model of electric scooter.

Or we start at a second location some weeks later, Patras oder Thessaloniki. Sure an island like Corfu or Crete would be interesting for another business model concerning tourism.

 

 

Only some bullet points of future possibilities:

  • E-Vehicles (Bubble Cars)
  • E-Cars (Tesla, maybe at first as airport service)
  • Other drives (fuel cell) 
  • Replacement of small delivery vehicles (Piaggio Ape) 
  • Expand to whole greece
  • Concept in other sunny Citys/Regions with the experience advantage from Athens

 

Sharing on facebook, twitter etc. and informing people about it, people who are not active on social media. Think about who could be interested in that project from your friends, colleagues, relatives, mates etc.

Do you have any contact to news media? Please tell them about it. When time comes, you could be one of the persons to use the scooter. Even if it seems far away for you, tomorrow can be the possibility to have holidays or a job opportunity in Athens.

 

additional questions?
contact us at contact@dynamic4you.com

story:
ebikemotion® is a solution that offers to you the most advanced application under iOS or Android turning your smarphone into an advanced ciclo-computer. Simultaneously, the platform provides an interactive and Intelligent Wireless Operative Controller (iWoc®), installed in the handlebars for the standard bicycles, as well as wired version of this joystick with a Docking Station (iWoc.One®) for the e-bikes. The joystick uses Bluetooth® to connect to the user’s phone, providing dynamic control over any information, option of function shown in the APP.

"iWoc®", The wireless joystick specially designed to control APPs in standard bicycles



iWoc® (Intelligent Wireless Operative Controller) is an advanced, ergonomic, symmetric, programmable and universal control keypad for the handlebar of bicycles that will give users control over the main functions of the applications of your smartphone and other elements such as lights, power system or the gears in the electric bikes, etc. without ever removing the hands from the handlebar.
It was created using wireless Bluetooth® 4.0 technology and allows the user to setup as many as 8 functions fokr each screen of the APP like go to special APP screens, confirm options depending on the screen and context of application (calls, music, turn on the lights at sunset with confirmation, read a message, send position, etc.). The joystick also integrates LEDs to inform the user about special functions and the correct button to press depending on the context. This is a fully customizable product by the APP software, giving the user a completely new experience in bike riding, with safety and control of the APP.

· Wireless Communication  (Bluetooth® SMART)*
· 5 Programmable buttons & 3 Context LED Lights.
· Symmetric and ergonomic design (right & left handle).
· Waterproof construction & Customizable cover.
· Li-Po Battery (+200 hours of use), auto pairing and secure communication.
· Diameter of supported handlebar, from 24 mm to 34 mm.
· Open SDK to integrate iWoc® with other APPs.
*Advanced cycling ebikemotion APP included with Joystick. (for more information about the APP follow this link)

We have prepared for you different bundles to get the product before it arrives to the market. Also you can get extended packs with sensors, cradles and brackets. When we delivery the system we will ask to the user for the appropiate bracket for your actual phone.

*Free shipping only for EE.UU & Canada, Europe, Brasil, Rusia, Australia. For other countries, please check with us, delivery it is not included in the bundle.



more info: app.ebikemotion.com

more info: accesories.ebikemotion.com

story:
Like Bike is the answer to make more people ride a bike, enjoy the outdoors and live life to the fullest.

Like Bike is the world's most affordable electric bike. It is fully loaded with a top speed of 20mph/32km/h.

Like Bike has the coolest folding design, the smartest functions and the highest quality components – all to give you the best ride ever. 

 

 

With Like Bike, you ride anywhere in style. Whether you are cruising to work or going on an adventure - Like Bike is perfect for you.

Priced from just $579 with free worldwide shipping, Like Bike is coolest, fully loaded and folding electric bike at the best price on the market.  

Cool design 

Like Bike is a bike you and your friends want to be seen in. It has the finest and the most innovative Scandinavian design with cool color combinations that truly make a statement. This impressive eBike is an eye catcher that turns heads wherever you go.

 

Fun

Like Bike is perfect when you just want to have fun. It is built to make you happy! The powerful motor, the awesome design and the quick handling ensure you always have an exciting ride.

 

Adventurous

Like Bike inspires you to explore the wild. All terrain tires, long range (up to 55 miles/90 km!), front suspension, powerful disc brakes and excellent performance are perfect for any adventure.

 

World's most affordable

Like Bike is starting at $579 with free shipping. This is an exclusive limited offer for this campaign (normal price from $1450). Never before in history has a fully loaded electric bike been available for under $600.

Like Bike is designed with premium Scandinavian design. It is equipped with the best name brand components and the highest quality materials – to give you the best value for your money.

 

Practical

Like Bike easily folds in 3 steps in just seconds – just fold the frame and the stern. You can store it anywhere – in your office, under the stairs or in your apartment.

 

You can take it with you anywhere; in the trunk of your car, in the bus or in the train. Its built in handle means you can easily take it up and down the stairs.

 

For any ride

Like Bike is for more than just fun weekend rides with your friends. It is designed for any ride and any occasion. Like Bike is perfect for a life on the go. Whether you are commuting to work, heading to the gym, or cruising to the coffee shop, Like Bike gets you there in style and speed. Like Bike truly is the most versatile ebike you can get.

For any rider

Like Bike is for any rider, no matter your age, size, gender and riding style – so everyone can have fun. Like Bike is super easy to use and even easier to like. You can quickly adjust the seat and handlebar to find your perfect fit. Like Bike suits all heights for riders between 4,10 (1.47m) and 6,6 (1.98m).

 

Peace of mind

We are so confident in our product and its quality that we are offering you a one-year warranty when you get your Like Bike. That’s not all - You also get a 14 day return policy from the day you receive it.

 

Incredible performance 

Like Bike has the highest street legal speed for an electric bike (20 mph in US/Canada and 25 km/h in EU/UK/AU)! 

Like Bike weighs just under 40 lbs (20 kg). This makes it 25% lighter than other bikes in the same size and gives you much better handling. We use durable and lightweight 6061 Aircraft grade aluminum to keep the weight down. 

With its low weight, powerful motor and battery - Like Bike gives you the ride of a lifetime.

 

Powerful motor

Like Bike has a powerful and advanced 250W (in EU,UK,AU) or 350W (in US,CA) rear Hub motor to power your ride up to the top speed of 20mph. Our silent motor requires no maintenance.

Powerful battery

The battery is hidden in the frame and protected with a locking mechanism. We are using the highest quality Panasonic cells. It has a high capacity of 36V and up to 13Ah to give you an incredible riding distance of up to 55 miles (90 km).

You can remove the battery to charge it, or plug the bike directly to your power outlet. With our quick charger, you charge your bike in only 2 hours.

 

Advanced electronics 

Like Bike has a built in USB charger – so you can charge your phone and other devices anywhere. It is equipped with a powerful, yet user friendly computer with 17 functions, such as speed and distance.

Comfort 

The powerful motor lets you ride much longer and much faster than an ordinary bike. The suspension makes uneven roads feel gentle and smooth. The comfort saddle and grip make your ride even more pleasurable. Like Bike has robust 160mm front and rear disc brakes to always give you a safe ride.

 

Pedal assist

The 350W (US) or 250W (EU and AU) electric motor lets you ride anywhere without breaking a sweat. If you want to pedal instead, select the level of pedal assist (0-4) on the computer. If you want exercise, you can ride it like a normal bike with the motor off. Even with the motor turned off, Like Bike is a bliss to ride.

Ready to go

Like Bike comes fully assembled with a fully charged battery, so you don’t have to worry about any complicated instructions. Simply start riding on your next adventure!

 

 

Don’t assume Like Bike is just a cool electric bike - It is the answer to make you enjoy life to the fullest!

Having routines and working hard is great, but we must not forget to also live life and just have fun! To enjoy the outdoors, enjoy the sun, enjoy time with friends and enjoy life - is what Like Bike is guaranteed to do for you. 

If you feel the need to go on an adventure - Like Bike will never let you down!

 

Dimensions
 
 

Unfolded:

 
  • 62" L x 22" W x 42" H (159 L x 56 W x 106 H in cm)

When folded:

 

 

 

We ship all orders worldwide. FREE shipping on all orders! 

All orders come with a one year warranty. You also receive a 14 day return policy.

By ordering Like Bike now, you save 60% off the normal price and receive the coolest ebike ever before it is available in stores.

Don't forget to customize your Like Bike by selecting any of our extra accessories, from fenders to cargo racks. You find them at the top of the page. 

 

We love biking! Biking is fun and brings a lot of happiness to our lives. Like Bike is more than just a cool and convenient way of taking you from A to B: With Like Bike, we decided to create the ultimate electric bike so more people can have fun and just live life. From cool design to smart features to the highest quality components to the best price, Like Bike is built to put a smile on your face. 

We have spent considerable time designing Like Bike (the aircraft grade aluminum frame is our unique design) with the best name brand components. With our manufacturing experience, we are able to use the best materials while keeping the cost low – so you can get the best value for your money.

After many hours of designing and after undergoing rigorous quality tests, we have finally come up with an ebike we are confident is the coolest and best ebike you can get. Our goal is to secure enough orders so we can start production. By backing us now, you save a staggering 60% off the retail price and our prices will never be this low again.

Come join our adventure!

story:
Right Folks, the Flags are here, and distribution to individual donors and group donors is underway. Please be patient while we get everything organised.

Some of you will undoubtedly get your flags quicker than others but be assured they are on their way. 

Thanks again to everyone who made this possible. 

Lets get Scotland Yessed!



All extra funds will be spent on Yes Scotland merchandise.  Thanks for your patience. Please remember there will be opportunities to get these from Newsnet Scotland, Yes Scotland and numerous local Yes groups. Do not panic people.

A small team of people have brought this project this far. We have designed, fronted the manufacturers deposit, and already started production for 10 thousand of these Saltires, 7.5k with black Yes and 2.5k in the more subtle grey.

The split is broadly in line with the limited but influential market research we undertook.

You can see the two graphics here and we will have photos of physical examples of these flags within a few days. They are 5'x3' (1.52x0.91m) polyester, seemed and eyeletted flags, just as you'd find at any event, or tartan shop in the country.

We can land these flags in Scotland for a price of £9000,or 90p each!

They usually retail between £5-8.

This is a closely educated guess as my own business background partly involves the importing of similar type goods from the far east. As such all logistics are carried out by existing contacts and should be relatively straight forward.


Now think about the visual impact of 10,000 Yes Saltires.

BIG Yes Saltires, visible throughout the country, on flagpoles, in windows, being waved at cultural and sporting events.

Every Saltire flying household in the country can be approached and offered one of these to fly. Every major event this summer can have a large Yes presence, even those of you abroad can fly your Yes flags in support as the world starts to realize what is happening here.

We anticipate distributing to ALL the various Yes area groups and to activists nationwide, as well as to specific Yes pressure groups such as RIC, LFI and Women for Indy.

We see this is an additional campaign resource.

We have agreements in place for these flags to be sold through the online shops of both Yes Scotland and Newsnet Scotland.

We believe this to be a vital part of creating confidence among the quiet Yes vote and building the atmosphere required for a MASS move towards Yes before the referendum.

We cannot rely on the billboard campaign alone, other businesses and organisations require these facilities, and it is extremely expensive.


What we're asking for.

We will offer a free flag, colour of your choice, to everyone who donates £5 or more to the campaign (the usual retail price). We can offer better deals to larger contributors IF they can realistically distribute themselves.

We have already had one large contribution to assist in the transfer of the manufacturers deposit. We anticipate this will more or less balance the distribution costs we have once the flags are here, hence the appeal total staying at £9400.

We anticipate a mix of free and charged for distribution to reach the maximum number of people and still create extra revenue for local campaign groups as well.

The flags will be available at the end of May, ideal timing for the summer ahead.

Our flexible funding choice, and completion date of 25th April is because we need funds at this date. If we have our target great, but even if we don't we will require what is available to pay and ship the flags. WE will then have one month to find additional funds to clear the goods here.

Our target is an ambitious but very worthwhile £9400.

This covers the Indiegogo expenses and distribution costs for delivering the flags to fundraisers and groups alike.

So please folks if you believe, like we do that this can be the 'Summer of Yes' donate what you can and let's get this done!

Please share and retweet this campaign and help us really 'Yes' Scotland this summer!


(*Please note it is totally feasible to replicate this move for small car flags.At this early stage if a backer was found they could be shipped together. Costs would would be around two thirds of the large flag price.)

My name is Mark Piggott, I have previously been involved in organizing  3 rallies in favour (forlorn hope) of BBC and wider media impartiality in the referendum debate. I am currently part of Yes Clydesdale.

My retail business experience has seen me involved with importing from Asia for almost 20years. In that time I've imported goods from Thailand, China, India and Indonesia.

story:
Thanks to everyone who supports this campaign. We really appreciate your help. Thanks for that.

Two years ago we made a start in modernising pigeon racing in the Netherlands. For that we set up digital "revolutions" based on the electronic timing systems used nowadays. That was not enought to us. Most systems are based on electronics out of the 90's and have never been developed after that. Extra devices make it possible to connect to the internet, but the used devices can't re-connect.

Extra outraged costs for battery change and updates make the old fashion electronic systems ready to be replaced by techniques which are available as we speak.

Main goal is to get every pigeons fancier all over the world to be connected to the new system which is webbased. Arrivals straigt on the internet to our dbase. Live results on every occasion, even in training modus. A world wide network to be set up which is actually the backbone of this system.

This project is about building the prototype of a webbased clocking system based, but certainly not limited, on the FCI regulations for ETS.

Most important is the pricing for this webbased online clocking system. It needs to be affordabel for every pigeon fancier around the world. One sport - One system - Reasonable pricing for everyone.

What is the reasonable price:

Thats easier said then done, because it all depends on howmany will be pre-ordered. In fact there is no need to make big profits out of it. The more fanciers pre-order the cheaper it gets.

Yearly fee for keeping the backbone up and running and maintaining for the best performance will be depending on participation as well, but never exceeds € 3,- per month. Our goal is to bring this fee up to € 1-- per month, but again it depends on pre-orders. At the end of the day it is a system for the pigeon fanciers community world wide.

A pre-order form will be ready soon and published on the internet.


What We Need & What You Get:

For building this online clocking system prototype and first setup of the backbone system we need 25000 euro. For that the prototype of the electronic timing system can be made, implemented in the backbone and tested by FCI. This system can be installed and never touched again. There is no need to bring your system to the basketting centre because there is already one there which is connected to the backbone.

All systems are connected to the backbone. The servers in the backbone "know" every timing system connected to the backbone and run programs and store all the races planned. The basketting centre log in on a specific upcoming race. The participating pigeons will be registrered for this particular race in the basketting centre. You just only bring the pigeons, that's it. After basketting you are ready to report your pigeons after liberation with your (permanent) installed onling timing system. You, as a fancier, just take care of your pigeons. The system does all the rest.
Even when your network connection is off air for some reason, this online timing system will report your arrival as soon the network connection is re-established. The arrival date and time will be stored in the device memory.

The server generates live results on the web for every race. For you and your club it is easy to watch the arrivals in every race going on at that particular time. There is no need to re-calculate every report because the system has already done that for you.

The funds will be used to have the right engineers on the right spot to develop, test and implement the webbased electronic timing system. Check out our perks for the rewards we give away for your support

The Impact

Your contribution as the final introduction will have a great impact on world wide pigeon racing. Everyone will use the same system. Everyone can be connected. Live results and monitoring of every race in the world. It will become a great sport to be followed by fanciers and friends and other interested parties.


Risks & Challenges

Are there any risks in participating. No, because if we don't reach our goal your money we be send back to you.

Is there a challenge... Yes sure there is. The challenge is to develop a safe and strong enough backbone which is able to handle all arrivals which mostly will be reported in just minutes.Technically is possible.

The other challenge is to get everyone using the system on the world wide web, even remote areas which there are plenty.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What is Shoe Solutions?

 

Shoe solutions is a revolutionary product designed to make shoe storage more efficient, stylish and easily accessible. Its unique design allows shoes to be hung on a hanger, much like a garment, while adding a sleek and stylish look to any closet. This allows customers to have a fashionable, customizable alternative to shoe storage.

Why it Works

Problem: Scattered shoes at the front door? Scattered shoes at the bottom of your closet? Squished and smushed shoes in your suit case when you travel?

Solution: The Shoe Solutions shoe hanger solves the old age problem of "what do I do with all of these shoes?" The product is durable, and fashionable. You can hang your shoes in your exisiting closet or in our seperate Shoe Solutions Hanger Stand. 

 

 

Problem: Your closet is too small to accomodate a section to hang clothes AND shoes. 

                                 

Solution: The Shoe Solutions Space Saver system allows you to utilize the unused space beneath your clothes like so:

             


Problem: Do your clothes get dirty when you travel? Have you been using the Shoe Solutions Shoe hanger at home but would like to hang up your shoes when you get to your travel destination? 

Solution: Our Shoe Solutions Travel Pouch system allows you to remove your shoe pouches from your hangers at home and simply place them into your suitcase. We have designed the product in such a way that the shoe pouches are removeable so that when you get to your destination, you can hang up your shoes just like you do at home.

                 


What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to begin the manufacturing process so that we may retail the shoe hangers. Since Shoe Solutions manufactures it own product, our goal of $8000 will allow us to purchase raw materials such as wood, metal, and fabric. Meeting our funding goal will allow Shoe Solutions to grow and market the shoe hangers through various retail outlets such as Amazon, Ebay as well as through our own ecommerce store. story:
Summary

Hi, my name is Pat Lynn. I broke my neck and was completely paralyzed on July 4, 2009. Doctors originally said that I would never walk again or use my hands, but my faith has always told me differently. Today I can walk with a walker and spend most of my time on my bike or at physical therapy. I am also a part-time teacher at Life Christian School in Tacoma, WA and I speak at assemblies and do fundraisers to support people living with severe medical conditions like mine. I would like to ride my bike across America as a fundraiser and need your help to do it!

What I Need

I split my fundraising project into three phases:

Phase 1- $2,000 for electric assist motor, $500 for bicycle trailer, $1,000 for modifications to my bike so that I can stand up when we are on trips as well as costs of setting up my bike correctly.

Phase 2- Winter 2014 cost of a support vehicle

Phase 3- Travel expenses

 

The Impact

Since I have recovered from my accident, I have shared my story with thousands of people. In 2011, I raised $15,000 that all went to support people living with spinal cord injuries. Last year, I spoke to over 2,500 middle and high school students and taught about overcoming what is seemingly impossible. I would like to impact as many people across the country as I can by sharing what I have and helping them to have victories with their personal struggles.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please watch my video and share it with as many friends and people that you can.
  • If you are a school administrator, pastor or other community representative, you can contact me about sharing my story in your community.
  • If you would like to know more about my story, you can watch these links of my recovery from the last four years.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LRhGc6UUpKw

 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aojH8UJPopM
