Q: What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?
A: We currently offer an more powerful battery as upgrade for MATE City+ and MATE S only, or as spare battery , but are regularly working to develop more accessories and modifications. Stay tuned for more information. Feel free to let us know what kind of accessories you’d be most interested in seeing.
Q: What about spare parts? Can any bike shop assist me?
A: The MATE battery is custom built for our frame and spare batteries will be able to buy from us. The rest of the components are fairly standard, meaning that you can upgrade/customise your bike as you desire with other parts either from us or your local bike shop. Q: Is it really true I can get up to 100 miles on a single charge with "BOOSTER"? In perfect conditions and in ECO+ mode = Assist level 1 this can be done - but in general milage is depending on power-assist setting, terrain, total bike/rider weight and weather conditions. On "BOOSTER" battery, you can get anywhere between 20-100 miles, depending on your riding style. For maximum range, please use the pedals when in steep situations and when accelerating. **All MILES/KILOMETERS listed on Indiegogo are "UP TO" and not guaranteed.**
Q: Do I need a licence to ride MATE?
A: No. Our bikes are made 100% street legal. We offer two distinctive versions of MATE: MATE City / City+, with a 250W motor which is legal in the EU, and MATE S, with a 350W motor for the US.MATE City and MATE City+, with its 250W motor, is by default limited according to EN15194 to the top speed of 25 km/h (15,5 mph). This means that the motor will only help you up to 25km/h. MATE S, with its 350W motor, is limited to 20 mph (32 km/h), which is the legal limit in US. It will be possible to change these settings with some reprogramming which we will make available after the campaign through MATE.community.  Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?
A: The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.
In the EU/EUROPE import duty and VAT will be collected via our database
In Australia import duty and GST will be collected via our database
All new orders made via Indiegogo are transferred to our database after 11 days (which is the refund window Indiegogo offers plus 1 day)
After this time period, you will be able to log into the database and create a password using the same email address as in your Indiegogo order. In our Database you will now be asked to review your shipping details one more time, accept our terms & conditions and pay VAT/GST and import (if collected via our database) 
Q: Can I test ride a MATE bike?
A: At this stage test rides are only available in Copenhagen. Contact us by email for a test ride.
Q: Can I get a refund?
A: Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

story:
We are in stock

Select the trendy eBike at actbikes.com

Free shipping on all electric bike

Delivery within 3 business days

30-day postage paid returns

 

 

Hi, SDREAMer,

We are Team SDREAM, an electric bicycle creator aiming to invent the smartest, the most stylish and strengthened e-Bike for you, for fun, and for proud!

Electric bikes will keep you active, allow us to enjoy the sport of biking, and most importantly enjoy the outdoors. We yearned for the harmony that e-Bike brings to our life, it has been increasingly regarded as a green alternative to polluting vehicles. Then what's the next revolution for smart mobility? After rounds of R&D, we found that to go with new tech add-ons such as the dashboard could enhance the cycling experience to a new level. 

So, SDREAM is born!

It's no longer a dream to get more power while pedaling less. SDREAM is a COMPLEX of all smart, all secured, all strengthened features designed for all smooth ridings.

 

Shipping

All contributions have been shipped in November 2019.

 

Finish the package and delivery of the last SDREAM Bike! It's your turn.

 
 

SDREAM is styled in an integrated streamlined shape, presenting the spirit of a leaping antelope. The aesthetically pleasing is contributed to its manufacturing process, which involves the hydro-forming technique - a technology that is widely used in the automotive industry,  making use of the complex shapes made possible by hydroforming to produce stronger, lighter, and more rigid unibody structures for vehicles. 

 

The compact folding design also makes SDREAM an elegant fully-loaded monster with all we need on the ride. Storage two SDREAM easily in your SUV, taking you to anywhere you've imagined.

 

*Max speed data comes from 100% electric power, 0% pedaling. You can ride even faster by easy pedaling and using the max e-power simultaneously.

 

Reinforced by a precise electric powertrain, perfectly balance the efficiency between power and energy. We customize the electric models in accordance with different country legalities,  coming in four different variations-the 250, 250S, 500S, and the 750, 750S. Up to 750-watt motor that allows it to reach speeds of more than 20 mph or 32km/h and offers assisted travel of up to 50 miles or 80 km per charge.  

The hidden battery case ensures the safety of the electric system. Waterproof, anti-theft , anti-dust, avoiding any fall out occurs in a furious riding.


The 20-inch fat tires are designed to ensure a safer riding by providing more contact surface. SDREAM can take you anywhere regardless if it’s wet stone, muddy paths or snowy hills. It is more comfortable with outstanding shock absorption, high anti-puncture performance, and stronger wear resistance. A perfect companion for both commuting and outdoor exercising. 

 

The SDREAM S-series models, including 250S, 500S, and 750S, are equipped with professional front & middle suspension system, which can effectively neutralize the vibration from the whole bike.  Now you can order 750 S from us!

Equipped with Tektro disc brakes front and rear, SDREAM possesses a strong and responsive braking force that ensures a complete control on a different surface. Reliable mechanical brake makes stopping smooth, safe and so easy to maintain.

Disc Brakes & Drifting Challenges

 

7-speed gearing coupled with a Shimano rear derailleur for smoother shifting, allowing you to choose the appropriate gear for various terrain. Extra protection from the middle suspension, make off-road adventures easier than ever.

 

With SDREAM, you can move by pedaling, hybrid or full electric modes according to different scenarios and personal fitness. The electric power helps to amplify your physical strength, reaching an unprecedented riding experience.

It helps the bike accelerate fast and uphill easier. By balancing between manpower and the motor power, it works in coordination and improves battery efficiency which leads to a “WOW!”


Freely express your style, loves and dreams through personalization.
Vibrant Red and Space Gray.

 

 

      Live to Ride, Ride to Live

       

       SDREAM Rock on California Beachfront

       
       

      Pro MTBiker's Voice
      ​

       
      The SDREAM electric bike has completed the mold and has been tested several times since October 2018. It is amazing and we're sure you'll be as satisfied with it as we are.  All the SDREAM in the first stage has been delivered. 
       

      We are Team SDREAM, an electric bicycle creator based in Los Angeles and has factories and suppliers in Europe, China, and Southeast Asia, aiming to design the most stylish and strengthened e-Bike for you, for fun, and for proud. We love the balance that the bicycle brings to the world and also believe that a sense of adventure makes life better. So we created SDREAM e-Bike to inspire people to go further, see more, meet new friends and create amazing experiences.

       

      Electric bikes are increasingly regarded as a green alternative to polluting vehicles, as well as an efficient way to the "last mile" commute. However, the high rate of theft is still disturbing to the bike owners around the world. To combat this, we have put a strong emphasis on building an e-bike that cannot be stolen, despite its attractive looking. Now SDREAM folding e-Bike is coming out to be an affordable option to ones who like to travel and being secured. We build SDREAM, which is more than a ton of fun.  It is a medium to connect people to nature, rider to their bike, and people to people. 
       

       

      Click Here For The Press Kit

       

      1. The price is lower than other e-bikes on the market. How is it possible?

      Our team is dedicated to creating the most affordable e- Bike on the market that is of high quality yet with the lowest price. We spent great efforts in searching for cost-effective suppliers and manufacturing. Crowdfunding helps us to control the cost, as we have the right amount of units, without having to deal with the storage expense and other related costs. Most importantly, we hope to build a SDREAM family in the world with early SDREAMers, and let everybody enjoy smart cycling easily.

      2. Where is the place you hide the battery? I can’t see it from the body.

      To increase the security of the battery and for a holistic aesthetic, we designed the battery case to be hidden perfectly in the e-Bike frame.

      3. Is the battery fixed in the tube or can be removed?

      The battery is removable. Just fold the bike frame at the middle. Unlock the battery and pull it out. You can remove the battery for charging or replacing easily with only 2 steps.

      4. What if the battery runs out of power? Can I still ride my SDREAM?

      No problem! Just ride it like any regular bicycle.

      5. Do I need a license to ride SDREAM on the street?

      No. SDREAM eBikes are made 100% street legal.

      6. What is the weight limit for SDREAM?

      SDREAM is strengthened built and can handle anyone of up to 130 kg easily.

      7. Is there any height limit for SDREAM?

      The height of the SDREAM seat is between 77cm-100cm. It is designed with an adjustable saddle and handlebar so that you could adjust the height to your ideal position. Backers who heights between 155cm-200cm can ride SDREAM at ease, no problem!

      8. How is SDREAM delivered?

      SDREAM is mainly delivered from our factory in Asia and Malaysia. You will receive a securely packed box with SDREAM folded up.

      9. Is SDREAM easy to assemble when I receive it?

      When you receive a folded SDREAM, simply remove the protective sponge, unfold the bike, assemble the peddles and you’re DONE!

      10. What about the components? Can I find the replacement in the local bike shop?

      The SDREAM battery is customized built for our hydro- forming frame only. Other components of the bike are fairly standard, you may easily find a replacement from your local bike shop to get it upgraded or repaired. You are welcome to contact us for information.

      11. What kind of warranty do you offer?

      The SDREAM e-bikes comes with a 2 years limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. The warranty, however, does not apply to natural ware such as tires, brake pads, chain etc... For more details, feel free to contact our customer service department.

      12. I do not live in the U.S, Can I still order SDREAM 750?

      We ship SDREAM 750 worldwide as long as local government permits us to import. Please note drive SDREAM 750 on public roads is not officially legal in the EU. You are allowed to own it and drive it on private property. As for Australian backers, we have not yet obtained an import permit for SDREAM 750 in Australia. So the advised model is SDREAM 250 or SDREAM 250 S.

      13. Apart from standard 4 colors, am I able to personalize my own SDREAM?

      We currently provide 4 popular colors for our backers: Vibrant Red, Space Gray, Pacific Blue, Moonlight Silver.

      14. Can I change my order or other information?

      Yes, you can change your order according to your needs on Indiegogo. When the campaign is live, you can ask for a refund by clicking the “refund” button in your profile, and “back” a new perk again as how you did. If you need to update your address, please contact our Indiegogo support team: sdreamgogo@gmail.com

      15. What is your refund policy?

      When you have the idea of a refund, you are welcome to communicate with us immediately, we will be happy to help you. We are confident that SDREAM will be your best companion. If you decide to do so, refunds will be processed on a case-by-case basis. At some point, we will need to lock down refunds for example in order to go into production and ship the SDREAM to you. Once your SDREAM is already going to you, we will not be able to refund.

      16. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

      The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. It is currently 0% in the US and varies internationally. Duties/VAT/GTS is to be paid before we can deliver your SDREAM e-Bike. We will send payment links, invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship the SDREAM to you.

       

       



       

       

      Any Additional Questions or Suggestions?
      Shoot us your ideas at support@sdream.bike

story:
SAFEBRICK is a high-performance drive assist, with the latest intelligent features to help your awareness in traffic. It even knows more than meets the eye. Its versatile design makes it great for every car. It’s the most powerful driver assist available so you have more control on-the-go.

- Worlds best traffic data
- Subscription free
- Lifetime speed camera updates
- Voice and LED assistance 
- Worldwide coverage

 

What the world is saying about SAFEBRICK

 

“A concrete helper for greater safety” WIRED

“The assistant that simplifies driving” 247 Libero

“The world of traffic is with you with Safebrick” Steem hunt

"Inventions Never Seen Before" Tech HD

 

SAFEBRICK is an intelligent drive assist. Use the power of Speed warnings and alerts on upcoming Speed cameras to avoid expensive fines. Get Live Traffic Information in advance and save time in traffic. And let it detect Road Sign Information in case you missed it. 

 

Overview

 

From South to North America, through Europe and Africa, all the way to Australia and New Zealand. Safebrick got you covered.

 

 

SAFEBRICK brings all relevant information when needed directly into your line of sight and assisting you to stay focused before, during and after something is up without taking your eye of the road. 

 

Lights up when you step in the car

  

When starting your car, SAFEBRICK automatically actives. Usesing its pulsing light ring and a friendly human voice to assist you. You’ll see it light up and speak during setup, when starting your car and when something requires your attention while driving.

 

More control on-the-go

Speed Warnings. SAFEBRICK warns you if the applicable speed limit is exceeded and let you know when you’re back within the current speed limit. Optionally configurable within 0 - 15%.

Safety Camera alerts. SAFEBRICK knows more than meets the eye. Enjoy driving with alerts for upcoming Speed traps and Safety Cameras of type Speed and RedLight.

SAFEBRICK is pre-loaded with more than one trillion GPS speed data points.

 

 

Road Sign Information. SAFEBRICK detects road signs such as School zones, One-way street and Sharp Curves to keep you on track at anytime. 

Live traffic info. SAFEBRICK is always thinking ahead. Get timely information so you're better prepared for unexpected events like Accident Ahead, Road Work and Road Closures to avoid delays and stay safe.

 

Like no other accuracy

High-quality cloud data combined with SAFEBRICK ’s advanced GPS-algorithms enable your Safebrick device to provide you with key information that will change the way you see the road ahead.

Billions of GPS data points every day, updated every 60 seconds in the Safebrick cloud to keep your Safebrick grounded with information.

 

The center of attention

In addition to its voice, SAFEBRICK uses colors to communicate. 

WHAT THE COLORS MEANS?

Blue - Indicates connectivity, batteries and sensors are ready to go. Red - Alerts for timely awareness. Yellow - Provides service information such as  battery status and updates. Green - When back on track within current speed limit. 

 

Welcome to your personal drive

All configurable to meet your needs. SAFEBRICK works effortless with the app in iOS & Andriod and connects via BLUETOOTH. You control when and how you want Safebrick to respond. Optionally choose type of alerts, sensibility level, volume and brightness level.

 

No-compromise attention to detail

Every SAFEBRICK is carefully designed with custom-built components and proprietary software for an appearance that fits your car and journeys.

 

Beautifully designed to make life easier

 

Set up your SAFEBRICK device

4 high performance adhesive pads make sure your SAFEBRICK is easy to set-up. Simple remove the red folio and place it on the windscreen, should take less than a 1 minut.

SAFEBRICK comes with three preinstalled AAA batteries with up-to 2 years life and will let you know ahead of time when you should replace the batteries. Changing them is easy. Magnets ensure the battery compartment cover is simple to remove and put back on.

 

Community voices

From January to April, we tested our early prototypes with our community and due to their feedback during the test period, we improved Safebrick.

Demonstration film

 

 

Sorry, no charging cables

Each has its advantages. But if you want best-in-class driver information and smart services at an affordable price, choose SAFEBRICK.

 

 

Technical Specifications

 

What's in the box

SAFEBRICK Intelligent Drive Assist, replaceable batteries, Quick start Guide, Users Guide, Legal and Warranty information. 

Safebrick Quick start Guide languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Português – BR, Dansk, Svenska, Norsk.

 

Project Timeline

 

Finally, we’ve finished of years of research, testing, re-testing, redesigning, and more re-testing and begun manufacturing and logistics. To start up production, we have set a goal of $20,000 for this campaign. We want to give even more people the opportunity to drive smarter. With this said, everyone who helps us in the making of SAFEBRICK, will get it for around 1/2 of the retail price – way less than just one speeding ticket. Plus every backers will get future exclusive offers and invitations to events as Safebrick Plus Members.

 

Coverage List: 

Europe: Andorra, Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France (Monaco, Andorra), Germany, Great Britain (Guernsey, Jersey, Isle Of Man), Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy (Vatican, San Marino), Kosovo, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macedonia, Malta, Moldova, Montenegro, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal (Azores, Madeira), Romania, Russia, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain (Gibraltar, Canary Islands), Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, UK.

America: Argentina, Bahamas, Brazil, Canada, Cayman Islands, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, French Guiana, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Mexico, Panama, Puerto Rico, Saint Barthelemy, Uruguay, USA, Venezuela, Virgin Islands (USA)

Australia/Oceania: Australia, New Zealand

Asia: Afghanistan, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Bangladesh,  Brunei, Georgia, India, Indonesia, Israel, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Malaysia, Oman, Pakistan, Philippines, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, South Korea, Sri Lanka, Thailand, United Arab Emirates, Uzbekistan, Vietnam

Africa: Algeria, Botswana, Egypt, Ghana, Kenya, Lesotho, Libyan Arab Republic, Morocco, Mozambique, Namibia, Nigeria, Reunion Island, South Africa, Swaziland, Tanzania, Tunisia, Uganda

 

Countries we ship to: 

We ship worldwide, with the exception of Saudi Arabia, Peru, Ecuador, Macedonia, Kosovo, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that we cannot ship to military locations. 

FAQ 

For more information, please click here. 

 

Join the journey. 

SAFEBRICK is enabling drivers around the world to make better driving decisions, cut down traveling time and save them from expensive fines and penalty points. And ultimately, enhance the driver, their vehicles and other road users safety.

About us: In 2016 we set out with a goal - upgrade every car on the road today and make driving safer, more efficient and more enjoyable. We’re making it easy for everybody to connect to a smarter driving experience. To be assisted, whenever assistance is needed. To get timely information to prepare for changes along a journey. To fully devote full attention to the road and other road users and to appreciate it all with the highest quality of accuracy. We’re constantly looking for ways to improve the experience – with new products, new software and continually investing in ways to provide the best experience possible. We’re doing what we set out to do. Changing the way people get from A to B safer and smart – one car at a time.

 

SAFEBRICK is Design Registered with the European Intellectual Property Office. 

 

Additional questions? 

Contact us at support@safebrick.com

Get Live Traffic Information in advance and save time in traffic. And let it detect Road Sign Information in case you missed it.  Overview From South to North America, through Europe and Africa, all the way to Australia and New Zealand. Safebrick got you covered.  SAFEBRICK brings all relevant information when needed directly into your line of sight and assisting you to stay focused before, during and after something is up without taking your eye of the road.  Lights up when you step in the car  When starting your car, SAFEBRICK automatically actives. Usesing its pulsing light ring and a friendly human voice to assist you. You’ll see it light up and speak during setup, when starting your car and when something requires your attention while driving. More control on-the-goSpeed Warnings. SAFEBRICK warns you if the applicable speed limit is exceeded and let you know when you’re back within the current speed limit. INDIEGOGO SPECIAL PRICE - CLOSING SOON! 
ZAP have reached their fixed funding target. This means manufacture has begun, and we will be closing our special price. ZAP Bikes will remain available for purchase on Indiegogo, but the 60% off is closing soon! 
DON'T MISS OUT!!!







There are plenty of electric bikes on the market—many require deep pockets - $4000USD+ is pretty standard when you're buying quality. The savings along the way may make this worthwhile, but it’s a lot of cash to answer the question! 

We want to bring the new ZAP electric bike to the market at well under half that cost through clever design, construction and technology.  Not only that, the ZAP bike has packaged together the best in technology - pressure sensitive torque sensor that distributes power evenly to match the riders pace, making for huge gains in efficiency over conventional E-Bikes. 

The ZAP e-bike is clever:

  • It’s armed with a torque sensor – It only uses the power when needed!
  • It has a RFID key-less start, no more fiddly locks!
  • It's lighter than your average electric bike and brilliantly balanced.
  • Its electrics are completely sealed in a specially designed housing
  • It's genuinely long on range. Up to 70km on a single charge!

We want you to help us bring this to the market because we think it can change the way people commute...for the better. For convenience, for fitness, for efficiency, and for green technology, it's ZAP. 



DELIVERY DATES EXPLAINED
All orders placed during ZAP campaign will be included in First Round Delivery.
Orders placed during ZAP InDemand (after May 15th 2015) will be scheduled for Second Round Delivery.

See the FAQ section for more information. If you have further questions about your order, feel free to inquire directly via the comments section (you can set to private) or email info@zapbikes.com.au.




Introducing ZAP Urban & Cross: two bikes that incorporate electric technology to take you where you want to go. Road or trail, city or cross-country.



ZAP Urban has been engineered for the city commuter.
ZAP Urban is the bike for those less likely to leave the beaten track. It’s for the commuter who likes the idea of pushing the pedals but doesn’t want to reach their destination in a pool of sweat. Single speed, it’s ready for the urban commute, visiting friends, or getting you around on the weekends.

While sharing the same frame as the the ZAP Cross, the Urban is a more streamlined, minimal bike. No shocks, no gears, less weight.



 
 
 
ZAP Cross gets you off the beaten path.
Unlike so many electric bikes before, our designers have sweated on balance, weight and the bike’s centre of gravity so that the ZAP Cross is up for whatever you want to put it through.

At just over 18 kilograms, it’s around 7 kilos lighter than most electric bikes in its class.


With Rockshox forks, RFID key-less start, Shimano Deore 10-speed drivetrain, Promax hydraulic disc brakes and lightweight, off-road tyres on board, the ZAP Cross is ready to go wherever you want to take it - with electrics sealed from the elements, there’s no fear of damage to the technology on board.






It’s the innovative technology on-board ZAP Urban and Cross, that transform them into something else altogether. Through sleek design and a powerful long life Lithium Ion cells, we've built these bikes so you can do all the work, or let the bike take you along for the ride.

Engage the ZAP’s torque sensor, and your minimal efforts are multiplied. Want a big hand up a hill? Engage the boost and you’ll get the power that you’re after.

ZAP bikes let you decide the fitness benefit you want from your ride and the freedom to delegate the work to the bike. The technological developments on-board the Cross and Urban, mean two big things: less weight and more range.

There’s no heavy power cells to sway the balance of the bike, but a slimline integrated into the bike’s centre of gravity that results in a near-on 50/50 weight distribution.

On-road or recreational, assisted or unassisted, The ZAP Urban and Cross are ready to take you there.

High Quality Build Our new ZAP Bikes incorporate 36v 250w E-Life CST Hub motors. E-bike hub motors have been use for years in harsh environments. They are highly efficient, simple and affordable. We have chosen ours for its weight, 10sp cassette & disc compatibility. This motor is over 1kg lighter than others in its class.

We use Rockshox XC TK 32 forks, Shimano Deore 10sp 11-36 Drivetrain and high quality build throughout. These components are light and built to last! 

Sealed Housing for Electric Components
We have designed our frame to house all the Electric components in the centre of the frame. This shelters it from the exterior elements. 

Low Weight + even distribution
ZAP bikes have almost 50/50 weight distribution. The E-Housing is low and directly connected to frame allowing the frame tubing to takes all the weight. This means no movement, no rattle and no wear. 
Also ZAP Cross is 18.5kg, around 7kg lighter than other bikes in its class. ZAP Urban is 17kg, competing with the lightest E-Bikes on the market.

Sealed from the elements
Our frame is designed with the electric components sealed from the elements. The motor cable runs inside the chainstay. The Torque Sensor inside the bottom bracket. What this means is no water or dirt can affect the electrics.

Torque Sensor


By using a Torque sensor input rather than traditional Axis sensor, power is only used when Torque is applied to the pedals. With an Axis sensor power is used constantly when the pedals are rotating, even when power is not needed. Because of this we can use a lower capacity battery that is lighter, much more efficient, cheaper and we still get 70km range!

This is the most innovative change in our new model. This is the input method to activate the motor. Current Axis sensors, activate the motor as the magnets on the crank move past the sensor. This is simple and works well. The problem is this can work without the chain. This means if you ride in low gear and put little effort in the motor + battery has to work more to drive you forward. Riding with this Axis sensor was the gauge for working out the battery capacity required for an adequate range, of around 60km. The battery size needed to be 11ah. This weights about 3.5kg.

Using a torque sensor means the motor only works as hard as the rider's input. Your pedaling matches the motor. Because of this the battery size can be reduced. We are using a 8.8ah battery, getting the same range of 70km - if not more. This weights about 1.5kg, that’s 3kgs less so far! Less weight on the bike means greater efficiency and range.

Lighter Wheels/Hydraulic Disc Brakes
Lighter wheels, roll faster. By using a super lightweight motor, light weight rims and tyres, we have reduced the wheel weight significantly. This makes for quicker acceleration, less power draw from battery and holding rolling speed much easier.
 
Hydraulic Disc Brakes are extremely powerful and require very little maintenance. They work even if your when is buckled (not very likely with our wheels). Pad wear from discs still causes dust but is much less and confined to the brake calliper, keeping your bike much cleaner.

Lithium Battery Technology 
The bikes utilise Lithium 18650 Samsung cells. This light weight lithium battery technology is driving a revolution in electric products and the e-bike is no different. The 18650 cell is becoming the standard cell size for a lot of products, the Tesla S for one. We have a unique battery design and configuration but by using this common cell type repairs and replacements are easy. Also the cost will reduce over time as more of these cells are produced.

Digital Display
Our display gives you, KM p/hr, Odometer, Remaining Battery, Battery Voltage, Trip, Current Draw and a Clock.

To bring ZAP Cross & Urban to market, we’re seeking to raise $65,000 USD - funds that will help us with the tooling that’s required to launch into full-scale production and bring the convenience, efficiency, and green technology of the new ZAP e-bikes to market.

Why you ride your bike:
  • It keeps you fit: mentally and physically. 
  • It's a time-efficient way of getting from A to B
  • It saves you money - money on fuel, parking, and a heap of money if you make the decision to go without a car.

Why ride an e-bike: 

  • Easier to ride/less intensive than a normal bike and allows you to ride much further. 
  • You can still enjoy all the other benefits you gain from riding.
  • Get to work without sweating, even uphill routes, and no need to shower.
  • Easier to ride if you’re unfit, injured or elderly.




ZAP Bikes were established in 2010 to bring an alternative transport to the busy streets of Perth. The brainchild of Steve Dimov, Paul Rankin and George Tuffin, the vision was for a stylish, sleek vehicle that would be easy to ride, reduce the owner’s carbon footprint and cut the costs of inner city travel. The result was the range of ZAP Electric Bikes.

Customers range from grey nomads to young, inner-city dwellers and everyone in between. Because ZAP Bikes are designed to replace car trips in the inner city, you can see more, explore more and make a difference to the environment too.
 



Even if you are not in the market for an electric bike, you can share ZAP Bikes to your friends and family. Spread the word to ensure they are riding a quality piece of technology that will take them further, with ease. 

With your help we can complete this project that has been two years in the making. 

Follow our journey on Facebook.

Shipping will be calculated after completion of campaign. Please note that the below is an indicator and the costing for shipping will likely be lower than this. 

LOCAL (Australia | New Zealand)
MAX Delivery Cost of $99 USD. 

*Shipping is a variable cost based on volume/location. The more we sell the cheaper it is!
We can guarantee it will be less than $99 each within Australia and New Zealand*

INTERNATIONAL (United States | Canada | European Union | United Kingdom) 
MAX Delivery Cost of $249 USD. 
*Shipping is a variable cost based on volume/location. The more we sell the cheaper it is!
We can guarantee it will be less than $249 each for International*

1.  T&C’s, Custom’s, import tax’s etc are applicable per destination countries regulations.
2.  Shipping time is estimated 30 days*

*Please note: International delivery times will be varied, Because of restrictions sending lithium batteries via airfreight, we may need to ship. This may add another 4-6 weeks.

We will continue to update our FAQ as the campaign takes shape, send your inquiries through and we will be sure to answer them for you! 

1. Will your ZAP bike climb hills easily?

Definitely! There is a misconception among the bike community that larger wattage motors mean better hill climbing. While there is a connection between the two, It is more of a generalisation due to the multitude of variables at play. Our brushless 250W motors will take you up most hills at a quick pace. 

For more information, read about our Torque Sensor Technology in the "features of our new range" section. 

2. Do you require a license to ride a ZAP bike in Australia?

No license is required in Australia to ride a ZAP bike as all our bikes fit under the current 250W power limitation. All Our bikes comply with EN 15194 requirements and safe to ride.

Vehicle Standard (Australian Design Rule – Definitions and Vehicle Categories)    2005 Amendment 6 – F2012L01123

EN 15194 is becoming internationally accepted as the standard for power-assisted pedal cycles.  When compared to the existing ADR definition, it increases the allowable power from 200 to 250 watts and specifies this as a continuous rating.  It also restricts the top speed to 25 kilometres per hour, requires the rider to pedal to access the power and sets a number of construction safety requirements.

3. Can I ride ZAP bike on the footpath?

ZAP bikes can be ridden on any area that a bicycle is legally allowed to ride on. This means they can be used on shared footpaths, bicycle paths, bicycle margin strips and at the side of the road when no alternative is available.

Currently cities around the world have differing regulations for electric bikes. Please check with your local authorities to find out the latest on where you can use your electric bike.

3. Does the battery remove? 

Unlike other e-bikes, the battery does not remove on the ZAP Urban or Cross. We have designed it this way because current e-bike's batteries can rattle and become loose over time, which can also cause contact problems from corrosion. To avoid this the battery and controller in the ZAP bikes is secured in the housing, bolted to the frame. There is zero movement, it's completely sealed to the elements and has a low down, central weight. If it does need to be removed its simple, undo 3 hex bolts and slide out. 

4. How does it charge?

Charging your ZAP bike is very straight forward.  Each ZAP bike will come with a charging unit - a plug-in cord and adaptor - similar to a computer charger. These will be supplied with instructions for use and a problem shooting guide.

5. What does it cost to charge? 

Extremely little! We have calculated the cost to be around 10c per charge.
Each charge will provide around 70km distance, this of course depends on variables of rider weight, road conditions and elevation. Our trials have shown range of 70-80kms range on single charge.   

6. Why is it sold in USD, instead of AUD? 

When we manufacturer ZAP bikes, our cost are in USD. We wanted to offer the bikes as cheap as possible, just above cost price. If we priced in AUD (or any other currency) we could not forecast the exact figure we required. We knew that we would need to increase the price slightly to be prepared in the event the AUD dropped against the USD, as it has been quite volatile lately. This way we have been able to offer our bikes at the lowest price possible, making electric bikes more accessible to more people. We also thought pricing in USD would make it easier for international customers.

6. When do we expect delivery?

The planned delivery date is July - August 2015. The team at ZAP has extensive experience in manufacturing and supply, we feel prepared for any obstacles that might be thrown our way. ZAP are extremely devoted to making sure that our customers are supported in their purchase, as well as the future of their electric bike experience.

Expected delivery date of round two orders (made after the 15th May) will have expected delivery date of September - October 2015.  We are confident in our expected dates and expect delivery to be timely, if not earlier, than expected. 

If unexpected issues with production or fulfillment do come up, we will be sure to update our backers in a timely manner and will do everything in our power to insure customer satisfaction. We thank you for all your support as we work towards providing you with the best Electric Bike, at the best price, on today's market! 

Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

The more we sell the cheaper it is!We can guarantee it will be less than $249 each for International*1.  T&C’s, Custom’s, import tax’s etc are applicable per destination countries regulations.2.  Shipping time is estimated 30 days**Please note: International delivery times will be varied, Because of restrictions sending lithium batteries via airfreight, we may need to ship. This may add another 4-6 weeks.


We will continue to update our FAQ as the campaign takes shape, send your inquiries through and we will be sure to answer them for you! 
1. Will your ZAP bike climb hills easily?
Definitely! There is a misconception among the bike community that larger wattage motors mean better hill climbing. While there is a connection between the two, It is more of a generalisation due to the multitude of variables at play. Our brushless 250W motors will take you up most hills at a quick pace. 
For more information, read about our Torque Sensor Technology in the "features of our new range" section. 
2. Do you require a license to ride a ZAP bike in Australia?
No license is required in Australia to ride a ZAP bike as all our bikes fit under the current 250W power limitation. All Our bikes comply with EN 15194 requirements and safe to ride.
Vehicle Standard (Australian Design Rule – Definitions and Vehicle Categories)    2005 Amendment 6 – F2012L01123
EN 15194 is becoming internationally accepted as the standard for power-assisted pedal cycles.  When compared to the existing ADR definition, it increases the allowable power from 200 to 250 watts and specifies this as a continuous rating.  It also restricts the top speed to 25 kilometres per hour, requires the rider to pedal to access the power and sets a number of construction safety requirements.
3. Can I ride ZAP bike on the footpath?
ZAP bikes can be ridden on any area that a bicycle is legally allowed to ride on. This means they can be used on shared footpaths, bicycle paths, bicycle margin strips and at the side of the road when no alternative is available.Currently cities around the world have differing regulations for electric bikes. Please check with your local authorities to find out the latest on where you can use your electric bike.
3. Does the battery remove? 
Unlike other e-bikes, the battery does not remove on the ZAP Urban or Cross. We have designed it this way because current e-bike's batteries can rattle and become loose over time, which can also cause contact problems from corrosion. To avoid this the battery and controller in the ZAP bikes is secured in the housing, bolted to the frame. There is zero movement, it's completely sealed to the elements and has a low down, central weight. If it does need to be removed its simple, undo 3 hex bolts and slide out. 
4. How does it charge?Charging your ZAP bike is very straight forward.  Each ZAP bike will come with a charging unit - a plug-in cord and adaptor - similar to a computer charger. These will be supplied with instructions for use and a problem shooting guide. 5. What does it cost to charge? 
Extremely little! We have calculated the cost to be around 10c per charge. Each charge will provide around 70km distance, this of course depends on variables of rider weight, road conditions and elevation. Our trials have shown range of 70-80kms range on single charge.   6. Why is it sold in USD, instead of AUD? 
When we manufacturer ZAP bikes, our cost are in USD. We wanted to offer the bikes as cheap as possible, just above cost price. If we priced in AUD (or any other currency) we could not forecast the exact figure we required. We knew that we would need to increase the price slightly to be prepared in the event the AUD dropped against the USD, as it has been quite volatile lately. This way we have been able to offer our bikes at the lowest price possible, making electric bikes more accessible to more people. We also thought pricing in USD would make it easier for international customers.6. When do we expect delivery?
The planned delivery date is July - August 2015. The team at ZAP has extensive experience in manufacturing and supply, we feel prepared for any obstacles that might be thrown our way. ZAP are extremely devoted to making sure that our customers are supported in their purchase, as well as the future of their electric bike experience. Expected delivery date of round two orders (made after the 15th May) will have expected delivery date of September - October 2015.  We are confident in our expected dates and expect delivery to be timely, if not earlier, than expected.  
If unexpected issues with production or fulfillment do come up, we will be sure to update our backers in a timely manner and will do everything in our power to insure customer satisfaction. We thank you for all your support as we work towards providing you with the best Electric Bike, at the best price, on today's market! 
Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
We plug-in vehicle owners are a social bunch.  

We love our vehicles.  We wave at each other when we drive by.  We sometimes take way too much time answering people who ask "Like it?"

We tend to have a very high interest in numbers.  Especially our mile/kWh, MPG-equivalent, and our real-world range.  The existing data portals from manufacturers don't give all the info we'd like and more importantly they separate us into silos (LEAF portal, Volt portal, etc..).

So when we turn to standard OBD loggers we find our vehicles on the "not-compatible" list.

Where's the love?

Here it is.  A logger that IS compatible with nearly every currently available production plug-in vehicle in North America (and many of the vehicles internationally).

We've been logging these vehicles for a few years for fleets, and with your backing, we'll finish adapting that technology to make the world's best logger & app for EV owners.  Through the app EV owners can tell their personal EV story by being able to track, share, cheer, and connect.  

Our technology has been featured in:



The App

A few screenshots from the app are provided below. We will launch both Android and iOS versions. 

In the first pair of screenshots you see the Last Trip summary that provides the real-world numbers from the last trip.  This includes a ranking compared to all logged trips for your vehicle, compared to those on your team (more on teams later) this week and compared to others of the same model in your area. Additionally it gives you the starting and ending SOC, as well as the ability to post the result to the social networks of your choosing. 

The lifetime summary page provides summary results for all data we've logged on your vehicle.  Again, it ranks against both your team and owners of the same model in your area.  Of interest to many owners will be the Estimated Battery Health value.  Fortunately we have an expert in battery degradation in hybrid & electric vehicles on the team (got his Ph.D. beating up EV batteries).  Please note, we can estimate battery health on all the vehicles listed EXCEPT the Accord PHEV and the Porsche... we don't get quite enough signals on those models, yet.

The next screenshots are specific to public charging etiquette.  Each backer that receives a myEV logger will also receive a window sticker.  

The window sticker includes a personalized QR code.  This can be used by others in the myEV community to a) ask if they can unplug you at a public charging station in a privacy-protected way, b) give you an electric fist-bump, and c) request a connection to share info.

The last set of screenshots show the unlock screens and one of the unlocked features.  You and your team will collectively rack up EV miles.  As you hit EV mile thresholds additional features in the app will unlock.  The unlock feature shown below provides a histogram of charging events.


Rewards



How does myEV compare to other loggers?

Click here to see a benefit comparison chart. *Please note: this chart was made to highlight the benefits of the MyCarma myEV contrasted against other loggers, and isn’t intended to be an absolute comparison. Other loggers (such as cellular) may have their own functionality & benefits, such as remote lock/unlock, GPS position etc. Using a Y-harness, myEV can also be run in parallel with other loggers.


Why would you want to log your EV?

Here are the top 5 reasons we've heard from fellow EV owners: 

  1. I want more data than what the dash shows me (ie. % SOC, not bars)
  2. I want to keep an eye on the health of my battery.
  3. I want to track my range throughout the year to see the impact of the weather, and to compare this to other EV owners in my area.  
  4. The other data system you use went down. Again. 
  5. I love my car and want to share my results with others that are in the EV community, and those that are considering becoming EV owners!

We've been listening.  And by adapting our fleet hardware and decodes (ability to log EV signals) we can give the community what it's looking for.  

Decoding and Cleaning

The challenge with logging EVs is getting the signals.  Most after-market loggers use emissions-related signals.  That's why they can't get the energy/battery info that we all want.  To work on EVs you need to be able to log the non-standard signals.  We do this. 

Additionally, since they're non-standard, each manufacturer uses different signals that can have slightly different meanings.  For instance, battery power from one manufacturer can mean something slightly different than battery power from another.  So in addition to decoding the signals they need to be normalized to be able to share across vehicles.  It's taken us a while, but we've figured this out.

The Teams & Draft Feature List

What's this about teams?  Well, with EV owners being so social, we want to enable owners to grow together.  Teams of up to 20 people will be linked. Racking up EV miles together, you will have app features unlocked as you hit key milestones.  A draft feature list is shown below.  Additional signals/data will be available for specific vehicles.  



The Compatible Vehicles 

  • BMW i3 (being finalized)
  • Chevrolet Volt
  • Chevrolet Spark EV
  • Citroen C-Zero
  • Coda Sedan (in development)
  • Echo Automotive Van
  • Fisker Karma
  • Ford Transit Connect EV
  • Ford Focus EV
  • Ford CMAX Energi
  • Ford Fusion Energi
  • Hafei Saibao EV (in development)
  • Honda Fit EV
  • Honda Accord PHEV
  • Mitsubishi i-MiEV
  • Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV (being finalized)
  • Mitsuoka Like
  • Modec Delivery Van
  • Navistar eStar
  • Nissan LEAF
  • Opel Ampera
  • Peugeot iOn
  • Porsche Panamera e-Hybrid PHEV
  • Renault Kangoo
  • Renault ZOE (done!)
  • Smart fortwo electric drive (3rd generation)
  • Smith Newton
  • Tesla Model S
  • Tesla Roadster (being finalized)
  • Toyota Prius Plug-in
  • Toyota RAV4EV (second generation, being finalized)
  • Th!nk City (being finalized)
  • Volvo V60 PHEV (being finalized)
Is your plug-in vehicle missing from the list?  Give us a shout at lovemyplug@mycarma.com and let us know what vehicle you have.  We have a few additional decodes in the works. 

The Hardware


The prototype hardware and firmware for MyCarma myEV is based on two of our designs we currently have in production here in North America.

The dad is the FleetCarma hardware that is currently installed in fleet EVs all over the world.  The cellular version is more popular - it has a good ROI for a fleet needing to maximize the benefits of EVs, but is a bit pricey for an individual enthusiast.  So it's a bit of overkill for a personal EV logger. 

The mom is the CrossChasm OpenXC logger.  It has a similar form-factor to the manual (non-cellular) version of the FleetCarma logger.  The hardware is slightly different though, and it has a Bluetooth chip.  This logger is used by app developers to make use of the extra signals Ford has given access to.  Unfortunately, this hardware and firmware can't make use of FleetCarma's decodes for electric vehicles.  

The daughter, a prototype, has been created to combine the electric vehicle capability of the dad, with the Bluetooth capability of mom.  With your backing, we will be able to take that prototype into full production and complete the necessary testing with the app. 

Timing

We have the myEV hardware and firmware prototyped.  If the campaign is successful, the production-intent design will be completed and sent to production.  

Additionally, the unlock features that will be added to the app will be established based on the feedback of the backers.  These will be integrated into the app.  

While there remains additional testing and production timing, the balance of the work is scheduled to be completed over a three month period.


Are you MyCarma? Or CrossChasm?  And what's a FleetCarma?

One team.  One goal.  Three parts... and because an engineer leads our marketing efforts, three names (thanks Matt).  So we're all three.  Read more about us in the full bio if you're so inclined.  

...oh yeah, and if you're wondering, our goal is to make high-efficiency vehicles a reality.


Campaign Updates

June 1st update: Q&A was added below. Please keep the questions coming! 

June 2nd update: Draft feature & upgrade list.  

June 9th update: We originally overlooked including a Model S early-bird perk. It has been added now. For anyone who has already contributed to the full-priced Model S perk, we'll throw in a t-shirt at no cost. Our sincerest apologies!

June 16th update: Due to popular demand, we have extended the Viking early-bird perk another 20 people. The price will increase once these are sold out.

June 17th update: Added the Toyota RAV4EV and Renault ZOE to the compatibility list. We are still working on these models, but they will be ready by the time we ship.

June 18th update: Added the BMW i3, Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV, and Volvo V60 PHEV to the compatibility list.  Like the RAV4EV and ZOE the compatibility work is in-progress and will be completed before the ship date. 

June 23rd update: Added the Tesla Roadster (hat-tip to Mark from OVMS). Similar to the Model S, it also requires the harness, so please choose either the Pioneers or Astronauts perk.

June 24th update: Vikings Extended Early-bird is now sold out! We've just added a TITANS (Early-bird 2) perk, a $20 discount off the full price.

July 3rd update - Pre-Independence Day Surprise: Added the Coda to the list. A big thanks to Don, David, and Bill! Also, as a free upgrade, we'll now also be shipping our loggers with either on-board storage or cellular connectivity. Read more about the update here.

July 8th update: We've added a free upgrade: all loggers will now come with on-board storage!

July 12th update: It has happened, $25k and 100%! A huge THANK YOU to all our backers!

July 22nd update: Our campaign has successfully ended; thanks for backing us! To get more info, you can now visit our website.


Q&A

We've had some great questions that have come up a few times.  Here's a quick Q&A. 

Can I use the myEV device in parallel with another device?

Yes.  You'll need a y-harness. Since the myEV device is fully passive on most vehicles (doesn't create signal traffic like an OBD device does) it plays nicely with others.  

My vehicle (i3, Outlander PHEV,  RAV4 EV, ...) isn't on your list.  Will it be?

For most of these, yes.   Shoot us an email at lovemyplug@mycarma.com and we can confirm vehicles/timing for you.  Most of the vehicles will be added to the list before the October ship date.  

Are you going to also show "X"? (X can be any other signal/value that may be of interest)

With the signals we're able to get, there are a number of things we can include.  We want to prioritize what get's included/added with the backers.  We'll get the draft list posted here in the next day to give you a better idea of what we are planning to add.  

Please keep the questions coming!  And thanks everyone for your time and backing!  

--

The T-Shirts

For those backers that pick the Outfitter Perk (T-Shirt) here are the options for you to choose from:

story:
Hello,

My name is Adam Smith; I am majoring in Entrepreneurship at Baylor University. I am launching a new product; Bike Pipe, a bicycle exhaust kit. It improves the classic idea of putting cards in your spokes making it louder, more durable and easy to attach for children. Bike Pipe is also easily kicked on/off while riding.

My product replicates the motorcycle look and sound making every bicycle roar and exciting. A durable reed smacks each spoke and produces a loud noise. This noise is then amplified through a horn shaped exhaust which increases the awareness of the rider to pedestrians and other vehicles. This improves the overall safety and well being of the rider.



Growing up in Southern California, I began riding dirt bikes at the age of eight. Naturally, bicycles were my next best choice when I was not on the track. When I was riding a bicycle though, I missed the loud noise of my dirt bike. Like generations before me I used cards and stuck them in between my spokes. Using rare baseball cards, I ended up destroying some of my father’s collection. Although upset, my father got an idea to improve this classic idea. He made a prototype of the Bike Pipe out of spare motorcycle parts. The prototype was awesome! Kids on the block literally lined up to ride and were even willing to pay! My father then acquired patents on the idea. Unfortunately, at the time we were financially stressed and we didn’t have the funds to take this product to the next level.


This brings us to the present. I am 22 years old and have successfully launched and grown TexasBartenders.com, a legitimate mobile bartending business. However, I have always been passionate about Bike Pipe. I have focused my attention on this product and for the past two of years. I am very excited about how far we have come. I am just a couple steps to launching my child hood toy and making this dream come true. I have partnered with local Texas manufacturers and distributers and we are set to launch in December. It is my vision to provide Bike Pipe to children all over the nation before Christmas day.

This is where I need your help. We need Pre Orders and I would greatly appreciate any support you could provide. If you can't pledge we ask for your support by sharing our story online. Thank you!

Our goal to start production is $10,000. With this money we will be able to fund the initial order. The $10,000 will go towards the cost of producing the units. The biggest cost is the mold tooling required for the injection molding process. Next comes the variable cost for manufacturing and shipping each individual product. (i.e Raw materials, labor, ordering, storage and all other costs) What is left will be used for advertising and expanding Bike Pipe.


We want to allow every child the opportunity to "Be Heard". Every Bike Pipe comes with stickers for customization, an extra reed for long use and the Bike Pipe exhaust system. The Bike Pipe does not require batteries. 

Sticker Pack that comes with every Bike Pipe:

Extra Reeds:

If we do not reach our goal we will reach out to investors and ensure we deliver this product to our supporters who made a pledge. We are dedicated to success and will make this product happen.

The biggest challenge is time. We have found that communication between us, the manufacturer, and fulfillment takes a lot time to get orders processed, manufactured and shipped.

We have changed our manufacturer from China to the United States. This will not only improve our over all quality but also shorten the communication delay. To avoid long wait times, We have set up a very efficient supply chain sourcing local manufactures and distributors in order to deliver this product with speed and quality. Our goal is to have this product in our supporters hands before Christmas.

the awareness of the rider to pedestrians and other vehicles. This improves the
overall safety and well being of the rider.


Growing up in Southern
 California, I began riding dirt bikes at the age of eight.
Naturally, bicycles were my next best choice when I was not on the track. When I
was riding a bicycle though, I missed the loud noise of my dirt bike. Like
generations before me I used cards and stuck them in between my spokes. Using
rare baseball cards, I ended up destroying some of my father’s collection. Although
upset, my father got an idea to improve this classic idea. He made a prototype
of the Bike Pipe out of spare motorcycle parts. The prototype was awesome! Kids
on the block literally lined up to ride and were even willing to pay! My father
then acquired patents on the idea. Unfortunately, at the time we were
financially stressed and we didn’t have the funds to take this product to the
next level. 



This brings us to the present. I am 22 years old and have successfully launched
and grown TexasBartenders.com, a legitimate mobile bartending business. However,
I have always been passionate about Bike Pipe. I have focused my attention on
this product and for the past two of years. I am very excited about how far we
have come. I am just a couple steps to launching my child hood toy and making
this dream come true. I have partnered with local Texas manufacturers and distributers and we are
set to launch in December. It is my vision to provide Bike Pipe to children all
over the nation before Christmas day. 
This is where I need your help. We need
Pre Orders and I would greatly appreciate any support you could provide. If you can't pledge we ask for your support by sharing our story online. Thank you!
Our goal to start production is $10,000. With this money we will be able to fund the initial order. The $10,000 will go towards the cost of producing the units. The biggest
 cost is the mold tooling required for the injection molding process. 
Next comes the variable cost for manufacturing and shipping each 
individual product. (i.e Raw materials, labor, ordering, storage and all
 other costs) What is left 
will be used for advertising and expanding Bike Pipe.

We want to allow every child
 the opportunity to "Be Heard". Every Bike Pipe comes with stickers for 
customization, an extra reed for long use and the Bike Pipe exhaust system.
 The Bike Pipe does not require batteries. 
Sticker Pack that comes with every Bike Pipe:
Extra Reeds:If we do not reach our goal we will reach out to investors and ensure we deliver this product to our supporters who made a pledge. We are dedicated to success and will make this product happen.The biggest challenge is time. We have found that 
communication between us, the manufacturer, and fulfillment takes a lot
 time to get orders processed, manufactured and shipped.

We have changed our manufacturer from China to the United States. 
This will not only improve our over all quality but also shorten the 
communication delay. To avoid long wait times, We have set up a very 
efficient supply chain sourcing local manufactures and distributors in 
order to deliver this product with speed and quality. Our goal is to have 
this product in our supporters hands before Christmas.

story:
Portland Burrito what?

Portland Burrito Project are members of all ages in the Portland community who come together, make burritos from scratch, and hand deliver them in the downtown streets to the hungry and homeless. Currently, our restaurant style burritos cost $0.68 a burrito (beans, cheese, rice, salsa, veggies, wrapped up in tortilla and kept warm with foil wrapper).

Efforts of sustaining this mission are provided by community funds and donations.

How you come into play...

We are seeking support in any of the following ways.

1. Donations

2. Welcoming people to ride and support us during ANY stretch of the ride.

3. Share what we are trying to accomplish with your friends. Facebook? Blog? Twitter? It's all good!

Other fun info

Come ride date, PDXBP will have served over 1,000 burritos in the streets and operates out of local restaurant kitchen. We are currently one of an estimated 36 burritos projects operation in North America. To find other Burrito Projects and information, visit burritoproject.org

    • THORIUM:

      Thorium is the future of energy, it is the only alternative to oil that is safe, clean zero emissions, cheap and very abundant, there is over 5,000 years of thorium in existing mines. The LPS laser turbine generator systems is the only systems of its kind that is small but scalable, it can be used in just about any application.

    • This is not just about a Thorium Powered car its about energy. Energy and how we use energy is the very foundation of humanity, it is what separates us and elevates us above the animals. From that first camp fire to today's nuclear power plants, the world as we know it is based on energy! The future of mankind is linked directly to energy. Its time to switch to thorium.

    Your contribution will go a long way to making this a reality.

    • LPS LaserTurbineGenerators are:

    THE REPLACEMENT TECHNOLOGY FOR THE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE.

    Thorium is safe to hold

LPS wishes to create a path to the creation of compelling electric vehicles to the world and what better way than in a car that is an electrical generation plant on wheels. If 10% of all the cars in the world used LPS thorium generator technology where plugged in to our homes or the grid there wouldn’t be and need for large power plants or the grid witch is the part of the power systems that generally fail.

    • LPS Systems:

    • Folks get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
    • E-mail as many other people as you can, Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Northwest Hub is a not for profit full service bicycle shop, bike reclamation program and training center. Proceeds from our cycling center directly serve neighbors in need of transportation who "purchase" a bike through service to our community. Through recycling, reclamation, training and redistribution, the NW Hub provides affordable services and sales to the general public and free bicycles, locks, parts, repair training and vocational rehabilitation to adults and at-risk youth.

We recently received backing from a local business to cover the rent and utilities of a retail space for one year. However, we are still in need of further tooling and supplies to train and mobilize our community in need and make bicycles accessible to all, whatever their income. Every $100 donated enables us to train, empower, and mobilize one person in need of skills and transportation. Please help us reach our goal!

story:
FAQs

  1. How far can I go?

The I-Ride can take you up to a 20 mile range. Depending on many factors such as the weight of rider, speed, and slope, and road conditions the e-board can go longer.

  1. Are the board + remote rechargeable?

Yes both the board and remote are rechargeable and it’s as simple as plugging the charger into your I-Ride and remote (USB) .

  1. How do I set it up?

Turn on your board, turn on your remote, and get on the board and ride!

  1. How do I control it?

Use your handheld remote to accelerate and brake and use your feet and leaning motions to maneuver

  1. What maintenance is needed?

No maintenance required however some prefer to clean the board and remote with a cloth towel

  1. Is it water resistant?

I-Ride is splash resistant for days when puddles can come at a surprise.

  1. Where does I-Ride Ship?

Worldwide

  1. I have questions about I-Ride or I need more information, who do I contact?

Please send us an email at info@iridetechnologies.com or direct message us through the Indiegogo Campaign page.  We're here to answer any questions, concerns, or issues you have.​​

  1. What is your refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case by case basis; at some point I-Ride will need to lock refunds in order to begin production and shipment.  No refunds are accepted once they’ve shipped.

  1. What is your return/exchange policy? 

If you received your product and aren’t satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, shipping and handling fees not included

 11. I’m interested in distribution partnership, who should I contact?

Please contact us at info@iridetechnologies.com for all distribution needs.  We’re ecstatic that you’re interested in our product!

story:
Before we begin, there are 2 things you should know:

1.  We have 60 completed bikes in our USA warehouse right now.  These bikes are ready to ship at the conclusion of this Indiegogo campaign to our first 60 backers. (Choose an "In-stock" perk to get your bike by May 2021)

2. Back NOW to lock in Indiegogo-exclusive prices.  We have no intention of ever selling our bikes at this price again.

 

 

The Duro Rise is an electric bike built for adventure.  It is powerful, capable, and thoughtfully designed to be beautiful and fun.  An ebike you can ride anywhere you ride a traditional bike, but enables you to adventure further than ever before.

 

 

We designed the Duro Rise because traditional bikes and motorcycles have limitations that were holding us back. Bikes are limited by physical capabilities and motorcycles, while they may facilitate amazing adventures, aren’t always legal on the trails we want to explore. Motorcycles also require a special license and yearly registration. As we began exploring the world of ebikes we discovered that most ebikes are complicated, lack style, and aren’t designed to handle the rigors of our adventures.

The Duro Rise will take you further without conditioning, red tape, licenses or registration. It is an uncomplicated bike, beautifully designed, created to help you explore like never before.

 

 
 
 

 

 

The duro rise is built with a 1,000 watt motor powered by a 48V 17.5ah Samsung battery so you can go fast for as far as your wanderlust takes you.

 

 

 

Seven gear transmission paired with the powerful motor setup makes going up just as fun as going down.

 

 

Full front and rear suspension with an extended padded seat makes the Rise comfortable and smooth to ride, and much safer over uneven terrain. There is even room for your favorite friend to hitch a ride.

 

Dual piston hydraulic disc brake system installed on both the front and rear wheel so you can stop and stay in control when you’re riding fast over less-stable terrain.

 

 

Nine levels of motor power assistance. Adjust the motor to be as fast or slow as you like with just the push of a button.  Want to go fast?  press the “+” button on the handlebar mounted controller to go to level nine and unleash the Duro Rise.  Want to go slower? Use the “-” button to adjust power assistance down and limit the power assisted speed.

 

 

Bright 2000 lumen headlight, paired with the brake light, looks cool, keeps you safe and lights your path so you can explore into the night.

 

 

We have 60 completed bikes in our USA warehouse READY TO SHIP NOW. The Duro Rise is not a prototype.  It is a finished product that we ride every single day. As soon as this Indiegogo concludes we will immediately ship these bikes to our first 60 backers. - Estimated delivery is May 2021.

We are ready to start production on our next order and need your help.  Production will begin at completion of the Indiegogo and our bikes will be completed in time for you to enjoy a beautiful summer ride.   - Estimated delivery is August 2021.

 

 

Duro was created out of our own passion for riding fast and exploring far with our favorite people.  Hours of Northern California adventures inspired the beauty and capability built into the Duro Rise.  Yosemite, the Redwood Forest, Lake Tahoe - all have their prints on our brand and bike.  

Duro is a community for shared adventure.  By backing our campaign you not only receive an amazing ebike, you become a part of our family.  So come, adventure with us, and together we can escape the ordinary.

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping

If you are one of the first 60 backers and are able to grab an "in-stock" perk, We will be shipping these bikes out at the conclusion of this campaign. You can expect to receive your bikes by May 2021.
If you are unable to snag an "in-stock" bike your bike is estimated for an August 2021 delivery date.We guarantee that at the conclusion of this campaign we will ship the ebikes to the first 60 indiegogo supporters. 

Shipping is only available in the United States at this time. We offer free shipping to the continental United States. For shipping bikes to Hawaii and Alaska, please include the additional shipping cost by selecting the "Shipping to Hawaii and Alaska" add-on.

story:
There is no shortage of electric skateboards on the market today but most are either extremely underpowered or extremely expensive. So we made KingKong Pro - an affordable, high-quality dual-motor e-skateboard that delivers premium performance, the power of dual-motor, and everyday practicality. With KingKong Pro we pushed the limits of what an e-skateboard can do and the results are stunning.

KingKong Pro - the most affordable carbon fiber wrapped electric skateboard with a dual-motor drive.

KingKong Pro has a built-in battery of 4300 mAh, but only weighs 6.95 kg (6.3 kg for the single-motor version). Though compact in size, KingKong Pro is powerful - it can achieve speeds up to 35 km/h and a range of 20 km making it the perfect choice for commuting, competing or fun.


With the dual motor drive system, climbing hills won`t be an issue like it is on cheap e-skateboards. KingKong Pro can easily tackle climbs up to a 25% incline (tested with a rider of 75 kg).


To make it as light & stylish as possible, we used a special lightweight aero plastic alloy to create the deck of the board and then wrapped the whole skateboard in carbon fiber to provide ultra-durability.

 

Nothing is more important than a great ride and controlling KingKong Pro is super easy. Speed and braking can be controlled using the handheld remote or by using the App on your smartphone. The control is intuitive and easy to learn with predictable braking, acceleration, and turning.

 

How to customize the brake and acceleration on APP

Check this unbiased and professional product review from Vilas Left, the great skateboard enthusiast come from California, United States. Thanks so much for his awesome work.

 
 

   3 Riding Modes
KingKong Pro makes it easy for people of all skill levels to enjoy riding. It features a Beginner mode for kids and inexperienced riders that limit the speed and acceleration of safety. As skills increase, Cruising mode and Fast mode are available to take your ride to the next level.
 Braking 
Kingkong Pro has advanced features to customize your ride such as regenerative braking that is smooth and easy to use as well as customizable acceleration profiles that can be programmed with the app.
 Safety Light 
KingKong Pro is designed with both a front and rear light. The bright LED headlight helps you navigate in low-light conditions – a great safety feature perfect for commuting. The rear taillight is also built with safety in mind and helps other vehicles see you from behind.
 USB Charging 
Want to juice up your phone while on the go? No problem! KingKong Pro has a USB port to charge phones and other mobile devices.
 Water Resistance
KingKong Pro is water-resistant and weather-ready. It can be used on wet road conditions safely.
 KingKong Carrier Bag
The KingKong carrier bag is the perfect complement to traveling with and transporting your board. It is big enough for daily essentials and the board can strap on for hassle-free carrying.
